body:
Agar Tamaam Baatein Taqdir Mein Likhi Hoti Toh;
Main Apne Bando Ko Dua Maangna Na Sikhata!

Mera Dil Sambhaal Kar Rakhna Kahin Kho Mat Dena;
Bahut Bholi Ho Aap, Zamaana Loot Lega!

Manzilon Se Begana Aaj Bhi Safar Mera;
Raat Besahar Mere Dard Beasar Mera!

Meri Neendein Udaane Wale;
Ab Tere Khawab Kaun Dekhega!

Udhar Se Chand Tum Dekho, Idhar Se Chand Hum Dekhen;
Nigahein Yun Takrayein Ki Do Dilon Ki Eid Ho Jaye!

Kuch Toh Rahi Hongi Inki Bhi Mazbooriyan;
Yun Chah Ke Koi Bewafa Nahi Hota!

Aaj Badi Der Tak Woh Mohabbat Dikhata Raha;
Na Jane Kyon Laga Ki Woh Mohabbat Chhod Jayega!

Abhi Kamsin Ho, Rehne Do, Kahin Kho Dogi Dil Mera;
Tumhare Hi Liye Rakha Hai, Le Jaana Jawaan Ho Kar!

Din Agar Laut Bhi Aayen To Kya Kariye;
Dil Lagana To Phir Bhi Usi Sitamgar Se Hai!

Sham Ka Parda Sarak Geya, Ab Shab Se Rubaru Ho Ja;
Kuch Apne Fasane Kehta Chal, Kuch Mere Tarane Sunta Ja!

Fir Teri Nigahon Ko Aaina Banaya Hai;
Le Dekh Fir Muddaton Baad Ye Husn Nikhar Aaya Hai!

Zindagi Meri Thi Lekin Ab Toh;
Tere Kehne Mein Raha Karti Hai!

Bechain Hoke Shouq Woh Mashooq  Ho Gaye;
Jis Par Padi Nigaah Tere Beqrar Ki!

Zidd Bhi Ki Dil Ne To Ishq Karne Ki;
Aaj Kehta Hai Ki Tune Mujhe Roka Bhi Nahi!

Dil Ko Uss Raah Par Chalana Hi Nahi;
Jo Mujhe Tujh Se Juda Kar De!

Dushman Ho Toh Ishq Jaisa;
Seedha Dil Per Hi Vaar Kare!

Darpok Hain Woh Log, Jo Pyaar Nahi Karte;
Yeh Sach Hai Barbad Hone Ke Liye Bhi Jigar Chahiye!

Zikr Uska Hi Sahi Bazm Mein Baitho To Faraz;
Dard Kaisa Hi Uthe Haath Na Dil Pe Rakhna!

Dil Na-Umeed To Nahi, Nakaam Hi To Hai;
Lambi Hai Gham Ki Shaam, Magar Shaam Hi To Hai!

Marne Ke Baad Bhi Meri Aankhein Khuli Rahi;
Aadat Jo Padd Gayi Thi Tere Intezar Ki!

Aafat To Hai Woh Naaz Bhi Andaz Bhi Lekin;
Marta Hun Main Jis Par Woh Ada Aur Hi Kuch Hai!

Kabhi Yeh Dua Ki Usse Mile Jahaan Ki Khushiyan;
Kabhi Ye Khauf Ki Wo Khush Mere Bagair Toh Nahi!

Dene Wale Ne Diya Sab Kuchh Ajab Andaaz Se;
Saamne Duniya Padi Hai Aur Utha Sakte Nahi!

Dil Ke Rishton Ki Nazakat Woh Kya Jaane;
Naram Lafzon Se Bhi Lag Jati Hai Chotein Aksar!

Chhup Ke Rehna Hai Jo Sab Se To Ye Mushkil Kya Hai;
Tum Mere Dil Mein Raho Dil Ki Tamanna Ho Kar!

Jiska Tum Puchte Ho Wo Mar Geya Shakhs;
Usko Kisi Ki Yaad Ne Zinda Jala Diya!

Wohi Wehshat, Wohi Hairat, Wohi Tanhai Hai 'Mohsin';
Teri Aankhein Mere Khwabon Se Kitni Milti Julti Hain!

Ungliyan Toot Gayi Patthar Tarashte Tarashte;
Aur Jab Bani Surat-e-Yaar Toh Kharidaar Aa Gaye!

Khusro Dariya Prem Ka, Ulti Wa Ki Dhaar;
Jo Utra So Doob Geya, Jo Dooba So Paar!

Jee Kee Jee Hi Mein Rahi Baat Na Hone Payi;
Haif Ki Us Se Mulaqat Na Hone Payi!

Meri Neendein Udaane Wale;
Ab Tere Khawab Kaun Dekhega!

Aafat To Hai Woh Naaz Bhi, Andaz Bhi Lekin;
Marta Hun Main Jis Par, Woh Ada Aur Hi Kuch Hai!

Zubaan Mili Hai Magar;
Humzubaan Nahi Milta!

Pyaar Aur Mohabbat Uss Daur Ki Baat Hai;
Jab Makaan Kachhe Aur Log Sachhe Hua Karte The!

Pyaar Bhi Karna, Zamane Se Bhi Ghabrana Bahut;
Aayinon Ka Ghar Banana Aur Patharon Jaise Sochna!

Dil Pe Aaye Hue Ilzam Se Pehchante Hain;
Log Ab Mujhko Tere Naam Se Pehchante Hain!

Dil Ko Ussh Raah Par Chalana Hi Nahi;
Jo Mujhe Tujhse Juda Kar De!

Chhup Ke Rehna Hai Jo Sab Se To Yeh Mushkil Kya Hai;
Tum Mere Dil Mein Raho Dil Kee Tamanna Ho Kar!

Yeh Ajab Qayamatein Hain Teri Rahguzar Mein Guzari;
Na Ho Ke Mar Mittein Hum, Na Ho Ke Jee Uthein Hum!

Kamaal Ka Shakhs Tha Jisne Zindagi Tabaah Kardi;
Raaz Ki Baat Hai Dil Usse Aaj Bi Khafaa Nahi!

Agar Tu Wajah Na Puche To Ek Baat Kahun;
Bin Tere Ab Humse Bhi Jiya Nahi Jata!

Kitne Barson Ka Safar Khak Hua Mera;
Usne Jab Pucha Kaise Aana Hua!

Ajab Shikwa Sa Rehta Hai, Tumhein Mujh Se Mujhe Tum Se;
Tumhein Ulfat Nahi Mujh Se, Mujhe Nafrat Nahi Tum Se!

Main Jo Din Ko Bhi Kahun Raat Woh Iqraar Kare;
Mujhko Hasrat Hai Koi Yun Bhi Mujhe Pyaar Kare!

Fursat Mein Hi Yaad Kar Liya Karo Humein;
Do Pal Hi Mangte Hain Puri Zindagi Nahi!

Is Kadar Toot Ke Tum Par Humein Pyaar Aata Hai;
Apni Baahon Mein Bharien Aur Maar Hi Daalein Tum Ko!

Husn Ki Chahat Mein Ishq Ko Humne Thukra Diya;
Husn Ne Yehi Silsila Hamari Zindagi Mein Dohra Diya!

Yun Toh Bhule Hain Humein Log Kai Pehle Bhi Bahut Se;
Par Tum Jitna Koi Un Mein Se Kabhi Yaad Nahi Aaya!

Shayad Mujhe Kisi Se Mohabbat Nahi Hui;
Lekin Yaqeen Sabko Dilaata Raha Hun Main!

Yeh Aur Baat Ki Chahat Ke Zakhm Gahre Hain;
Tujhe Bhulane Ki Koshish Toh Warna Ki Hai Bahut!

Na Karo Takraar, Mujhe Tumhara Hi Khayal Hai;
Phir Baat Se Baat Niklegi Aur Tum Rooth Jaoge!

Shaayad Mujhe Kisi Se Mohabbat Nahi Hui;
Lekin Yaqeen Sabko Dilata Raha Hoon Main!

Rokna Meri Hasrat Thi Aur Jaana Uss Kaa Shaunk;
Woh Shaunk Poora Kar Geya Meri Hasratien Tod Kar!

Woh Jo Kehta Hai Ishq Mein Kya Rakha Hai;
Ik Heer Ne Usko Apna Ranjha Bana Rakha Hai!

Tere Ishq Mein Kho Toh Diya Hai Chain Aur Sukoon;
Ab Kbhi Na Kehna Ki Main Kuch Nahi Karta!

Hichkiyan Dilakar Hamari Ulfat Kyon Badha Rahe Ho;
Bas Itna Bata Do Yaad Kar Rahe Ho Ya Yaad Aa Rahe Ho!

Aaj Sawan Bhi Sunata Hai Teri Chitthi;
Kore Badal Mein Tu Aansuon Ko Rakhti Hai!

Tu Bhi Tasveer Ke Manind Chup Rehti Hai;
Meri Khamoshi Teri Tarah Kuch Kehti Hai!

Ek Khat Mein Sahej Kar Zara Si Hansi Bheji Hai,
Tumhein Kasam Hai Meri Jaan Ki Ise Apne Labon Pe Rakh Lena!

Bachao Laakh Dil Ko Magar Mohabbat Ho Hi Jaati Hai;
Nazar Aakhir Nazar Hai, Ye Shararat Kar Hi Jaati Hai!

Kuch Meethi Si Thandak Hai Aaj In Hawaon Mein,
Shayad Teri Yaadon Se Bhara Daraaz Khula Reh Geya Hai!
Jhooth Kehte Hain Log Ki Mohabbat Sab Kuch Cheen Leti Hai; Maine Toh Mohabbat Karke Ghamon Ka Khazana Paa Liya!

Usne Kaha Ki Agar Naseeb Hua Toh Hum Zaroor Milenge;
Maine Kaha Ki Agar Hum Badbnaseeb Hue To Kaise Jee Payenge!

Meri Nigah-E-Shauq Bhi Kuch Kam Nahi Magar,
Phir Bhi Tera Shabab Tera Hi Shabab Hai!

Zaroori To Nahi Ki Shayari Wo Hi Kare Jo Ishq Mein Ho,
Zindagi Bhi Kuch Zakham Bemisal Diya Karti Hai!

Yun Guzarti Lamha-Lamha Ja Rahi Hai Zindagi,
Hai Tanhai Badi Aur Tanha Badi Hai Zindagi!

Narazgi Chahe Kitni Bhi Ho Tumse;
Par Tumhe Bhul Jane Ka Khayal Aaj Bhi Nahi Aata!

Hawa Mein Aaj Bhi Roti Hai Bansuri;
Udaas Phirti Hai Sadiyon Se Heer Jungle Mein!

Hamari Khoj Mein Rehti Thi Titliyaan Aksar;
Ki Apne Shehar Ka Husn-O-Jamaal The Hum Bhi!

Narazgi Chahe Kitni Bhi ho Tum Se;
Par Tumhein Bhool Jane Ka Khayal Aaj Bhi Nahi Aata!

Chuppi Hai Kahin Hamdardi Mere Ghamon Ke Saath;
Mil Gayi Hai Kisi Kee Kahani Meri Daastaan Ke Saath!

Har Khushi Kam Hai, Tera Gham Bhulane Ke Liye;
Ek Tera Gham Hi Kaafi Hai, Mujhe Umar Bhar Rulane Ke Liye!

ਅਸੀਂ ਵੀ ਆਦਤਾਂ ਪਾ ਲਈਆਂ, ਹੁਣ ਇੱਕਲੇ ਰਹਿਣ ਦੀਆਂ;
ਕੌਣ ਕਿਸੇ ਪਿੱਛੇ ਮਰਦਾ, ਇਹ ਸਭ ਗੱਲਾਂ ਕਹਿਣ ਦੀਆਂ।

Gar Zindagi Mein Mil Gaye Phir Ittefaq Se;
Poochenge Apna Haal Teri Bebasi Se Hum!

Bas Gayi Hai Yeh Mere Ehsaas Mein Kaisi Mehak;
Koi Bhi Khushboo Main Lagaoon Toh Teri Khushboo Hi Aaye!

Mohabbat Nahi Hai Naam Sirf Paa Lene Ka;
Bichhad Ke Bhi Aksar Dil Dhadakte Hain Saath Saath!

Apni Tasveer Banaoge Toh Hoga Ehsaas;
Kitna Dushwar Hai Khud Ko Koi Chehra Dena!

Koi Aag Jaise Kohre Mein Dabi Dabi Si Chamke;
Teri Jhilmilati Aankhon Mein Ajeeb Sa Samaa Hai!

Humse Khelti Rahi Duniya Taash Ke Patton Ki Tarah;
Jisne Jeeta Usne Bhi Phenka, Jisne Haara Usne Bhi Phenka!

Mujhe Chhodkar Woh Khush Hai To Shikayat Kaisi;
Ab Main Unhe Kush Bhi Na Dekhu Toh Mohabbat Kaisi!

Rah Pe Nikle The Yeh Soch Kar Kisi Ko Bana Lenge Apna;
Magar Iss Khawish Ne Zindagi Bhar Ka Musafir Bana Diya!

Keh Do Usse Judaai Aziz Hai Toh Rooth Jaaein;
Woh Jee Sakta Hain Toh Hum Mar Bhi Sakte Hain!

Main Apni Khak Uthakar Kahan Kahan Ghumoon;
Tere Bagair Meri Zindagi Ki Keemat Kya!

Socha Tha Ki Woh Bahut Toot Kar Chahege Humein;
Lekin Socha Bhi, Hum Ne Chaha Bhi Hum Ne, Aur Toot Bhi Hum Gaye!

Naa Jaane Kis Hunar Ko Shayari Kehte Ho Tum;
Hum To Woh Likhte Hain Jo Tumse Keh Nahi Paate!

Aye Yaar Sun Yaari Teri Mujhe Zindagi Se Bhi Pyaari Hai;
Jawab Hi Nahi Hamara Kahin Badi Khoob Jodi Hamari Hai!

Aata Hai Kaun Kaun Tere Gham Ko Baantne;
Ghalib Tu Apni Maut Ki Afwaah Udaa Ke Dekh!

Jab Se Dekhi Hai Hum Ne Duniya Kareeb Se;
Lagne Lage Hain Saare Rishte Ajeeb Se!

Koi Bhi Lamha Kabhi Laut Kar Nahi Aaya;
Woh Shaksh Aisa Geya Phir Nazar Nahi Aaya!

Qarar Dil Ko Sada Jiske Naam Se Aaya;
Wo Aaya Bhi To Kisi Aur Kaam Se Aaya!

Dil Ki Umeedon Ka Haunsla Toh Dekho;
Intezar Usi Ka Hai Jisko Ehsaas Tak Nahi!

Khayal Tera Toh Sanson Jaisa Hai;
Yeh Na Aaye Toh Mar Jaun Main!

Thakan Ehsaas Ki Ab Torh Deti Hai Mujhe Itna;
Main Aksar Din Dhale Suraj Se Pehle Doob Jata Hoon!

Apni Tamanna Se Kabhi Kuch Nahi Chaha Tha Humne;
Uski Khushi Dhundhte Rahe Toh Badnam Ho Gaye!

Kamaal Ka Tana Deti Hai Ye Duniya;
Agar Wo Tera Hai To Tere Paas Kyon Nahi!

Jab Lafz Thak Gaye To Phir Ankhon Ne Baat Ki;
Jo Baatein Aankhein Na Keh Saki Wo Phir Ashkon Se Bayaan Hui!

Jo Aag Lagai Thi Tumne Usko To Bujhaya Ashkon Ne;
Jo Ashkon Ne Bhadkai Hai Us Aag Ko Thanda Kaun Kare!

Main Bikhar Jayunga Aanson Ki Tarah;
Is Kadar Pyar Ke Baad Duayein Na De!

Yoon Chalte Chalte Thoda Zindagi Se Toh Mil;
Na Mili Manzil Toh Kinaron Se Toh Mil!

Milti Nahi Fursat Yaadon Se Uski, Rehta Hoon Masroof Baaton Mein Uski;
Main To Bas Itna Kahunga Ke Meri Jaan Main Basti Hai Jaan Uski!

Kaat Kar Zuban Meri Keh Raha Tha Woh Faraz;
Ab Tumhein Ijazat Hai Haal e Dil Sunane Ki!

Biwi Par Mere Aitbaar Ki Hadd Dekh Ghalib...
Usne Din Ko Raat Kaha Aur Maine Peg Bana Liya!

Mile To Hazaron Log The Zindagi Main Yaaron;
Woh Sab Se ALag Tha Jo Qismat Main Nahi Tha!

Khayal Tera Toh Sanson Jaisa Hai;
Yeh Na Aaye Toh Mar Jau Mein!

Ek Tumhi The Jiske Dum Pe Chalti Thi Saanse Meri;
Laut Aao Ke Zindagi Se Ab Wafa Nibhayi Nahi Jati!

Waqt Ki Yaari Toh Har Koi Karta Hai Mere Dost;
Maja Toh Tab Hai Jab Waqt Badal Jaye Par Yaar Na Badle!

Kuch Iss Tarah Sauda Kiya Waqt Ne;
Tajurba De Kar Woh Meri Nadani Le Gaya!

Jinki Yaad Hai Dil Me Nishaani Ki Tarah;
Woh To Bhool Gaye Hume Kahani Ki Tarah!

Maine Bhi Badal Diye Apne Zindagi Ke Asool;
Ab Jo Yaad Karega Woh Yaad Rahega!

Aaj Usne Ek Baat Keh Ke Mujhe Rula Diya;
Jab Dard Bardaasht Nahi Kar Sakte To Mohabbat Kyon Ki!

Utth Kar To Aa Gaye Hain Teri Bazm Se Magar;
Kuch Dil Hi Jaanta Hai Ki Kis Dil Se Aaye Hain!

Yeh Ek Baar Ki Maut Ab Use Mili Warna;
Zara Zara Sa Toh Hiddat Se Mar Raha Tha Koi!

ਕਦਰ ਕਰਿਆ ਕਰ ਰੱਬ ਦੀਆਂ ਦਿੱਤੀਆਂ  ਦਾਤਾਂ ਦੀ, ਦੁੱਖੀ ਤਾਂ ਸਾਰਾ ਜਹਾਨ ਏ;
ਇੱਥੇ ਉਹ ਵੀ ਜਿੰਦਗੀ ਜਿਉਂਦੇ ਨੇ ਨੀਲੀ ਛੱਤਰੀ ਹੀ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦਾ ਮਕਾਨ ਏ!

Mujhko Pana Hai Toh Mujhme Utar Kar Dekho;
Yoon Kinaaron Se Samundar Ko Dekha Nahi Jata!

Jinki Yaad Hai Dil Mein Nishaani Ki Tarah;
Woh Toh Bhool Gaye Humein Kahani Ki Tarah!

Har Baar Hawaon Ko Ilzaam Dena Thik Nahi Yaaron;
Kabhi Sochna Kahin Chiraag Kud Na Thak Gaya Ho Jalte Jalte!

Dard Ki Barishon Mein Hum Akele Hi The;
Jab Barsi Khushia Na Jane Bheed Kaha Se Aa Gayi!

Na Jane Kyun Yeh Dil Mera Itni Faryad Karta Hai;
Jo Iska Ho Nahi Skta Ussi Ko Yaad Karta Hai!

Bewafa Ne Hamare Zakham Ka Kuch Yoon Elaaj Kia;
Marhan Bhi Lagaya To Khanjar Ki Nouk Se!

Wo Jo Kehta Hai Ishq Mein Kya Rakha Hai;
Ek Heer Ne Usko Apna Ranjha Bana Rakha Hai!

Suna Hai Khuda Ke Darbar Se,Kuch Farishtey Faraar Ho Gaye;
Kuch to Vaapas Chale Gaye, Aur Kuch Humare Yaar Ho Gaye!

Asmaan Itni Bulandi Pe Jo Itrata Hai;
Bhuul Jaata Hai Zameen Se Hi Nazar Aata Hai!

Ahbab Ko De Raha Hoon Dhokha;
Chehre Pe Khushi Saja Raha Hoon!

Wo Baat Baat Pe Deta Hai Parindon Ki Misaal 'Faraz';
Saaf Saaf Nahi Kehta Mera Sheher Hi Chodd Do!

Taash Ke Patoon Ki Manind Hai Zindagi Meri;
Jis Kisi Ne Bhi Khela, Taqseem Mar Diya Mujhe!

Mat Khao Kasame Sari Zindagi Sath Nibhane Ki;
Hum Ne Sanson Ko Bhi Juda Hote Dekha Hai!

Hichkiyon Par Ho Raha Hai Zindagi Ka Raag Ḳhatam;
Jhatke De Kar Taar Tode Ja Rahe Hain Saaz Ke!

Ghazal Uss Ne Chhedi Mujhe Saaz Dena;
Zara Umar-e-Rafta Ko Awaaz Dena!

Khamoshyian Kar Deti Byan To Alag Baat Hai;
Kuchh Dard Hai Jo Lafzo Main Utaare Nahi Jate!

Mil Sake Aasani Se Uski Khawaish Kise Hai;
Zid To Uski Hai Jo Mukadar Me Likha Hi Nahi Hai!

Har Baar Hawao Ko Ilzaam Dena Thik Nahi Yaaro;
Kabhi Sochna Kahi Chiraag Kud Na Thak Gaya Ho Jalte Jalte!

Mohabbat Ki Misal Main, Bus Itna Hi Kahunga;
Bemisaal Saza Hai, Kisi Be-Gunahon Ke Liye!

Fikr-e-Maash Ishq-e-Butan Yaad-e-Raftagan;
Is Zindagi Mein Ab Koi Kya Kya Kiya Kare!

Diye Hain Zindagi Ne Zaḳhm Aise;
Ki Jin Ka Waqt Bhi Marham Nahin Hai!

Duniya Ke Jo Maze Hain Hargiz Woh Kam Na Honge;
Charche Yoon Hi Rahenge Afsos Hum Na Honge!

Dil Bhar Aaya Kaghaz-e-Ḳhali Ki Surat Dekh Kar;
Jin Ko Likhna Tha Woh Sab Batein Zubani Ho Gayin!

Chala Jaunga Jaise Ḳhud Ko Tanha Chhoḍ Kar;
Main Apne Aap Ko Raton Mein Uth Kar Dekh Leta Hoon!

Bahut Pehle Se Un Kadmon Ki Aahat Jaan Lete Hain;
Tujhe Ai Zindagi Hum Door Se Pehchan Lete Hain!

Badi Talash Se Milti Hai Zindagi Ai Dost;
Qaza Ki Tarah Pata Puchti Nahi Aati!

Dil Ka Kya Hai Dil Ne Kitne Manzar Dekhe Lekin;
Ankhen Pagal Ho Jaati Hain Ek Ḳhayal Se Pehle!

Aaj Nagah Hum Kisi Se Mile;
Baad Muddat Ke Zindagī Se Mile!

Ai Hijr Waqt Tal Nahi Sakta Hai Maut Ka;
Lekin Ye Dekhna Hai Ki Mitti Kahan Ki Hai!

Unka Zikar Unki Tamanna Unki Yaad;
Waqt Kitna Qeemti Hai Aaj Kal!

Khudaa Maujood Hai Puri Duniya Mein, Kahin Bhi Jagah Nahi;
Tu Jannat Mein Jaa, Wahan Peena Mana Nahi!

Pehle Bhi Jeete The, Magar Jab Se Mili Hai Zindagi;

Seedhi Nahi Hai, Door Tak Uljhi Hai Zindagi!

Peete Hain Apne Maze Ke Liye, Khaamkhaan Badnaam Gham Hai,
Poori Botal Pee Kar Dekho, Phir Duniya Kya Jannat Se Kam Hai!

Achhi Bhali Thi Door Se, Jab Paas Aayi Kho Gayi;
Jis Mein Na Aaye Kuch Nazar Woh Roshni Hai Zindagi!

Zindagi Ke Dard Kam Karne Ke Liye Shayari Karte Hein;
Lekin Yeh Mohabbat Ke Zakhm Nasoor Ban'ne Par Mada Hein!

Mein Yeh Nahi Kehta K Koi Tumhare Liye Dua Na Maange;
Mein Bas Itna Chahta Hun Ki Koi Dua Mein Tumhein Na Maange!

Kya Rog De Gayi Hai Yeh Naye Mausam Ki Barish;
Mujhe Yaad Aa Rahe Hain Mujhe Bhool Jane Waley!

Rishte Sanson Ke Sath Nahi Marte;
Peedhi Dar Peedhi Karz Chukana Padta Hai!

Peete Hai Gham e Duniya Bhulaa Ne Ke Liye, Aur Koi Baat Nahi;
Jannat Main Kahan Gham Hai, Waha Peene Kaa Mazaa Nahi!

Kya Rog De Gayi Hai Yeh Naye Mausam Ki Barish;
Mujhe Yaad Aa Rahe Hain Mujhe Bhool Jane Wale!

Uski Bewafai Pe Bhi Fida Hoti Hai Jaan Apni;
Khuda Jaane Agar Usmein Wafa Hoti Toh Kya Hota!

Rehte Hain Aas Paas Hi Lekin Saath Nahi Hote;
Kuch Log Jalte Hain Mujhse Bus Khaak Nahi Hote!

Alfaaz Giraa Dete Hain Jazbaat Ki Qeemat;
Har Baat Ko Alfaaz Mein Tola Na Karo!

Sab Hawayein Le Gayaa Mere Samandar Ki Koi;
Aur Mujhko Ek Kashti Badvani De Gayaa!

Usse Shaq Hai Ki Main, Uske Liye Jaan Nahi De Sakta;
Aur Mujhe Darr Hai Woh Royegi Bahut, Mujhe Azmaane Ke Baad!

Dil Hi Dil Mein Hum Unse Pyar Karte Hain;
Chup-Chup Unki Mahobbat Ka Intezaar Karte Hain!

Tum Se Sadiyon Ki Wafaaon Ka Koi Naata Tha;
Tum Se Milne Ki Lakiren Thi Mere Hathon Mein!

Wo Chala To Gaya, Magar Yaaro;
Hum Se Bichda Kahan Hai Wo Ab Tak!

Nadangi Ki Hadh Toh Dekho Mere Sanam Ki;
E Doston Mujhe Kho Kar Mera Jaisa Khoj Rahi Hai!

Jala Hai Jism Jahaan, Dil Bhi Jal Geya Hoga;
Kuredte Ho Jo Ab Raakh, Justujuu Kya Hai!

Jis Din Meri Arthi Is Duniya Se Vida Hogi;
Ek Alag Sama Hoga Ek Alag Baat Hogi!

Maslihat Ke Dhaagon Ne Hont Si Diye Mere;
Warna Apne Tootne Ka Kis Ko Gham Nahi Hota!

Main Apne Aap Ko Sulga Raha Hun Is Tawaqe Par;
Kabhi To Aag Bhadkegi, Kabhi To Roshni Hogi!

Teri Tasweer Me Woh Rang Bhare Hai Maine;
Ki Log Dekhenge Tujhe Aur Pehachanenge Mujhe!

Ye bhi Achha Hai Ki Sirf Sunta Hai Dil;
Agar Bolta To Qayamat Hoti!

Is Kadar Betabi Na Bada Yeh Berukhi Hai Sanam;
Mujhe Tu Is Jahan Se Le Ja Is Pyaar Ka Sahara Ban!

Apna Toh Chaahaton Mein Yahi Usool Hain;
Jab Tu Qubool Hai, Toh Tera Sub Kuch Qubool Hai!

Wo Jiski Yaad Mein Kharch Kar Di Zindagi Hamne;
Wo Hi Shaks Aaj Hame Garib Kehkar Chala Gaya!

Phir Uski Yaad, Phir Uski Aas, Phir Uski Baatein;
Ae Dil Lagta Hai Tujhe Tadapne Ka Bahut Shauk Hai!

Rukta Bhi Nahi Theek Se Chalta Bhi Nahi;
Yeh Dil Hai Ki Tere Baad Sambhalta Hi Nahi!

Badi Ajeeb Mulaqatein Hoti Thi Hamari;
Wo Matlab Se Milte The, Aur Humein Milne Se Matlab Tha!

Kabhi Hon Mukhatib To Kahun Kya Dard Hai Mera;
Ab Tum Door Se Puchoge To Khairiyat Hi Kahenge!

Haath Ki Lakeerein Bhi Kitni Ajeeb Hain,
Kambakht Mutthi Mein Hain Par Kabu Mein Nahi!

Teri Saans Ke Saath Chalti Hai Meri Har Dhadkan;
Aur Tum Puchte Ho, Mujhe Yaad Kiya Ya Nahi!

Yahan Hai Kaun Mera Jo Mujhe Samjhega 'Faraz', 
Main Koshish Kar Ke Ab Khud Hi Sanwar Jaun To Behtar Hai!

Zindagi Ki Kash-m-Kash Mein Thoda Uljh Gaye Hain Doston,
Varna Hum To Un Mein Se Hain Jo Dushmanon Ko Bhi Akela Mehsoos Nahi Hone Dete!

Band Kar Diye Hain Humne Darwaze Ishq Ke,
Par Teri Yaad Hai Ki Dararon Se Bhi Aa Jaati Hain!

Zulm Ke Saare Hunar Hum Par Yun Azmayein Gaye,
Zulm Bhi Saha Humne Aur Zaalim Bhi Kehlaye Gaye!

Koi Nahi Tha Kabhi Itne Kareeb Mere,
Ishq Mein Rangi Bas Ek Meri Rooh Thi Wahan!

Humein Ye Dil Haarne Ki Bimari Na Hoti,
Agar Aapki Dil Jeetne Ki Ada Itni Pyaari Na Hoti!

Hothon Ko Bhi Kya Mazboori Hoti Hai,
Wahi Baat Chupaate Hain Jo Kehna Zaroori Hoti Hai!

Khuda Ka Shukar Hai Usne Khwab Bana Diya,
Warna, Tamanna Tum Se Milne Ki Kabhi Poori Nahi Hoti!

Kuch To Aisa Hai Jo Wo Hum Se Nahi Kehte,
Har Ek Baat Pe Jo Mujh Ko Sahi Kehte Hain!

Berukhi Kis Shiddat Se Nibhai Jaati Hai Koi Unse Seekhe;
Aankhein Khuli Rakhte Hain Aur Kehte Hain Hum  Dikhte Hi Nahi!

Jo Baat 'Hum' Mein Thi;
Wo Baat Na 'Tum' Mein Hai Na 'Mujh' Mein Hai!

Karni Ho Agar Kabhi Pehchan Ghamgeen Shakhson Ki;
Bas Gaur Se Dekhna Wo Muskurate Bahut Hain!

Koi Tabeez Aisa Do Ki Main Chalaak Ho Jaun;
Bahut Nuksaan Deti Hai Mujhe Ye Sadgi Meri!

Zindagi Yun Hi Bahut Kam Hai Mohabbat Ke Liye;
Rooth Kar Waqt Ganvane Ki Zaroorat Kya Hai!

Itne Sawal The Mere Paas Ki Meri Umar Se Simat Na Sake,
Jitne Jawaab The Tere Paas Sabhi Teri Ek Nigah Mein Aa Gaye!

Kaash Wo Samjhte Is Dil Ki Tadap Ko Toh Humein Yun Ruswa Na Kiya Jata;
Yeh Berukhi Bhi Unki Manzoor Thi Humein Bas Ek Baar Hamein Samajh Toh Liya Hota!

Jaam Peene Se Kya Fayda, Shaam Mein Pee Subha Utar Jaayegi;
Arey Peeni Hai To Do Boond Mohabbat Ki Pee, Saari Zindagi Nashe Mein Hi Guzar Jaayegi!

Khamoshi Mein Jeene Ka Lutf Wahi Utha Sakta Hai;
Jo Fanaa Ho Chuka Ho, Ruhani Ishq Mein!

Ishq Kehta Hai Mujhe Ek Baar Kar Ke Dekh;
Tumhein Maut Se Na Milwa Diya To Mera Naam Badal Dena!

Tamaam Rishton Ko Main Ghar Pe Chhod Aaya Tha;
Phir Us Ke Baad Mujhe Koi Ajnabi Nahi Mila!

Meethi Yaadon Se Gir Raha Tha Yeh Aansu;
Phir Bhi Na Jaane Kyon Yeh Khara Tha!

Tu Dekh Ya Na Dekh, Tere Dekhne Ka Gham Nahi;
Par Teri Ye Na Dekhne Kee Ada Dekhne Se Kam Nahi!

Mujhe Ghuman Tha Ki Chaha Bahut Zamane Ne Mujhe;
Main Aziz To Sabko Tha Magar Zarooraton Kee Tarah!

Mai-Khane Mein Kyon Yaad-E-Khuda Hoti Hai Aksar;
Masjid Mein To Zikr-E-Mai-O-Meena Nahi Hota!

Jis Ko Khush Rehne Ke Samaan Mayassar Sab Hon;
Us Ko Khush Rehna Bhi Aaye Ye Zaroori To Nahi!

Khud Aag De Ke Apne Nasheman Ko Aap Hi;
Bijli Se Inteqaam Liya Hai Kabhi Kabhi!

Koshish To Hoti Hai Ki Teri Har Khwahish Poori Karun;
Par Darr Lagta Hai Ki Tu Khwahish Mein Mujhse Judai Na Maang Le!

Takleef Mit Gayi Lekin Ehsaas Reh Geya;
Khush Hun Ki Chalo Kuch To Mere Paas Reh Geya!

Bahut Maghroor Hun Main Shayad, Tere Khyalaat Aise The;
Par Tu Kya Samjhe Meri Uljhan, Mere Halaat Kaise The!

Rukta Bhi Nahi Theek Se Chalta Bhi Nahi;
Yeh Dil Hai Ki Tere Baad Sambhalta Hi Nahi!

Main Uski Zindagi Se Chala Jaun Yeh Uski Dua Thi;
Aur Uski Har Dua Poori Ho, Yeh Meri Dua Thi!

Peeta Tha Jiske Saath Wo Saaki Bada Haseen Tha;
Aadi Bana Kar Zaalim Ne Maikhana Badal Liya!

Koi Betaab, Koi Mast, Koi Chup, Koi Hairaan;
Teri Mehfil Mein Ek Tamaasha Hai Jidhar Dekho!

Paani Dariya Mein Ho Ya Aankhon Mein;
Gehrai Aur Raaz Dono Mein Hote Hain!

Dil Mera Dekh Dekh Jalta Hai,
Shama Ka Kis Pe Dil Pighalta Hai!

Bahut Aasan Hai Zameen Pe Ghar Khada Kar Lena;
Zindagi Guzar Jaati Hai Dil Mein Ghar Banane Ke Liye!

Ye Ajeeb Khel Hai Meri Zindagi Mein,
Jahan Yaad Ka Lafz Aa Jaye, Wahan Tum Yaad Aate Ho!

Kuch Der Aur Agar Aap Thehar Jaate Toh Dil Ke Armaan Main Pure Kar Leta,
Aankhon Mein Basakar Kar Leta Band Inko, Fir Hans Kar Sabke Sitam Zar Leta!

Yaad Rakhna Hi Mohabbat Mein Nahi Hai Sab Kuch;
Bhool Jana Bhi Badi Baat Hua Karti Hai!

Kuch Is Tarah Wo Meri Baaton Ka Zikar Kiya Karti Hai;
Suna Hai Wo Aaj Bhi Meri Fikar Kiya Karti Hai!

Nafrat Karoge To Adhura Qissa Hun Main;
Mohabbat Karoge To Tumhara Hi Hissa Hun Main!

Tumhari Zidd Bemani Hai Dil Ne Haar Kab Maani Hai;
Kar Hi Lega Vash Mein Tumhein Yeh Iski Aadat Purani Hai!

Pehle Sharaab Zeesat Thi Ab Zeesat Hai Sharaab;
Koi Pila Raha Hai Piye Ja Raha Hun Main!

Main To Barbaad Ho Geya Hun Magar;
Ab Kisi Aur Ko Kabhi Aasra Mat Dena!

Uth Ke Chal Pada Hun Magar Dil Se Chahta Hun Yeh,
Uth Kar Mujhe Woh Rok Le Aur Raasta Na De!

Rehte Ho Aaj Bhi Sanson Mein Tum,
Yaadon Mein Tum Kitabon Mein Tum,
Jab Bhi Kalam Uthata Hun Likhne Ke Liye,
Ban Kar Ghazal Aa Jate Ho Lafzon Mein Tum!

Kuch Is Tarah Se Wo Meri Baaton Ka Zikar Kiya Karti Hai;
Suna Hai Wo Aaj Bhi Meri Fikar Kiya Karti Hai!

Cheen Lun Tujhe Duniya Se Ye Mere Bas Mein Nahi;
Mere Dil Se Tujhe Koi Nikaal De Ye Bhi Kisi Ke Bas Mein Nahi!

Jinhen Saanson Ki Mehek Se Ishq Mehsoos Na Ho,
Wo Gulab Dene Bhar Se Haal-E-Dil Kya Samjhenge!

Raakh Beshak Hun Magar, Mujh Mein Harkat Hai Abhi Bhi;
Jis Ko Jalne Ki Tamanna Ho, Wo Hawa De Kar Dekh Le Mujhe!

Wafa Ki Keemat Koi Mujh Se Aa Kar Puche;
Zindagi Bech Di Maine Tumhein Paane Ki Khatir!

Band Lifafe Pe Rakhi Chitthi Si Hai Ye Zindagi;
Pata Nahi Agle Hi Pal Kaun Sa Paigam Le Aaye!

Kaun Kehta Hai Ki Aansuon Mein Vajan Nahi Hota;
Ek Aansu Bhi Chalak Jata Hai To Mann Halka Ho Jata Hai!

Log Puchte Hain Mujhe Ki Aap Kya Kaam Karte Ho;
Main Keh Deta Hun Ki Nafraton Ke Bazaar Mein Mohabbat Ki Dukan Chalata Hun!

Raaz-E-Dil Kya Bayan Karen Hum,
Hum Aaj Bhi Dil Se Marte Hain Un Pe!

Mohabbat, Mohabbat Hi Rahegi, Badal Nahi Jayegi;
Chahe Tu Mujh Se Kar Ya Main Tum Se Karun!

Tum Se Nibhane Ki Koshishon Mein,
Bahut Se Usool Tod Diye Hain Maine!

Kis Kis Tarah Se Chuppaon Tumhein Main;
Meri Muskaan Mein Bhi Nazar Aane Lage Ho Tum!

Ehsaan Jatana Jaane Kaise Seekh Liya,
Mohabbat Jatate To Kuch Aur Baat Thi!

Haal To Puch Lun Tera Par Darta Hun Aawaz Se Teri;
Jab Jab Suni Hai Kambakht Mohabbat Hi Hui Hai!

Guzarta Nahi Koi Bhi Din Tere Bagair,
Tera Hona Lazmi Hai Saanson Ki Tarah!

Mere Yun Chup Rehne Se Naraaz Na Ho Jana Kabhi,
Dil Se Chahne Wale To Aksar Khamosh Hi Rehte Hain!

Chahat Hai Aapko Apna Bnane Ki,
Zaroorat Ki Hai Aapse Dil Lagane Ki;
Aap Humein Chahe Ya Na Chahe,
Hamari To Chahat Hai Aap Par Mar Mit Jaane Ki!

Tum Hansti Ho Mujhe Hansane Ke Liye,
Tum Roti Ho Mujhe Rulane Ke Liye,
Tum Ek Baar Rooth Kar To Dekho,
Mar Bhi Jaunga Tumhein Manane Ke Liye!

Dil Ki Nazuk Dhadkano Ko Mere Sanam Tum Ne Dhadakna Sikha Diya;
Jab Se Mila Hai Tera Pyaar Dil Ko Gham Mein Bhi Muskurana Sikha Diya!

Itne Saalon Ke Intezaar Ke Baad, Aaj Main Khushi Se Samandar Bhar Dun;
Tumhari Iss Haan Ko Sunne Ke Baad, Kahin Is Samandar Mein Hi Doob Na Jaun!

Shab-e-Visaal Hai Gul Kar Do In Chiraagon Ko;
Khushi Ki Bazm Mein Kya Kaam Jalne Walon Ka!

Maang Kar Tujh Se Khushi Lun, Yeh Mujhe Manzoor Nahi;
Bata Kis Ka Maangi Hui Daulat Se Bhala Hota Hai!

Jaan Hi Leni Thi To Saaf Keh Dete;
Kya Zaroorat Thi Yun Muskurane Ki!

Teri Yaadon Ki Koi Sarhad Hoti To Achha Hota;
Khabar To Hoti Kitna  Safar Tay Karna Hai!

Sirf Aankhon Ko Dekh Ke Kar Li Unse Mohabbat;
Chhod Diya Apne Muqaddar Ko Uske Naqaab Ke Peeche!

Khushboo Jaise Log Mile Afsanon Mein;
Aaj Jab Ek Purana Khat Khola Anjaane Mein!

Chaand Sa Jab Kaha To Gila Karne Lage;
Bole, Chaand Kahiye Na, Chaand Saa Kya Hai!

Puch Rahi Hain Aaj Mujh Se Meri Shayariyan;
Ki Kahan Udd Gaye Wo Parinde Jo Waah Waah Kiya Karte The!

Tum Zindagi Mein Aa To Gaye Ho Magar Khayal Rakhna,
Hum Jaan De Dete Hain Magar Jaane Nahi Dete!

Waqt Sikha Deta Hai Insan Ko Falsafa Zindagi Ka;
Phir To, Naseeb Kya, Lakeer Kya Aur Taqdeer Kya!

Tujhe Yaad Kar Liya Aayat Ki Tarah,
Ab Tera Zikr Hoga Ibadat Ki Tarah!

Kaash Koi Khushiyon Ki Dukaan Hoti,
Aur Mujhe Uski Pehchaan Hoti;
Khareed Leta Har Khushi Aapke Liye,
Chahe Uski Keemat Meri Jaan Bhi Hoti!

Bahut Hi Khoobsurat Hai Tere Ehsaas Ki Khushbu;
Jitna Bhi Sochte Hain Utna Hi Mehek Jaate Hain!

Ajeeb Kashmkash Mein Hain Aaj Hum,
Dil Dhokhe Mein Hai Aur Dhokhebaaz Dil Mein!

Kuch Bol Ki Ab Khamoshiyan Tadpaane Lagi Hain;
Chup Rehne Se Mazbooriyan Yaad Aane Lagi Hain!

Irshaad Ho To Main Ise Aankhon Pe Pher Lun;
Bheega Hua Aapka Damaam Sharaab Mein!

Har Pal Ke Rishte Ka Vaada Hai Tumse,
Apnapan Kuch Itna Zyada Hai Tumse,
Kabhi Na Sochna Ki Bhool Jayenge Tumhe,
Zindagi Bhar Ka Sath Denge Ye Vaada Hai Tumse!

Main Khamoshi Tere Mann Ki, Tu Ankaha Alfaaz Mera;
Main Ek Uljha Lamha, Tu Rootha Hua Halaat Mera!

Teri Aarzoo Mera Khwab Hai,
Jiska Raasta Bahut Kharab Hai;
Mere Zakham Ka Andaza Na Laga,
Dil Ka Har Panna Dard Ki Kitaab Hai!

Uske Siwa Koi Mere Jazbaat Mein Nahi,
Aankhon Mein Jo Nami Hai Wo Barsaat Mein Nahi;
Paane Ki Use Koshish Bahut Ki Magar Ai Dosto,
Wo Ek Lakeer Hai Jo Mere Haath Mein Nahi!

Qissa Teri Ada Ka Mujh Se Bhulaya Na Geya,
Mere Hi Dil Mein Mehfil Aur Mujhe Hi Bulaya Na Geya!

Muskura Do Zara Khudaa Ke Waaste;
Shaam-e-Mehfil Mein Roshni Kam Hai!

Khamosh Reh, Tanha Baith, Yaad Karta Ja Usi Ko,
Tum Ne Ishq Kiya Hai, Gunaah Chota Nahi Hai Tera!

Zalzale Yun Hi Besabab Nahi Aate,
Koi Deewana Tah-e-Khaakh Tadapta Hoga!

Baithe Hue Dete Hain Daaman Ki Hawayein;
Allah Kare Hum Na Kabhi Hosh Mein Aayein!

Aaj Maine Phir Bheje The Jazbaat Apne,
Tumne Phir Alfaz Samajh Padh Kar Rakh Diye!

Kyon Intezar Karen Kisi Mehkti Hui Shaam Ka;
Teri Nazron Se Hi Chalakta Hai Nasha Kisi Madira Ke Jaam Ka!

Hum To Unke Deedar Ke Bahaane Aate The Tere Dar Pe;
Maaf Karna Khudaa Agar Humse Ibadaat Na Hui To!

Itni Chahat Se Na Dekha Kijiye Mehfil Mein Aap,
Shehar Walon Se Hamari Dushmani Badh Jayegi!

Lamha-Lamha Jeena Kya Aur Lamha-Lamha Marna Kya;
Saath Tumhara, Saath Hamare Agar Rahe To Kehna Kya!

Udaas Dil Hai Magar Milte Hain Har Ek Se Hans Kar,
Yahi Ek Khel Seekha Hai Bahut Kuch Kho Dene Ke Baad!

Khyalaon Ko Kisi Ki Aas Rehti Hai,
Nigahaon Ko Teri Talaash Rehti Hai,
Tere Bina Koi Kami Nahi Hai Lekin,
Tere Bagair Tabiyat Udaas Rehti Hai!

Hum Bane Hi The Tabah Hone Ke Liye,
Tera Milna To Bas Ek Bahana Ban Geya!

Achha Kiya Jo Tod Diya Tumne Dil Mera,
Isko Bhi Bahut Guroor Tha Tumhare Pyaar Pe!

Jaane Kyon Kuch Kami Si Hai,
Tum Bhi Ho, Main Bhi Hun, Fir Hum Kyon Nahi!

Talaash Kar Meri Kami Ko Apne Dil Mein,
Dard Ho To Samjh Lena Rishta Abhi Baaki Hai!

Ye Ishq Kahan Le Aaya Humko,
Teri Yaad Aati Hai Par Raaton Mein Neend Nahi Aati!

Himmat Itni Thi Ki Samandar Bhi Paar Kar Sakte The,
Lekin Mazboor Itne Hue Ki Do Boond Aansuon Ne Dubo Diya!

Kyon Dil Ke Kareeb Aa Jaata Hai Koi,
Kyon Dil Ke Ehsaas Ko Chhu Jaata Hai Koi,
Jab Aadat Si Ho Jaati Hai Dil Ko Uski,
Kyon Itni Door Chala Jaata Hai Koi!

Mujhe Maloom Hai Ki Ye Khawab Jhoote Hain Aur Ye Khwahishein Bhi Adhuri Hain;
Magar Zinda Rehne Ke Liye Kuch Galatfehmiyan Bhi To Zaroori Hain!

Karo Bade Shauq Se Mohabbat Ai Chahane Walo,
Magar Soch Lena Kisi Kaam Ke Na Rahoge Bichhadne Ke Baad!

Humse Khelti Rahi Duniya Taash Ke Patton Ki Tarah;

Jisne Jeeta Usne Bhi Phenka, Jisne Haara Usne Bhi Phenka!

Mujh Par Sitam Karo To Taras Mat Khana;

Kyonki Khata Meri Hai Mohabbat Maine Ki Hai!

Itna Ajeeb Sawal Tha Unka Ki Hum Chup Se Ho Gaye;

Wo Bole Hum Pe Marte Ho Na, To Marte Kyon Nahi

Ishq-e-Dariya Mein Hum Doob Kar Bhi Dekh Aaye;
Wo Log Munafe Mein Rahe Jo Kinare Se Laut Aaye!

Main Sulagta Raha Hun Tere Ishq Mein Kisi Ad-Jali Shaakh Sa;
Kaash! Tu Bhi Mere Ishq Mein Pighalti Kabhi Mom Si!

Uski Mohabbat Ka Abhi Nishan Baki Hai,
Naam Hothon Par Hai, Jaan Abhi Baki Hai,
Kya Hua Agar Dekh Kar Munh Pher Leti Hai,
Tasalli Toh Hai Ki Chehre Ki Pehchan Abhi Baki Hai!

Tere Ishq Mein, Baadal Dhuen, Mausam Bune, Sadiyaan Gini, Lamahe Chune;
Lamahe Chune, Mausam Bune, Kuch Garam The Aur Kuch Gungune!

Zamin Par Wo Mera Naam Likhte Hain Aur Mitate Hai;
Unka Toh Timepass Ho Jata Hai....Kambhakt Mitti Mein Hum Mil Jate Hai!

Tujh Pe Kharch Karne Ke Liye Bahut Kuch Nahi Hai Mere Paas,
Thoda Waqt Hai Aur Bas Thoda Sa Main Hun!

Tere Deedar Pe Agar Mera Ikhtiyar Hota,
Yeh Roz Roz Hota Aur Baar Baar Hota!

Ab Na Koi Shikwa, Na Gila, Na Koi Malal Raha;
Sitam Tere Bhi Be-Hisab Rahe, Sabr Mera Bhi Kamaal Raha!

Kabhi Lage Tu Saath Hai, Kabhi Lage Ki Tera Ehsaas Hai;
Saath Chalta Hai Har Shay Mein Dikhai Deta Hai, Kahin Tu Khwab To Nahi!

Raat Kitni Veeran Si Ho Jaati Hai,
Jab Kuch Apne Yaad Kiye Bina Hi So Jaate Hain!

Naseeb-Naseeb Ki Baat Hoti Hai, Koi Nafrat Dekar Bhi Bepanah Pyaar Karta Hai;
Aur Koi Bepanah Pyaar Dekar Bhi Yahan Bas Khaali Haath Reh Jaata Hai!

Na Wo Sapna Dekho Jo Toot Jaye,
Na Wo Haath Thaamo Jo Chhoot Jaye,
Mat Aane Do Kisi Ko Kareeb Itna,
Ki Uske Door Jaane Se Insaan Khud Se Rooth Jaye!

Aap Rehte Ho Door Kuch Pal Ke Liye, Door Rehkar Bhi Kareeb Ho Har Pal Ke Liye,
Kaise Yaad Na Aaye Aapki Ek Pal Ke Liye, Jab Ki Dil Mein Ho Aap Har Pal Ke Liye!

Meri Rooh Mein Na Samatey To Bhool Jaate Tujhe,
Tum Itna Pass Na Aate To Bhool Jaate Tujhe,
Ye Kehte Hue Mera Tum Se Koi Taluq Nahi,
Aankhon Mein Aansu Na Aate To Bhool Jaate Tujhe!

Nikle Hum Duniya Ki Bheed Mein To Pata Chala,
Har Wo Shakhs Tanha Hai Jisne Pyaar Kiya!

Hum Ne Liya Sirf Hothon Se Jo Naam Tumhara,
Dil Hothon Se Ulajh Pada Ki Yeh Sirf Mera Hai!

Na Jane Kyon Yeh Raat Udaas Kar Deti Hai Har Roz,
Mehsoos Yun Hota Hai Jaise Bichhad Raha Ho Koi Dheere Dheere Se!

Abhi Tak Maujud Hun Is Dil Par Tere Kadmon Ke Nishaan,
Humne Tere Baad Kisi Ko Is Raah Se Guzarne Nahi Diya!

Maine Saha Hai Gale Mil Kar Bichadne Ka Gham,
Ai Mere Khuda Kisi Ko Aisa Gham Na Dena!

Wo Mere Dil Par Sar Rakh Kar Soi Thi Bekhabar,
Humne Dhadkan Hi Rok Li Ki Kahin Uski Neend Na Toot Jaye!

Raaste Kahan Khatam Hote Hain Zindagi Ke Is Safar Mein,
Manzil Wahi Jahan Khwahishen Tham Jayein!

Badalna Nahi Aata Humein Mausam Ki Tarah,
Har Ek Rut Mein Tera Intezaar Karte Hain,
Na Tum Samjh Sako Jise Qayamat Tak,
Kasam Tumhari Tumhein Itna Pyaar Karte Hain!

Yahan Alfaaz Ki Talaash Mein Na Aaya Karo Yaaro;
Hum To Bas Ehsaas Likhte Hain, Mehsoos Kiya Kijiye!

Manzilon Se Apni Kabhi Darr Na Jaana,
Raaste Ki Pareshaniyo Se Kahin Toot Na Jana,
Jab Bhi Zaroorat Ho Zindagi Mein Kisi Apne Ki,
Hum Aapke Apne Hi Hain Yeh Bhool Na Jana!

Main Lab Hun, Meri Baat Tum Ho,
Main Tab Hun, Jab Mere Saath Tum Ho!

Tha Vaada Shaam Ka Magar Aaye Woh Raat Ko,
Main Bhi Kivaad Kholne Fauran Nahi Geya!

Judaa Hai To Kya Hua Doori To Nahi,
Baat Bhi Na Ho Aisi Mazboori To Nahi,
Nazar Nahi Aate Ho Aap To Kya Hua,
In Aankhon Mein Tasveer Aapki Adhuri To Nahi!

Sar-e-Raah Jo Unse Nazar Mili To Naqsh Dil Ke Ubhar Gaye,
Hum Nazar Mila Kar Jhijhak Gaye Woh Nazar Jhuka Kar Chale Gaye!

Naam To Likh Dun Uska Apni Har Shayari Ke Saath,
Magar Phir Khayal Aata Hai Masoom Hai Kahin Badnaam Na Ho Jaye!

Badi Aarzoo Thi Mohabbat Ko Benaqab Dekhne Ki,
Dupatta Jo Sarka To Zulfein Deewar Ban Gayi!

Kuch Aisi Mohabbat Uske Dil Mein Bhar De Ai Khuda,
Wo Jis Ko Bhi Chahein Wo Main Ban Jaun!

Jo Kehte The Ki Rahenge Umar Bhar Saath Tere,
Ab Roothe Hain To Koi Manane Bhi Nahi Aaya!

Zikar Tumhara Jab Jab Hota Hai Dekho Na,
In Aankhon Se Bheega Bheega Pyaar Beh Jaata Hai!

Meri Rooh Ko Chhoo Lene Ke Liye Bas Kuch Lafz Hi Kaafi Hain;
Keh Do Bas Itna Hi Ki Tere Saath Jeena Abhi Baaki Hai!

Ab Bhi Yaad Kar Rahe Ho PaagaL Ho Kya,
Usne To Tere Baad Bhi Hazaron BhuLa Diye!

Umar Kitni Manzilein Tay Kar Chuki Hai Ai Sanam;
Par Dil Jahan Thehra Tha, Bas Wahan Hi Thehra Reh Gaya!

Lafzon Mein Uljhana Nahi Aata;
Baat Saaf Hai Ki Bahut Yaad Aa Rahe Ho Tum!

Mujhe Rula Kar Dil Uska Bhi Roya Hoga,
Chehra Aansuon Se Usne Bhi To Dhoya Hoga,
Agar Na Kiya Hasil Kuch Humne Pyaar Mein,
Kuch Na Kuch To Usne Bhi Zaroor Khoya Hoga!

Kabhi Usne Bhi Humein Chahat Ka Paigam Likha Tha,
Sab Kuch Usne Apna Hamare Naam Likha Tha,
Suna Hai Aaj Unko Hamare Zikar Se Bhi Nafrat Hai,
Jisne Kbhi Apne Dil Par Hamara Naam Likha Tha!

Bepanah Mohabbat Ka Ek Hi Usool Hai,
Mile Ya Na Mile, Tu Har Haal Mein Qubool Hai!

Saans Tham Jati Hai Par Jaan Nahi Jati,
Dard Hota Hai Par Aawaz Nahi Aati,
Ajeeb Log Hain Is Zamane Mein,
Koi Bhool Nahi Pata Aur Kisi Ko Yaad Nahi Aati!

Sikha Do Mujhe Bhi Vaadon Se Mukar Jaane Ka Hunar,
Main Bhi Bahut Thak Geya Hun Inhe, Nibhate-Nibhate!

Dooriyan Jab Bhi Badhi To Galatfehmiyan Bhi Badh Gayi,
Phir Tumne Wo Bhi Suna Jo Maine Kaha hi Nahi!

Ahista Bolne Ka Tera Andaaz Bahut Kamaal Hai,
Kaan Sunte Kuch Nahi Lekin Dil Sab Samjh Jaata Hai!

Naqab To Unka Sir Se Lekar Paanv Tak Tha,
Magar Aankhein Bayaan Kar Rahi Thi Ki Mohabbat Ki Shaukeen Wo Bhi Thi!

Auron Ki Khushi Ke Liye Apna Dil Dukhate Ho,
Par Aansuon Se Bheega Dil Kahan Par Sukhate Ho!

Bin Mere Reh Hi Jayengi Koi Na Koi Kami Shahyad,
Tum Zindagi Ko Jitni Marzi Sanwarne Ki Koshish Kar Lo!

Is Duniya Mein Ajnabi Rehna Hi Theek Hai,
Log Bahut Takleef Dete Hain Aksar Apna Bana Kar!

Dil Hi Dil Mein Kuch Chupati Hai Woh,
Yaadon Mein Aa Kar Chain Churati Hai Woh,
Khwabon Mein Ek Ehsaas Jaga Rakha Hai,
Band Aankhon Mein Ashk Ban Tadpati Hai Woh!

Bhula Denge Tumhein Bhi Zara Sabar To Kijiye,
Aapke Jaisa Banne Mein Aur Badalne Mein Thoda Waqt To Lagega!

Sheeshe Mein Doob Kar Peete Rahe Us Jaam Ko,
Koshishein To Bahut Ki Magar Bhula Na Paye Us Ek Naam Ko!

Maine Kab Kaha Ki Tum Keemat Samjho Hamari,
Humein Bikna Hi Agar Hota To Yun Tanha Nahi Hote!

Teri Yaadon Ke Chiragon Ko Jalaya Har Shaam,
Teri Baaton Ko Seene Se Lagaya Har Shaam,
Maangi Khuda Se Teri Khushi Ki Duayein,
Tanha Baith Ke Haatho Ko Uthaaya Har Shaam!

Zindagi Ka Falsafa Bhi Kitna Ajeeb Hai,
Shaame Kat Ti Nahi Aur Saal Guzarte Chale Ja Rahe Hain!

Ye Jo Mere Halaat Hain, Ek Din Ye Sudhar Jayenge,
Magar Tab Tak Kayi Log Mere Dil Se Utar Jayenge!

Humne To Ishq Ke Nashe Mein Unko Khudaa Bana Daala,
Hosh To Tab Aaya Jab Unhone Kaha Ki Khudaa Kisi Ek Ka Nahi Hota!

Aap Bhula Kar Dekho, Hum Phir Bhi Yaad Aayenge;
Aapko Hum Hi Nazar Aayenge,
Aap Paani Pi-Pi Kar Thak Jaoge,
Hum Hichki Ban Kar Yaad Aayenge!

Umar Kitni Manzilein Tay Kar Chuki Thi Magar,
Dil Ek Baar Tere Dil Se Takraya To Thehra Hi Reh Geya!

Khatam Hone Ko Hai Dekho Ye Chiragon Ka Safar,
Ab To Aa Jao Ki Jalne Laga Hai Dil Mera!

Rakh Lo Dil Mein Sambhal Kar Thodi Si Yaad Meri,
Reh Jaoge Jab Tanha To Kaam Aayenge Hum!

Meri Hi Aawaz Mujh Tak Laut Aayi,
Shayad Hadd-e-Aflaak Ke Us Paar Bhi Main Thi!

Betaab Se Rehte Hain Uski Yaad Mein Aksar,
Raat Bhar Nahi Sote Hain Uski Yaad Mein Aksar,
Jism Mein Dard Ka Bahana Sa Bana Kar,
Hum Toot Kar Rote Hain Uski Yaad Mein Aksar!

Naam Tera Aise Likh Chuka Hun Apne Wajood Par,
Ki Hum-Naam Koi Tera Mil Jaaye To Bhi Dil Dhadak Jaata Hai!

Zara Chup Chap To Baitho Ki Dum Aaram Se Nikle,
Idhar Hum Hichki Lete Hain Udhar Tum Rone Lag Jaate Ho!

Ek Mehboob Laparwah, Ek Mohabbat Bepanah,
Dono Kafi Hain Sukoon Barbaad Karne Ko!

Itni Tehzeeb Se Pesh Aana Aadat Hai Tumhari,
Ya, Mujhe Qatal Karne Ki Sazish Hai Tumhari!

Neend Cheen Rakhi Hai Uski Yaadon Ne,
Gila Uski Doori Se Karen Ya Apni Chahat Se!

Kitne Mazboor Hain Hum Is Ishq Ke Haathon,
Na Tujhe Paane Ki Aukaat, Na Tujhe Khone Ka Haunsla!

Na Haal Pucha, Na Khairiyat Puchi;
Aaj Bhi Jab Mile Toh Unhone Bas Haisiyat Puchi!

Woh Baatein To Humse Karte The Magar Us Mein Zikar Kisi Aur Ka Rehta Tha;
Hum To Unke Har Dukh Ko Apna Maante Rahe Aur Unhein Fikar Kisi Aur Ka Rehta Tha!

Neend Aankhon Mein Pirone Ki Izazat De De,
Ai Shab-E-Gham Ab Humein Sone Ki Izazat De De!

Dil Mein Humne Tumhare Pyaar Ki Dastaan Likhi Hai,
Na Thodi Na Tamaam Likhi Hai,
Kabhi Humare Liye Bhi Dua Kar Liya Karo Sanam,
Humne Toh Har Ek Saans Tumhare Naam Likhi Hai!

Aainon Mein Aks Na Hon To Hairat Rehti Hai,
Jaise Khaali Aankhon Mein Bhi Wehshat Rehti Hai!

Aaj Kyon Takleef Hoti Hai Tumhein Meri Be-Rukhi Se,
Tum Ne Hi To Sikhaya Hai Ki Kaise Dil Jalate Hain!

Meri Mohabbat Ki Na Sahi, Mere Saleeke Ki To Daad De;
Tera Zikr Roz Karte Hain, Tera Naam Liye Bagair!

Saans Tham Jati Hai Par Jaan Nahi Jati,
Dard Hota Hai Par Aawaz Nahi Aati,
Ajeeb Log Hain Is Zamane Mein,
Koi Bhool Nahi Pata Aur Kisi Ko Yaad Nahi Aati!

Gale Mila Hai Woh Mast-E-Shabab Barson Mein,
Hua Hai Dil Ko Suroor-E-Sharaab Barson Mein,
Nigaah-E-Mast Se Us Kee Hua Yeh Haal Mera,
Ki Jaise Pee Ho Kisi Ne Sharaab Barson Mein!

Haath Zakhmi Hua To Kuch Meri Hi Khata Thi,
Lakiron Ko Badalna Chaha Tha Kisi Ko Paane Ke Liye!

Koi Puch Raha Hai Mujhse Meri Zindagi Kee Keemat,
Mujhe Yaad Aa Raha Hai Tera Halke Se Muskurana!

Tere Paas Mein Baithna Bhi Ibadat, Tujhe Door Se Dekhna Bhi Ibadat;
Na Mala Na Mantar, Na Pooja Na Sajda, Tujhe Har Ghadi Sochna Bhi Ibadat!

Main Uski Aas Mein Yun Baitha Hun Jaise,
Kisi La-Ilaaz Ko Intezar Ho Maut Ka!

Tum Aa Gaye Ho To Ab Aaina Bhi Dekhein Ge,
Abhi Abhi To Nigaahon Mein Roshni Hui Hai!

Khudaya Apne Farishtey Na Bhej Duniya Mein,
Main Aadmi Hun Farishton Ke Saath Kaise Rahoon!

Meri Mazbooriyan Kya Puchte Ho,
Ki Jeene Ke Liye Mazboor Hun Main!

Qareeb Aa Teri Aankhon Mein, Dekh Lun Khud Ko;


Bahut Dino Se Koi Aaina Nahi Dekha!

Pi Liya Karte Hain Jeene Ki Tamanna Mein Kabhi-Kabhi,
Kyonki Dagmagana Bhi Zaroori Hai Sambhalne Ke Liye!

Koi Yaad, Koi Baat, Koi Raaz Ho Tum;

Ho Faslon Se Door Magar Dil Ke Bahut Pass Ho Tum!

Tamam Umar Bhi Agar Tera Intezaar Kar Lun,
To Bhi Mujhe Ye Ranj Rahega Ki Zindagi Meri Kam Thi!

Ek Tamanna Thi Jo Hasrat Ban Gayi,
Kabhi Dosti Thi Ab Mohabbat Ban Gayi,
Kuch Is Tarha Shamil Hue Tum Zindagi Mein Ki,
Tujhe Sochte Rehna Meri Aadat Ban Gayi!

Maine Apni Har Ek Saans Tumhari Gulaam Kar Rakhi Hai,
Logon Mein Ye Zindagi Badnaam Kar Rakhi Hai,
Ab Ye Aaina Bhi Kya Kaam Ka Mere,
Maine To Apni Parchayi Bhi Tumhare Naam Kar Rakhi Hai!

Khushbu Bikharti Hui Gulab Ki Kali Ho,
Titli Si Udti Hui Naazo Se Pali Ho,
Sangmarmari Badan Liye Sancho Mein Dhali Ho,
Kitno Ko Loot Liya Tum Wo Manchali Ho!

Guzre Dino Ki Bhooli Hui Baat Ki Tarah,
Aankhon Mein Jaagti Hai Koi Raat Ki Tarah,
Usse Ummeed Thi Ki Nibhayegi Saath Wo,
Wo Bhi Badal Gayi Mere Halaat Ki Tarah!

Jo Teri Chaah Mein Guzri Bas Wahi Zindagi Thi,
Uske Baad To Bas Zindagi Ne Guzara Hai Mujhe!

Mohabbat Bhi To Ek Tarah Siyasat Hi Hoti Hai,
Jeete To Badshahi Aur Hare To Qaid-e-Tanhai!

Alvida Mat Kaho, Darr Lagta Hai Tum Se Bichadne Ka;
Phir Milenge Kaho, Taki Jee To Sake Hum Gham-e-Intezaar Mein!

Dil Nahi Lagta Aapko Dekhe Bina,
Dil Nahi Lagta Aapke Bare Mein Soche Bina,
Aankhen Bhar Aati Hain Ye Soch Kar,
Ki Kis Haal Mein Honge Aap Humare Bina!

Likhna Chahta Hun Main Bhi Kuch Gehra Sa,
Jise Padhe Koi Bhi Bas Samjh Tum Sako!

Log Aaj Bhi Tere Baare Mein Puchte Hain Kahan Hai Woh,
Main Bas Chup Ho Kar Dil Par Haath Rakh Deta Hun!

Silsila Ye Chaahat Ka Dono Taraf Se Tha,
Wo Meri Jaan Chahti Thi Aur Main Use Jaan Se Jyada!

Ajeeb Daastaan Hain Is Chhote Se Dil Ki,
Marammat Bhi Hum Karen, Sudharein Bhi Hum Magar Tod Koi Aur Deta Hai!

Kya Haseen Ittefaq Tha Teri Gali Mein Aane Ka,
Kisi Kaam Se Aaye The, Kisi Kaam Ke Nahi Rahe!

Kuch Aise Ho Gaye Hain Is Daur Ke Rishte,
Jo Awaaz Tum Na Do To Bolte Wo Bhi Nahi!

Kasoor Nahi Is Mein Koi Unka,
Meri Chahat Hi Itni Thi Ki Unko Guroor Aa Geya!

Kyon Hum Ko Sunate Ho Jahannum Ke Fasane,
Is Daur Mein Jeene Ki Saza Kam To Nahi Hai!

Sajde Mein Guzaar Dun Apni Saari Zindagi,
Ek Baar Wo Kahe Ki Mujhe Duaon Mein Maang Lo!

Ye Rishte Bhi Kitne Azeeb Hote Hain,
Bina Yakeen Ke Shuru Nahi Hote Aur Bina Dhokhe Ke Khatam Nahi Hote!

Dil Behelta Rahe Jo Qaatil Ka,
Roz Marna Qubool Hai Mujh Ko!

Gurur Bahut Tha Mujhe, Tumhein Apni Mohabbat Bana Kar;
Par Shayad Is Mohabbat Se Bhi Upar Apno Ke Ehsaan Ne Ye Gurur Thamne Na Diya!

Tera Nazariya Mere Nazariye Se Alag Tha Kyonki,
Tumne Waqt Guzara Tha Aur Maine Zindagi!

Ajeeb Zulm Hue Hain Mohabbat Par Yaaro;
Jinhe Mili Unhein Kadar Nahi Jinhe Kadar Thi Unhein Mili Nahi!

Hairat Se Na Dekh Mere Chehre Kee Dararein;
Main Waqt Ke Haathon Mein Khilone Kee Tarah Tha!

Maine Apni Har Ek Saans Tumhari Ghulam Kar Rakhi Hai,
Logon Mein Ye Zindagi Badnaam Kar Rakhi Hai,
Ab Ye Aaina Bhi Kis Kaam Ka Mere,
Maine To Apni Parchayi Bhi Tumhare Naam Kar Rakhi Hai!

Tamanna Thi Jo Kabhi Ab Hasrat Ban Gayi,
Kabhi Dosti Thi Ab Mohabbat Ban Gayi,
Kuch Is Tarha Shamil Hue Tum Zindagi Mein,
Tujhe Sochte Rehna Ab Meri Aadat Ban Gayi!

Tumne Bhi Humein Bas Ek Diye Ki Tarah Hi Samjha,
Raat Gehri Hui To Jala Dia, Subah Hui To Bujha Dia!

Pyaar Kiya To Badnaam Ho Gaye,
Charche Hamare Sar-E-Aam Ho Gaye;
Zaalim Ne Dil Bhi Usi Waqt Toda,
Jab Hum Uske Pyaar Ke Ghulam Ho Gaye!

Waqt Mile To Yaad Karte Ho, Dil Karta Hai To Baat Karte Ho,

Ek Zamana Tha Jab Hamare Bina Ek Pal Bhi Nahi Reh Sakte The,
Par Ab To Ek Zamane Ke Baad Sirf Pal Bhar Ke Liye Yaad Karte Ho!

Darta Hun Kehne Se Ki 
Mohabbat Hai Tumse,

Meri Zindagi Badal Dega, Tera 
Iqrar Bhi, Inkaar Bhi!

Aap Khush Ho To Hum Khush Hain,
Aap Hum Par Hak Jatate Raho To Hum Khush Hain,
Hum Yeh Nahi Kehte Ki Baat Karo Humse,
Bas Yun Hi Karte Raho To Hum Khush Hain!

Unke Chehre Pe Is Kadar Noor Tha Ki Unki Yaad Mein Rona Bhi Manzoor Tha,

Bewafa Hain Woh Ye Keh Bhi Nahi Sakta Tha 
Pyaar To Humne Kiya Us Mein Uska Kya Kasoor Tha!

Hanste Hanste Aksar Ro Padti Hain Yeh Nigahein,
Jab Jab Aata Hai Zehen Mein Khoya Hua Chehra Tera!

Dilon Ko Tod Ke Jaane Se Kya Haasil Hua Tumhein,
Maar Hi Dete To Yun Raat Ki Tanhai Mein Rona Na Padta!

Meri Bas Itni Si Khwahish Hai,
Ki Bas Ajnabi Raahon Mein Koi Apna Na Mil Jaye!

Rehta To Nasha Teri Yaadon Ka Hi Hai,
Koi Puche To Keh Deta Hun Ki Pi Rakhe Hain!

Guftgu Karte Rahiye Thodi Thodi Sabhi Doston Se,
Kyonki Aksar Jaale Lag Jaate Hain Band Makaano Mein!

Har Aarzoo Poori Ho To Jeene Ka Kya Maza,
Jeene Ke Liye Bas Ek Khoobsurat Wajah Ki Talaash Kar!

Mohabbat Ki Gawahi Apne Hone Ki Khabar Le Ja,
Jis Taraf Wo Shakhs Rehta Hai Mujhe Aye Dil Us Taraf Le Ja!

Kuch To Bewafayi Hai Mujh Mein Bhi,
Jo Ab Tak Zinda Hun Tere Bagair!

Dard Ka Ehsas Janna Hai To Pyaar Kar Ke Dekho,
Apni Aankhon Mein Kisi Ko Utaar Kar Dekho,
Chot Unko Lagegi Aansu Tumhein Aa Jayenge,
Ye Ehsas Janna Ho To Dil Haar Kar Dekho!

Ek Ajeeb Dastaan Hai Mere Afasane Ki,
Maine Pal Pal Koshish Ki Tere Paas Aane Ki,
Kismat Thi Meri Ya Sazish Samjho Zamaane Ki,
Door Hue Itna Jitni Ummeed Thi Kareeb Aane Ki!

Na Chaho Itna Humein Chahaton Se Darr Lagta Hai,
Na Aao Itna Kareeb Ki Judai Se Darr Lagta Hai,
Tumhari Wafaon Pe Bharosa To Bahut Hai,
Bas Apne Hi Naseeb Se Darr Lagta Hai!

Main Chahta Tha Wafa Unse, Unhone Humein Bhula Diya;
Isi Tadapte Gham Ne Yaaro, Mujhe Shayar Bana Diya!

Ajeeb Rangon Mein Guzri Hai Zindagi Hamari,
Dilon Par To Raaj Kiya Bas Mohabbat Ko Taras Gaye!

Na Jaane Kaisi Nazar Lagi Hai Zamaane Ki,
Ab To Koi Vajah Bhi Nahi Milti Muskurane Ki!

Dil Lagao To Judaa Hone Ki Himmat Bhi Rakhna,
Kyonki Zindagi Mein Taqdeer Ke Saath Saude Nahi Hote!

Tu Nahi To Ye Nazara Bhi Bura Lagta Hai,
Chaand Ke Paas Sitaara Bhi Bura Lagta Hai,
La Kar Jab Se Chodda Hai Tumne Bhanwar Mein Mujhko,
Mujhe Dariya Ka Kinara Bhi Bura Lagta Hai!

Woh Jo Guzarti Hai Hawaon Ki Tarah, Yaad Hai Teri;
Woh Jo Behti Hai Nadi Ki Tarah, Fariyad Hai Meri!

Faasla Nazron Ka Dhokha Bhi To Ho Sakta Hai,
Woh Mile Ya Na Mile Haath Badha Kar Dekho!

Main Tujh Ko Bhool Jane Ke Musalsal Marhale Mein Hun,
Magar Raftaar Madham Hai Mujhe Mehsoos Hota Hai!

Bichhad Ke Us Se Pareshan Bahut Hun Main,
Suna Hai Woh Bhi Badhi Uljhano Mein Rehte Hain!

Sach Hai Insan Ki Khwaish Ki Koi Hadh Nahi,


Meri Unginat Khwaishein Dekho 
Ek Tum Bas Tum Sirf Tum!

Gehrayi Pyaar Mein Ho To Bewafai Nahi Hoti,
Sachhe Pyaar Mein Kabhi Tanhai Nahi Hoti,
Pyaar Zara Sambhal Ke Karna,
Pyaar Ke Zakhm Ki Koi Dawai Nahi Hoti!

Ek Ajeeb Dastan Hai Mere Afasane Ki,
Maine Pal Pal Koshish Ki Tere Pas Aane Ki,
Kismat Thi Meri Ya Sazish Zamane Ki,
Door Hue Itna Jitni Ummeed Thi Kareeb Aane Ki!

Na Chaho Itna Hume, Chahaton Se Dar Lagta Hai,
Na Aao Itna Kareeb, Judai Se Dar Lagta Hai,
Tumhari Wafaon Pe Bharosa To Hai,
Magar Apne Naseeb Se Dar Lagta Hai!

Tum Aankhon Ki Baat Karte Ho Janab,
Hamare To Lafz Bheegh Gaye Kisi Ki Yaad Mein!

Manayega Nahi JaB Koi Tumhein Rooth Jaane Ke Baad,
To Apna Roothna Aur Mera Manana Bahut Yaad Aayega!

Muskurahtein Jhoothi Bhi Hua Karti Hain,
Dekhna Nahi Inhe Samjhna Seekho!

Hum To Likh Dete Hain Jo Bhi Dil Mein Aata Hai Hamare,
Agar Chu Jaye Kabhi Aapke Dil Ko To Bas Itefaq Samjhaiye!

Tera Naam Tha Aaj Kisi Ajnabi Ki Zubaan Pe,
Baat To Zara Si Thi Par Dil Ne Bura Maan Liya!

Uski Yeh Masoom Ada Mujhe Bahut Bhaati Hai,
Wo Naraaz Mujhse Hoti Hai Aur Gussa Sabko Dikhati Hai!

Labon Se Kuch Kehte Ho, Aankhon Se Kuch Aur;
Kabhi Dil Se Kuch Kaho To Hum Apni Baat Kare!

Ek Tera Muskurata Chehra Dekh Hum Zindagi Jee Lete Hain,
Kabhi Khafa Mat Hona Humse Kyonki Teri Har Muskurahat Se Hum Apna Dard Bhula Dete Hain!

Tu Kal Ki Tarah Aaj Nahi Saath To Kya Hua,
Kaise Batayein Tujhe Ki Mohabbat To Hum Teri Dooriyon Se Bhi Karte Hain!

Jab Se Use Azeez Hui Meri Zindagi,
Main Apni Zindagi Ki Dua Maangne Lagi Hun!

Bahut Judaa Hai Auron Se Mere Dard Ki Kaifiyat,
Zakhm Ka Koi Nishaan Nahi Aur Taklif Ki Inteha Nahi!

Afsos Toh Hai Tumhare Dil Ke Badal Jaane Ka,
Magar Tumhari Kuch Baaton Ne Jeene Ka Salika Sikha Diya!

Mat Kar Koshish Mere Dard Ko Samjhne Ki,
Tu Pehle Ishq Kar, Chot Kha Phir Dawa Likh Mere Dard Ki!

Badi Ajeeb Kashmakash Hai Unke Intezaar Mein,
Aankhein Khuli Rakhun Ya Band Kar Lun Khwabon Mein Milne Ke Liye!

Samjha Do Tum Apni Yaadon Ko Zara,
Waqt-Bewaqt Tang Karti Hain Mujhe Karzdaar Ki Tarah!

Tumhari Khusboo Se Mehakti Hain Wo Ghazal Bhi,
Jis Mein Likhta Hun Main Ki Tumhein Bhool Geya Hun!

Loot Lete Hain Apne Hi Yahan,
Varna Gairon Ko Kya Pata Is Dil Ki Deewar Kamzor Kahan Se Hai!

Kisi Ko Itna Na Chaho Ki Bhula Na Sako,
Yahan Mizaz Badalte Hain Mausam Kee Tarha!

Tarasha Hai Unko Badi Fursat Se,
Zulfein Jo Unki Badaal Ki Yaad Dila Den;
Nazar Bhar Dekh Le Jo Wo Kisi Ko,
Kisi Nekdil Insaan Ki Bhi Niyat Bigad Jaye!

Kaash Aisa Ho Ki Tumko Tumse Chura Lun,
Waqt Ko Rok Kar Waqt Se Ek Din Chura Lun,
Tum Paas Ho To Is Raat Se Ek Raat Chura Lun,
Tum Saath Ho To Is Jahan Se Ye Jahan Chura Lun!

Dil Toota To Ek Aawaz Aayi,
Cheer Ke Dekha To Kuch Cheez Nikal Aayi,
Socha Kya Hoga Is Khali Dil Mein,
Lahu Se Dho Kar Dekha To Teri Tasvir Nikal Aayi!

Nahi Aati To Unki Yaad Mahino Tak Nahi Aati;
Magar Jab Yaad Aate Hain, To Aksar Yaad Aate Hain!

Idhar Falak Ko Hai Zidd Bijliyan Girane Kee,
Udhar Humein Bhi Hai Dhun Aashiyan Banane Kee!

Uske Saath Hone Tak Hi Mehsoos Hui Zindagi,
Na Uske Aane Se Pehle Na Uske Jaane Ke Baad

Zindagi Yun Hi Bahut Kam Hai Mohabbat Ke Liye;
Rooth Kar Aise Yun Waqt Zaaya Na Kiya Karo!

Yeh Dil Hi Jaanta Hai Meri Paak Mohabbat Ka Aalam;
Ki Mujhe Jeene Ke Liye Saanso Kee Nahi Teri Zaroorat Hai!

Dilon Se Khelna Humein Bhi Aata Hai Magar,
Jis Khel Mein Khilona Toot Jaye Wo Khel Humein Pasand Nahi!

Guzar Rahi Hai Zindagi Bas,
Kuch Imtihan Mein Aur Kuch Intezar Mein!

Bewafaon Ki Is Duniya Mein Zara Sambhal Kar Chalna Ai Dost,
Yahan Barbad Karne Ke Liye Mohabbat Ka Sahara Lete Hain Log!

Gham Hun, Dard Hun, Saaz Hun, Ya Aawaz Hun;
Bas Jo Bhi Hun Main Tum Bin Bahut Udaas Hun!

Zindagi Yun Hi Bahut Kam Hai Mohabbat Ke Liye;
Ruth Kar Aise Yun Waqt Zaaya Na Kiya Karo!

Bikta Hai Gham Hansi Ke Bazaar Mein,
Lakho Dard Chupe Hote Hain Ek Chote Se Inkaar Mein,
Wo Kya Samajh Payenge Pyaar Ki Kashish Ko,
Jinhone Fark Hi Nahi Samjha Pasand Aur Pyaar Mein!

Chali Aati Hai Teri Yaad Mere Zehen Mein Aksar,
Tujhe Ho Na Ho Teri Yaadon Ko Zaroor Mujhse Mohabbat Hai!

Bikhre Hue Tukde Chunkar Teri Yaadon Ke,
Beete Lamho Ki Tasveer Banata Hun,
Har Khushi Apni Tere Naam Likh Ke,
Tere Dukhon Ko Apni Taqdeer Banata Hun!

Roz Raat Ko Likhun Yeh Mumkin Nahin,
Kabhi-Kabhi Lafz Bhi To Soya Karte Hain!

Nazare To Badlenge Hi Ye To Kudrat Hai,
Afsos To Humein Tere Badalne Ka Hua Hai!

Aaj Koi Shayari Nahi Bas Itna Sun Lo,
Main Tanha hun Aur Vajah Tum Ho!

Zindagi Tujhse Har Kadam Par Samjhauta Kyon Kiya Jaye,
Shaunk Jeene Ka Hai Magar Itna Bhi Nahi Ki, Mar-Mar Ke Jiya Jaye.
Jab Jalebi Ki Tarah Uljh Hi Rahi Hai Tu Ai Zindagi,
Toh Fir Kyon Na Tujhe Chashni Mein Dubo Kar Maza Hi Le Liya Jaye!

Mile Agar Mera Humdum To Use Sirf Itna Keh Dena;
Bina Teri Mohabbat Ke Woh Pagal Jee Nahi Sakta!

Na Aah Sunayi Di Na Tadap Dikhai Di;
Fana Ho Gaye Tere Ishq Mein Badi Khamoshi Ke Saath!

Kabhi Tanhayi, Kabhi Tadap, Kabhi Bebasi To Kabhi Intezar;
Ye Marz Bhi Kya Khoob Hai Jise Sab Log Ishq Kehte Hai!

Tum Agar Yaad Rakhoge To Inayat Hogi,
Varna Hum Ko Kahan Tum Se Shikayat Hogi,
Ye To Bewafa Logon Ki Dunya Hai,
Tum Agar Bhool Bhi Jao To Riwayat Hogi!

Mana Ki Hum Galat The Jo Tujhse Mohabbat Kar Baithe,
Par Royega Ek Din Tu Bhi Aisi Wafa Kee Talaash Mein!

Yeh Mana Ke Mohabbat Karna Hai Jurm Magar,
Yeh Jurm Yaaro Baar Baar Karte Hain Hum,
Woh Bewafa Hai Sangdil Hain Jaante Hain Magar,
Unpar Yaaro Aaj Bhi Aitbaar Karte Hain Hum!

Yuhi Aankhon Se Aansu Behte Nahi,
Kisi Aur Ko Hum Apna Kehte Nahi,
Ek Tum Hi Ho Jo Ruk Se Gaye Ho Zindagi Mein,
Varna Rukne Ke Liye Hum Kisi Ko Kehte Nahi!

Zindagi Guzar Jaye Par Pyaar Kam Na Ho,
Yaad Humein Rakhna Chahe Paas Hum Na Ho,
Qayamat Tak Chalta Rahe Yeh Pyaar Ka Safar,
Dua Karo Rab Se Kabhi Yeh Rishta Khatam Na Ho!

Rakh Sako To Ek Nishani Hain Hum,
Bhul Jao Toh Ek Kahani Hain Hum,
Khushi Ki Dhoop Ho Ya Gham Ke Badal,
Dono Mein Jo Barse Woh Pani Hain Hum!

Bichhad Ke Tujh Se Na Dekha Geya Kisi Ka Milan,
Uda Diye Hain Parinde Bhi Hum Ne Shajjar Pe Baithe Hue!

Keh Deta Hun Vaise Mera Kehna Nahi Banta,
Is Dil Ke Ilawa Kahin Aur Tera Rehna Nahi Banta!

Kisi Ka Ishq Kisi Ka Khyaal The Hum Bhi,
Gaye Dino Mein Bahut Ba-Kamaal The Hum Bhi!

Karein Kis Ka Yakeen Yahan Sab Adakaar Hi To Hain,
Gila Bhi Karein To Kis Se Yahan Sab Apne Yaar Hi To Hain!

Teri Mehfil Se Uthe To Kisi Ko Khabar Tak Na Thi,
Tera Mud-Mud Ke Dekhna Humein Badnaam Kar Geya!

Waqt Wahi Khada Raha, Sadak Aage Nikal Gayi;
Koi Zidd Pe Ada Raha, Kisi Ki Jaan Nikal Gayi!

Kise Sunayein Apne Gham Ke Chand Pannon Ke Qisse,
Yahan To Har Shakhs Bhari Kitaab Liye Baitha Hai!

Agar Teri Nazar Qatal Karne Mein Hai Maahir To Sun,
Hum Bhi Mar-Mar Kar Jeene Mein Ustaad Ho Gaye Hain!

Parwane Ko Shama Par Jal Kar Kuch To Milta Hoga,
Sirf Marne Ki Khatir To Koi Pyaar Nahi Karta!

Kuchh Ajab Haal Hai In Dino Tabiyat Ka Sahab,

Khushi, Khushi Na Lage Aur Gham Bura Na Lage!

Jinki Aankhein Aansuon Se Nam Nahi,
Kya Samjhte Ho Use Koi Gham Nahi,
Tum Tadap Kar Ro Diye To Kya Hua,
Gham Chhupa Ke Hasne Wale Bhi Kam Nahi!

Mere Saath Wo Rahega To Zamana Kya Kahega,
Meri Ek Yehi Tamanna, Tera Ek Yehi Bahaana!

Usne Toda Tha Mera Dil Us Se Koi Shikayat Nahi,
Ye Usi Ki Amanat Thi Usko Achha Laga So Tod Diya!

Samet Kar Le Jao Apne Jhoothe Vaadon Ke Adhure Qisse,
Agli Mohabbat Mein Tumhein Phir Inki Zaroorat Padegi!

Wo Saath The To Ek Lafz Na Nikla Labon Se,
Door Kya Hue Kalam Ne Qahar Macha Diya!

Kehne Ko Wo Mere Kareeb Hai Bahut Lekin,
Faanslein Ab Tak Hamare Darmiyan Hain Bahut!

Jeene Ki Khwaish Mein Har Roz Marte Hain,
Wo Aaye Na Aaye Hum Intezar Karte Hain,
Jutha Hi Sahi Mere Yaar Ka Vaada Hai,
Hum Sach Maankar Aitbar Karte Hain!

Jo Aag Lagayi Thi Tum Ne Us Ko To Bujhaya Ashkon Ne;
Jo Ashkon Ne Bhadkayi Hai Us Aag Ko Thanda Kaun Kare!

Dard-e-Dil Kee Aah Tum Na Samajhoge Kabhi;
Har Dard Ka Maatam Sar-e-Aam Nahi Hota!

Dilasa Dete Hain Log, Ki Yun Har Waqt Na Roya Karo;
Main Kaise Bataun Ki Kuch Dard Sehne Ke Kabil Nahi Hote!

Koi Ankhon Se Baat Kar Leta Hai,
Koi Ankhon Mein Mulakat Kar Leta Hai,
Bada Mushkil Hota Hai Jawab Dena,
Jab Koi Khamosh Rehkar Sawaal Kar Leta Hai!

Ruthkar Baith Na Jana Humko Manane Wale,
Raah Khud Bhul Na Jana Raah Dikhane Wale,
Aapke Aangan Mein Barse Khushi Ke Baadal,
Yahi Dua Karte Hai Hum Ashk Bahane Wale!

Kaise Bhula Dun Main Uski Yaadon Ko,
Maut Insanon Ko Aati Hai, Yaadon Ko Nahi!

Mausam Ki Misaal Du Ya Tumhari,
Koi Puch Raha Hai Ki Badalna Kisko Kehte Hain!

Log Kehte Hain Ki Pyaar Ek Aisi Bimari Hai,
Jiski Koi Dawa Nahi Hoti;
Hum Kehte Hain Bewafai Ek Aisi Dawa Hai,
Jisse Ye Bimari Phir Dobara Nahi Hoti!

Taraste The Jo Humse Milne Ko Kabhi,
Na Jaane Kyon Aaj Humare Saye Se Bhi Katrate Hain,
Hum Bhi Wahi Hain Yeh Dil Bhi Wahi Hai,
Na Jaane Phir Kyon Humein Dekh Wo Raasta Badal Jaate Hain!

Lutf-E-Mai Tujhse Kya Kahun Zaahid,
Haye Kambakht Tum Ne Pi Hi Nahi!

Seekh Jao Waqt Par Kisi Ki Chahat Ki Qadar Karna,
Kahin Koi Thak Na Jaye Tumhe Ehsaas Dilate Dilate!

Is Kadar Hum Yaar Ko Manane Nikle,
Uski Chahat Ke Hum Deewane Nikle,
Jab Bhi Use Dil Ka Haal Batana Chaha,
Toh Uske Hothon Se Waqt Na Hone Ke Bahane Nikle!

Abhi Suraj Nahi Dooba Zara Si Shaam Hone Do,
Main Khud Laut Jaunga Mujhe Nakaam Hone Do,
Mujhe Badnaam Karne Ka Bahana Dhoondhte Ho Kyon,
Main Khud Ho Jaunga Badnaam Pehle Naam To Hone Do!

Usne Kaha Tha Aankhen Bhar Ke Dekha Kar Mujhe,
Yaaron Ab Aankhen To Bhar Aati Hai Par Vo Nahi Dekhte!

Raat Shama Bujha Ke Bahut Der Tak Mehfil Sajai Humne,
Main Apne Dil Ke Liye Rota Raha Aur Yeh Dil Tere Liye!

Jab Tak Bika Na Tha To Koi Poochta Na Tha,
Tune Mujhe Khareed Ke Anmol Kar Diya!

Ho Chuki Mulakaat Abhi Salaam Baaki Hai,
Tumhare Naam Ki Do Ghoont Sharaab Baki Hai,
Tumko Mubarak Ho Khushiyon Ka Shamiyana,
Mere Naseeb Mein Abhi Do Gaz Zameen Baki Hai!

Ajnabi Rehna Hi Theek Hai Is Duniya Mein,
Bahut Taklif Dete Hain Log Aksar Apna Bana Kar!

Hamari Rooh Mein Na Samaye Hote To Bhool Jate Tumhe,
Itna Kareeb Na Aaye Hote To Bhool Jate Tumhe,
Ye Kehte Hue Ki Mera Talluq Nahi Tumse Koi,
Aankhon Mein Aansu Na Aaye Hote To Bhool Jate Tumhe!

Tamana Hai Meri Ki Aapki Aarzoo Ban Jau,
Aapki Aankh Ka Tara Na Sahi Aapki Aankh Ka Aansu Ban Jau,
Main Aap Ki Zindagi Ki Khushi Banu Ya Na Ban Saku,
Aapke Gham Mein Aapka Sahara Ban Jau!

Zara Palat Kar To Dekh Lete Hum Wahi Khade The,
Pal Do Pal To Aap Muskura Lete To Un Palo Mein Hum Apni Saari Zindagi Guzar Lete!

Afsurda Hun Ibrat Se Dawa Ki Nahi Hajat,
Gham Ka Mujhe Ye Zof Hai Bimaar Nahi Hun!

Door Jakar Bhi Hum Door Jaa Na Sakenge,

Kitna Royenge Hum Bata Na Sakenge,

Gham Iska Nahi Ki Aap Mil Na Sakoge,

Dard Is Baat Ka Hoga Ki Hum Aapko Bhula Na Sakenge!

Tu Agar Gulshan Mein Hai To Veerane Mein Kaun Hai,

Tu Agar Shamma Mein Jalta Hai To Parwaane Mein Kaun Hai!

Adaa Hai, Khwaab Hai, Taskeen Hai, Tamasha Hai;

Meri Aankhon Mein Ek Shakhs Be-Tahasha Hai!

Ek Dhokhe Se Bhi Hil Jaati Hai Zameen Aitbaar Ki,
Zaroori To Nahi Bhukamp Aaye Har Baar!

Kehte The Hum Dono Ki Reh Nahi Sakte Tumhare Bina,
Bas Hum Dono Hi Reh Gaye Magar Wo Vaada Na Raha!

Nafraton Ke Bazaar Mein Jeene Ka Alag Hi Maza Hai,

Log Rulana Nahi Chhodte Aur Hum Muskurana Nahi Chhodte!

Koi Nahi Hota Hamesha Ke Liye Kisi Ka,

Likha Hai Sath Thoda Thoda Sabhi Ka,


Mat Banao Kisi Ko Apne Jeene Ki Wajah,

Kyonki Jeena Hai Akele Yehi Usool Hai Zindgi Ka!

Ya Rabb Mujhe Mehfooz Rakh Us But Ke Sitam Se,
Main Us Ki Inayat Ka Talabgaar Nahi Hun!

Roz Aata Hai Mere Dil Ko Tasalli Dene,
Khyal-e-Yaar Ko Mera Khyal Kitna Hai!

Sukun Milta Hai Jab Unse Baat Hoti Hai,
Hazar Raaton Mein Wo Ek Raat Hoti Hai,

Nigah Uthakar Jab Dekhte Hain Wo Meri Taraf,
Mere Liye Wohi Pal Poori Kaaynat Hoti Hai!

Unke Hontho Pe Mera Naam Jab Aaya Hoga,
Khud Ko Ruswayi Se Phir Kaise Bachaya Hoga,
Sun Ke Fasana Auro Se Meri Barbadi Ka,
Kya Unko Apna Sitam Na Yaad Aaya Hoga!

Jhooth Kehte Hain Log Ki Mohabbat Sab Kuch Cheen Leti Hai,
Maine To Mohabbat Karke Gham Ka Khazana Pa Liya!

Ek Muddat Mein Parakhne Ka Shuur Aata Hai,
Bewafa Keh Dun Unhen Pehli Nazar Mein Kaise!

Ulfat Ka Yeh Dastoor Hota Hai,
Jise Chaho Wahi Humse Door Hota Hai,
Dil Toot Kar Bikharta Hai Is Kadar Jaise,
Kaanch Ka Khilona Girke Choor Choor Hota Hai!

Kitne Majboor Hain Hum Taqdeer Ke Haathon,
Na Tumhe Paane Ki Aukat Rakhte Hain Na Tumhe Khone Ka Honsla!

Ai Dil Thodi Si Himmat To Kar Na Yaar,
Chalo Dono Mil Kar Use Bhool Jaate Hain!

Har Bhool Teri Maaf Ki Har Khata Teri Ko Bhula Diya,
Gham Bas Is Baat Ka Hai Ki Mere Pyaar Ka Tune Bewafa Ban Ke Sila Diya!

Ishq-e-Bewafai Ne Daal Di Hai Aadat Buri,
Main Bhi Sharif Hua Karta Tha Is Zamane Mein,
Pehle Din Shuru Karta Tha Masjid Mein Namaz Se,
Ab Dhalti Hai Sham Sharaab Ke Sath Maikhane Mein!

Marne Ke Naam Se Jo Hothon Pe Rakhte The Ungliyan,
Afsos Wahi Log Mere Dil Ke Qatil Nikle!

Taklif Mit Gayi Magar Ehsaas Reh Geya,
Khush Hun Main Bas Is Baat Se Ki Chalo Kuch To Mere Paas Reh Geya!

Tazurba Kehta Hai Ki Mohabbat Se Kinara Kar Lu,
Aur Dil Kehta Hai Ki Yeh Tazurba Dobara Kar Lu!

Chhod Di Khwahishe Saari Jo Tujhe Pasand Na Thi,
Tum Na Mile To Kya Hua Teri Khwahish To Aaj Bhi Poori Karte Hain!

Gunah To Bahut Hue Humse Zindagi Mein,
Shukar Raha Khuda Ka Ki Mohabbat Nahi Hui!

Kishton Mein Khudkushi Kar Rahi Hai Zindagi,
Ek Intezar Tera, Mujhe Poora Marne Bhi Nahi Deta!

Humne To Ek Muddat Se Sona Hi Chhod Diya Ek Darr Se,
Ki Khwab Mein Bhi Jo Bichhade To Haqeeqat Mein Mar Jayenge!

Ro Ro Kar Dhoonda Karoge Ek Din Mere Jaise Tang Karne Wale Ko,
Chale Jayenge Hum Ek Din, Kisi Khoobsurat Kafan Ka Naseeb Ban Kar!

Juda Ho Kar Bhi Jee Rahe Hain Muddat Se,
Kabhi Dono Kehte The Ki Yeh Judai Maar Dalegi!

Tu Nahi To Ye Nazara Bhi Bur Lagta Hai,
Chaand Ke Paas Sitaara Bhi Bura Lagta Hai,
La Ke Jis Roz Se Chhoda Hai Tumne Bhanwar Mein Mujhko,
Mujhko Dariya Ka Kinara Bhi Bura Lagta Hai!

Kagzon Pe Likh Kar Zaya Kar Dun, Main Woh Shakhs Nahi,
Wo Shayar Hun Main Jise Dilon Pe Likhne Ka Hunar Aata Hai!

Pyaar Dariya Hai Jiska Sahil Nahi Hota,
Har Dil Mohabbat Ke Kabil Nahi Hota,
Rota Wo Bhi Hai Jo Dooba Hai Pyaar Mein,
Aur Rota Wo Bhi Hai Jise Pyaar Hasil Nahi Hota!

Talash Kar Meri Kami Ko Apne Dil Me Aey Zaalim,
Dard Ho To Samjh Lena Mohabbat Ab Bhi Baaki Hai!

Tere Siwa Koi Mere Jazbaat Mein Nahi,
Aankhon Mein Wo Nami Hai Jo Barsat Mein Nahi,
Paane Ki Tujhe Koshish Bahut Ki Magar,
Tu Ek Lakeer Hai Jo Mere Haath Mein Nahi!

Hamari Rooh Main Na Samaye Hote To Bhool Jate Tumhe,
Itna Kareeb Na Aaye Hote To Bhool Jate Tumhe,
Ye Kehte Hue Ki Mera Talluq Nahin Tumse Koi,
Ankhon Main Aansu Na Aaye Hote To Bhul Jate Tumhe!

Main Aur Bazm-E-Mai Se Yun Tishna-Kaam Aaun,
Gar Maine Kee Thi Tauba Saaqi Ko Kyaa Hua Tha!

Pehle Ishq, Phir Dard, Phir Behad Nafrat;
Badi Tarkib Se Tabah Kiya Tumne Mujhko!

Naya Dard Ek Aur Dil Mein Jaga Kar Chala Geya,
Kal Phir Woh Mere Shehar Mein Aakar Chala Geya,
Jise Dhoondta Raha Main Logon Kee Bheed Mein,
Mujh Se Woh Apna Aap Chhupa Kar Chala Geya!

Woh Mil Geya To Bichhadna Padega Phir 'Zarrin',
Isi Khayal Se Hum Raaste Badalte Rahe!

Tere Rone Se Unhe Koi Fark Nahi Padta Aye Dil,
Jinke Chahne Wale Zayada Ho Wo Aksar Be-Dard Hua Karte Hain!

Chale Bhi Aao Ki Hum Tumse Pyaar Karte Hain,
Ye Wo Gunah Hai Jo Hum Baar-Baar Karte Hain,
Log Maut Tak Takte Hain Raah Dildaar Ki,
Hum Hain Ki Qabar Mein Bhi Tera Intezar Karte Hain!

Kis Qadar Mushkil Hai Yeh Zindagi Ka Safar,

Khuda Ne Marna Haram Kiya Logon Ne Jeena!

Mujhe Mangne Ka Saleeqa Nahi Hai,
Woh Dene Ki Har  Ada Janta Hai!

Bass Tumhe Paane Ki Tamanna Nahi Rahi Ab,
Pyaar Toh Hum Aaj Bhi Beshumaar Karte Hain!

Dil Juda Hon To Mulaqaat Se Phir Kya Haasil, 
Yun To Sehra Bhi Samandar Se Mila Karte Hain!

Dil Ki Khamoshi Se Saanson Ke Thaher Jane Tak,
Yaad Aayega Mujhe Wo Shakhs Mar Jane Tak!

Hamare Halaat Se Na Lagao Andaza Hamare Wajud Ka,
Hum Woh Khamosh Samandar Hain Jiske Pehlu Mein Toofan Palte Hain!

Pyaar Karke Jataye Ye Zaroori To Nahi,
Yaad Karke Koi Bataye Ye Zaroori To Nahi,
Rone Wala To Dil Mein Hi Ro Leta Hai,
Aankh Mein Aansu Aaye Ye Zaroori To Nahi!

Dekha Tujko Jab Se Hai Ye Bat Is Dil Mein Tab Se,
Mil Jaye Mujko Pyaar Jo Tera Fir Na Kuch Mangana Hai Rab Se!

Jab Suraj Dhalta Hai To Aasman Ka Rang Badal Jata Hai,
Jab Kismat Badalti Hai To Logo Ka Dhang Badal Jata Hai,
Din Dhalte-Dhalte Suraj Bhi Dhal Jata Hai,
Andhera Hote-Hote Saya Bhi Saath Chod Jata Hai!

Unke Husn Ka Aalam Na Puchiye,
Bas Tasveer Ho Gaya Hun Tasveer Dekh Kar!

Mehfil Main Hansna Mera Mizaz Ban Gaya,
Tanhai Main Rona Ek Raaz Ban Gaya,
Dil Ke Dard Ko Chehre Se Zahir Na Hone Diya,
Yahi Mere Jeene Ka Andaaz Ban Gaya!

Majburi Mein Jab Koi Juda Hota Hai,
Zaroori Nahi Ki Wo Bewafa Hota Hai,
De Kar Wo Aapki Aankhon Mein Aansu,
Akele Mein Aapse Bhi Zyada Rota Hai!

Aata Hai Yahan Sab Ko Bulandi Se Girana,
Wo Log Kahan Hain Ki Jo Girton Ko Uthaye!

Jalve Machal Pade To Sahar Ka Gumaan Hua,
Zulfein Bikhar Gayi To Siyaah Raat Ho Gayi!

Dil Ko Teri Chahat Pe Bharosa Bhi Bahut Hai,
Aur Tujh Se Bichhad Jaane Ka Darr Bhi Nahi Jaata!

Hum To Jal Gaye Uski Mohabbat Mein Moam Ki Tarah,
Agar Phir Bhi Koi Humein Bewafa Kahe To Uski Wafa Ko Salam!

Tumhari Har Ek Baat Bewafai Ki Kahani Hai,
Lekin Teri Har Saans Meri Zindagi Ki Nishani Hai,
Tum Aaj Tak Nahi Samajh Sake Mere Pyaar Ko,
Isliye Mere Aansu Bhi Tere Liye Paani Hain!

Dil Tootne Par Bhi Jo Shakhs Aap Se Shikayat Na Kar Sake,
Us Shakhs Se Zyada Mohabbat Aapko Aur Koi Kar Nahi Sakta!

Khwaish-e-Zindagi Bas Itni Si Hai Ab Meri,
Ki Saath Tera Ho Aur Zindagi Kabhi Khatam Na Ho!

Husn Walon Ko Kya Zaroorat Hai Sanwarne Ki,
Wo To Saadgi Mein Bhi Qayamat Ki Ada Rakhte Hain!

Lage Hain Ilzaam Dil Pe Jo Mujh Ko Rulate Hain,
Kisi Ki Berukhi Aur Kisi Aur Ko Satate Hain;
Dil Tod Ke Mera Wo Badi Asani Se Keh Gaye Alvida,
Lekin Halaat Mujhe Bewafa Thehraate Hain!

Chalo Hum Galat The Ye Maan Lete Han Ai Zindagi,
Par Ek Baat Bata Kya Woh Shakhs Sahi Tha Jo Badal Geya Itna Kareeb Aane Ke Baad!

Nahi Maangta Ai Khudaa Ki Zindagi Sau Saal Kee De,
De Bhale Chand Lamhon Kee Lekin Kamaal Kee De!

Insan Na To Kuch Hans Kar Seekhta Hai,
Na Kuch Ro Kar Seekhta Hai,
Jab Bhi Kuch Alag Seekhta Hai To,
Ya To Kisi Ka Ho Kar Seekhta Hai,
Ya Kisi Ko Kho Kar Seekhta Haui!

Diya Khamosh Hai Lekin Kisi Ka Dil To Jalta Hai,
Chale Aao Jahan Tak Roshni Maloom Hoti Hai!

Talaash Kar Meri Kami Ko Apne Dil Mein Ai Zaalim,
Dard Ho To Samjh Lena Mohabbat Ab Bhi Baaki Hai!

Har Baar Dil Se Ye Paigam Aaye, Zuban Kholu To Tera Hi Naam Aaye;
Tum Hi Kyon Bhaye Dil Ko Kya Maloom, Jab Nazron Ke Samne Haseen Tamam Aaye!

Ruthi Jo Zindagi To Mana Lenge Hum, Mile Jo Gham To Seh Lenge Hum;
Bus Aap Rehna Saath Hamare, Aansuon Mein Bhi Muskura Lenge Hum!

Kahin Wo Aa Ke Mita Na Den Na Intezar Ka Lutf,
Kahin Qubool Na Ho Jaye Iltija Meri!

Saari Duniya Rooth Jaane Se Mujhe Garaz Nahi,
Bas Tera Rooth Jaana Mujhe Takleef Deta Hai!

Itne Kahan Masroof Ho Gaye Ho Tum,
Ki Aaj-Kal Dil Dukhane Bhi Nahi Aate!

Is Duniya Mein Sab Kuch Bikta Hai,
Phir Judai Hi Rishwat Kyon Nahi Leti;
Marta Nahi Hai Koi Kisi Se Juda Hokar,
Bas Yaadein Hi Hain Jo Jeene Nahi Deti!

Hua Hai Tujhse Bichadne Ke Baad Ye Maloom,
Ki Tu Nahi Tha Tere Sath Ek Duniya Thi!

Kaash Yaadon Ka Matlab Wo Samajhte,
Kaash Khwabon Ka Matlab Wo Samajhte,
Nazar Milti Hai Hazaar Nazron Se,
Kash Hamari Nazar Ka Matlab Wo Samajhte!

Zara Palat Kar To Dekh Lete, Hum Wahi Khade The;
Pal Do Pal To Aap Muskura Lete, To Un Palo Mein Hum Apni Saari Zindagi Guzar Lete!

Tamanna Hai Meri Ki Aapki Aarzu Ban Jaun,
Aapki Aankh Ka Tara Na Sahi Aapki Aankh Ka Aansu Ban Jaun,
Main Aap Ki Zindagi Kee Khushi Banu Ya Na Ban Saku,
Aapke Gham Mein Aapka Sahara Ban Jaun!

Pahle Is Mein Ik Adaa Thi Naaz Tha Andaaz Tha,
Roothna Ab To Teri Aadat Mein Shaamil Ho Geya!

Zikr Tera Hai, Ya Koi Nasha Hai;
Jab-Jab Hota Hai, Dil Behak Jaata Hai!

Ye Yaad Hai Tumhari Ya Yaadon Mein Tum Ho,
Ye Khwab Hain Tumhare Ya Khwabon Mein Tum Ho,
Hum Nahi Jaante Humein Bas Itna Bata Do,
Hum Jaan Hain Tumhari Ya Hamari Jaan Tum Ho!

Jaati Nahi Aankhon Se Surat Teri,
Na Jaati Hai Dil Se Mohabbat Teri,
Tere Jaane Ke Baad Hota Hai Mehsoos Yun,
Humein Aur Bhi Jyada Hai Zaroorat Teri!

Isi Ko Kehte Hain Jannat Isi Ko Dozakh Bhi,
Woh Zindagi Jo Haseeno Ke Darmiyan Guzre!

Teri Mehfil Se Dil Kuch Aur Tanha Hoke Lauta Hai,
Ye Lene Kya Geya Tha Aur Kya Ghar Leke Aaya Hai!

Tere Khilte Chehre Se Hatti Nahi Nigahein Meri,
Bahut Nazdeek Se Tere Labon Ko Khil Khilate Dekha Hai!

Ab Bhi Chale Aate Hain Khayalon Mein Woh,
Roz Lagti Hai Haziri Us Gair Hazir Ki!

Kissi Harf Main Kisi Baab Mein Nahi Aaye Ga,
Tera Zikar Meri Kitab Mein Nahi Aaye Ga!

Ek Ajeeb Sa Rishta Hai Mere Aur Khwahishon Ke Darmiyan,
Wo Mujhe Jeene Nahi Deti Aur Main Unhe Marne Nahi Deta!

Doobi Hain Meri Ungliyan Mere Hi Khoon Mein,
Ye Kaanch Ke Tukdon Par Bharose Ki Saza Hai!

Dard Ka Ehsaas Jaanna Hai To Pyaar Kar Ke Dekho,
Apni Aankho Mein Kisi Ko Utar Kar Dekho,
Chot Unko Lagegi Aansu Tumhe Aa Jayege,
Ye Ehsaas Jaanna Ho To Dil Haar Kar Dekho!

Apni Tanhayi Mere Naam Pe Abaad Kare,
Kaun Ho Ga Jo Mujhe Uss Ki Tarah Yaad Kare,

Dil Ajab Sheher Ke Jis Pr Bhi Khula Dar Us Ka,
Woh Musaafir Isse Har Samt Se Barbaad Kare,

Apne Qaatil Ki Zehaanat Se Pareshaan Hoon Main,
Roz Ik Maut Naye Tarzz Ki Ijaad Kare,

Itna Hairaan Ho Meri Be-Talabbi Ke Aagey,
Waa Qaffass Main Koi Dar Khud Mera Sayaad Kare,

Salb-E-Binaayi Ke Ehkaam Mile Hain Jo Kabhi,
Roshni Chhuune Ki Khawhish Koi Shab-Zaad Kare,

Soch Rakhnaa Bhi Jaraayem Main Hai Shaamil Ab To,
Wohi Maasoom Hai Har Baat Pe Jo Saad Kare,

Jab Lahuu Bol Parre Us Ke Gavaahon Ke Khilaaf,
Qaazi-E-Sheher Kuch Is Baab Main Irshaad Kare,

Uss Ki Muthi Main Bohat Roz Raha Mera Wajood,
Mere Saahir Se Kaho Ab Mujhe Aazaad Kare!

Phool Allah Ne Banaye Hain Mehkane Ke Liye,
Aur Bulbul Ko Banaya Hai Chehakne Ke Liye,
Aish-e-Gham Se Banaya Hai Mere Seene Mein,
Dil Ko Angare Kee Manind Dehkane Ke Liye!

Aaina Dekh Ke Kehte Hain Sanwarne Waale,
Aaj Be-Maut Maren Ge Mere Marne Waale!

Ajnabi Ban Ke Miloon Ga Main Tujhe Mehfil Mein,
Tu Ne Chedi Bhi To Main Baat Badal Jaaon Ga!

Bulaya Maut Ko Barson Maine Iltijaa Kar Ke,
Khuda Ke Paas Chala Hun Khuda Khuda Kar Ke!

Dekh To Dil Ki Jaan Se Uthta Hai,
Ye Dhuan Sa Kahan Se Uthta Hai!

Rehna Yun Tere Khyalon Mein Yeh Meri Aadat Hai,
Koi Kehta Ishq Hai Koi Kehta Ibadat Hai Yeh!

Do Chaar Lafz Keh Kar Khamosh Ho Geya Main,
Wo Muskura Ke Boli Bahut Bolte Ho Tum!

Samajh Na Aaye Ai Zindagi Tera Yeh Faisla,
Ek Taraf Kehte Hain Sabar Ka Phal Meetha Hota Hai,
Aur Dusri Taraf Kehte Hain Waqt Kisi Ka Intezar Nahi Karta!

Teri Wafaa Se Kya Ho Talafi Ki Dahar Mein,
Tere Siwa Bhi Hum Pe Bahut Se Sitam Hue!

Tujhe Paane Kee Chahat Itni Badh Gayi Ki Apno Kee Mohabbat Bhool Geya,
Inkaar Karke Bada Gunaah Kiya Tune Main Meri Sharafat Bhool Geya!

Din Mein Kaam Nahi Sone Deta,
Raat Mein Ek Naam Nahi Sone Deta!

Abhi Raat Hai Baaki Naa Utha Naqaab Saaki,
Tera Rind Girte Girte Kahin Phir Sambhal Na Jayein!

Kaam Aa Sakin Na Apni Wafayein To Kya Karen,
Us Bewafa Ko Bhool Na Jayein To Kya Karen!

Kuch Itne Diye Hasrat-e-Didar Ne Dhokhe,
Wo Samne Baithe Hain Yakeen Hum Ko Nahi Hai!

Bin Tumhare Main Jee Geya Ab Tak,
Tumko Kya Khud Mujhe Yakeen Nahi!

Dil Bhi Toda To Salike Se Na Toda Tumne,
Bewafai Ke Bhi Aadab Hua Karte Hain!

Phir Apne Aap Pe Us Ko Hijab Aata Hai,
Thirkati Jheel Pe Jab Mahtab Aata Hai,
Dikhaiye Na Humein Aap Mausami Aansu,
Ki Ye Hunar To Humein Be-Hisab Aata Hai!

Kayi Baar Bina Galti Ke Bhi Galti Maan Lete Hain Hum,
Kyonki Darr Lagta Hai Kahin Koi Apna Humse Rooth Na Jaye!

Kar De Apne Ishq Mein Madhosh Is Tarah Ki,
Hosh Bhi Aane Se Pehle Izazat Maange!

Ai Maut Aa Kar Humko Khamosh To Kar Gayi Tu,
Magar Sadiyon Dilon Ke Andar Hum Gunjte Rahenge!

Ab To Daman-e-Dil Chhod Do Bekaar Umeedo,
Bahut Dukh Seh Liye Maine Bahut Din Jee Liya Maine!

Jo Roshni Mein Khade Hain Woh Jaante Hi Nahin,
Hawaa Chale To Chiraghon Kee Zindagi Kya Hai!

Tumhare Shehar Ka Mausam Bada Suhana Lage,
Main Ek Shaam Chura Lun Agar Bura Na Lage!

Mohabbat Main Karne Laga Hun, Uljhano Mein Jeene Laga Hun;
Deewana To Main Tha Nahi Lekin, Tera Deewana Banne Laga Hun!

Hua Hai Chaar Sajdon Par Ye Dava Zahidon Tum Ko,
Khuda Ne Kya Tumhare Haath Jannat Bech Dali Hai!

Purani Hokar Bhi Khaas Hoti Ja Rahi Hai,
Mohabbat Besharam Hai, Behisab Hoti Ja Rahi Hai!

Zara Sa Jhooth Hi Keh Do Mujh Bin Tum Adhure Ho,
Tumhara Kya Bigadta Hai Bas Phir Se Mukar Jana!

Aksar Sukhe Hue Honthon Se Hi Hoti Hai Meethi Baatein,
Pyaas Bujh Jaye To Alfaz Aur Insaan Dono Badal Jaya Karte Hain!

Kaun Rota Hai Kisi Aur Kee Khaatir Ai Dost,
Sab Ko Apni Hi Kisi Baat Pe Rona Aayaa!

Tere Pyaar Ki Hifazat Kuch Is Tarah Se Ki Maine,
Jab Kabhi Kisi Ne Pyaar Se Dekha To Nazrein Jhuka Li Humne!

Karni Hai Khuda Se Dua Ki Teri Mohabbat Ke Siva Kuch Na Mile,
Zindagi Mein Tu Mile Sirf Tu, Ya Phir Zindagi Na Mile!

Durust Kar Hi Liya Maine Nazriya Apna,
Ki Dard Na Ho To Mohabbat Mazaak Lagti Hai!

Aaye The Hanste Khelte Mai-Kane Mein 'Firaq',
Jab Pi Chuke Sharab To Sanjida Ho Gaye!

Main Roz Pilata Hun Use Zehar Ka Piyala,
Ek Dard Jo Andar Hai, Marta Hi Nahi!

Kab Thehrega Dard Ai Dil Kab Raat Basar Hogi,
Sunte The Woh Aayenge, Sunte The Sehar Hogi!

Hum Tujh Se Alag Reh Kar Bhi Rehte Hain Tere Pass,
Hote Hain Teri Bazam Mein Hote Hain Jahan Bhi!

Log Kehte Hain Ki Badnaami Se Bachna Chahiye,
Keh Do Be Is Ke Jawani Ka Maza Milta Nahi!

Hamare Chale Jaane Ke Baad Yeh Samandar Ki Ret Bhi Tumse Pucha Karegi,
Kahan Chala Geya Woh Shakhs Jo Tanhai Mein Aa Kar Bas Tumhara Hi Naam Likha Karta Tha

Ungliya Aaj Bhi Isi Soch Mein Gum Hain,

Ki Kaise Usne Naye Haath Ko Thama Hoga!

Haadse Kya Kya Tumhari Berukhi Se Ho Gaye,
Sari Duniya Ke Liye Hum Ajnabi Se Ho Gaye!

Meri Chahat Ka Sar-e-Aam To Charcha Na Karo,
Kam To Pehle Bhi Nahin Aur To Ruswa Na Karo!

Dil Se Roye Magar Honthon Se Muskura Baithe,
Yun Hi Hum Kisi Se Wafa Nibha Baithe,
Wo Humein Ek Lamha Na De Paye Apne Pyaar Ka,
Aur Hum Unke Liye Apni Zindagi Luta Baithe!

Tum Ko Chahne Ki Vajah Kuch Bhi Nahi,
Ishq Ki Fitrat Hai Bevajah Hona!

Kya Hua Jo Mere Lab Tere Lab Se Lag Gaye,
Maaf Na Karo To Na Sahi, Badla To Le Lo!

Le De Ke Apne Paas Faqat Ek Nazar To Hai,
Kyon Dekhe Zindagi Ko Kisi Kee Nazar Se Hum!

Ishq Ka Batwara Razamandi Se Hua,
Chamak Unhone Batori Tanhai Hum Le Aaye!

Waqt Ki Ho Dhoop Ya Tez Ho Aandhiyan,
Kuch Kadmon Ke Nishaan Kabhi Nahi Khote,
Jinhe Yaad Karke Muskura Den Ye Aankhein,
Wo Log Door Hokar Bhi Door Nahi Hote!

Meri Zindagi Mein Khushiyan Tere Bahane Se Hain,
Aadhi Tujhe Satane Se Hain Aadhi Tujhe Manane Se Hain!

Jab Talak Sheesha Raha Main Bada Toda Geya,
Ban Geya Patthar To Sab Ne Devta Maana Mujhe!

Hazaron Hote Hain Mere Lafzon Ke Deewane,
Meri Khamoshi Sunne Wala Agar Koi Hota To Kya Baat Thi!

Mohabbat Bhi Bheekh Hai Shayad,
Badi Mushkil Se Milti Hai!

Kitna Badlun Khud Ko Tere Liye,
Kuch To Mere Andar Mera Rehne De!

Ai Dost Humne Tark-E-Mohabbat Ke Bawajud,
Mehsoos Ki Hai Teri Zarurat Kabhi Kabhi!

Tujhe Dekhu To Sara Jahaan Rangeen Nazar Aata Hai,
Tere Bina Dil Ko Chain Kahan Aata Hai,
Tum Hi Ho Mere Dil Kee Dhadkan,
Tere Bina Ye Sansar Suna Suna Nazar Aata Hai!

Mat Dekho Humein Tum Yun Is Tarah,
Pyaar Tumehin Hoga Aur Ilzaam Hum Par Lagega!

Yaadon Kee Dhund Mein Aapki Parchai Si Lagti Hai,
Kaano Mein Goonjti Shehnai Si Lagti Hai,
Aap Kareeb Ho To Apnapan Hai,
Varna Seene Mein Saanse Bhi Parai Si Lagti Hain!

Assi Kise De Kujh Nahi Lagde, Na Koi Saada Dardi;
Vich Raahan De Chadd Ke Tur Gaye, Wah Maula Teri Marzi!

Laga Kar Aag Seeney Mein Chale Ho Tum Kahan;
Abhi To Raakh Udne Do Tamasha Aur Bhi Hoga!

Ab Kaun Se Mausam Se Koi Aas Lagaye;
Barsaat Mein Bhi Yaad Na Jab Un Ko Hum Aaye!

Kahan Ka Vasl Tanhai Ne Shayad Bhes Badla Hai;
Tere Dam Bhar Ke Mil Jaane Ko Hum Bhi Kya Samajhte Hain!

Itni Lambi Umar Kee Dua Mat Maang Mere Liye;
Aisa Na Ho Ke Tu Bhi Chhod De Aur Maut Bhi Na Aaye!

Udasiyon Ki Vajah To Bahut Hai Zindagi Mein,
Lekin Bevajah Khush Rehne Ka Maza Hi Kuch Aur Hai!

Mana Ki Kismat Pe Mera Jor Nahi,
Par Meri Mohhabat Bhi Kamzor Nahi,
Mana Ki Uske Dil-o-Dimag Mein Koi Aur Hai,
Par Meri Saanso Mein Uske Siwa Koi Aur Nahi!

Maloom Jo Hota Humein Anzaam-e-Mohabbat,
Lete Na Kabhi Bhool Ke Hum Naam-e-Mohabaat!

Itna Yaad Na Aaya Kar Ki Raat Bhar Na So Sake Hum,
Subah Ko Surkh Aankhon Ka Sabab Puchte Hain Log!

Usne Aashiyana Bana Rakha Hai Dil Ko Mere,
Lekin Na Wo Khud Rehta Hai Na Main Kisi Aur Ko Basa Sakta Hun!

Ab To Khud Apni Zaroorat Bhi Nahi Hai Hum Ko,
Wo Bhi Din The Ki Kabhi Teri Zaroorat Hum The!

Ibadat Rabb Di Te Chehra Yaar Da Hove,
Sajda Khudaa Da Te Rasam Pyaar Di Hove,
Pyaar Di Gall Ki Dasiye,
Zikar Rabb Da Te Gall Dildaar Di Hove!

Sach Maano Main Kisi Ko Kuch Nahi Kehta,
Log Khud Hi Tumhara Pata Laga Lete Hain Meri Aankhon Jhaank Kar!

Koi Batayega Kaise Dafnaate Hain Unko,
Wo Khwab Jo Dil Mein Hi Mar Jaate Hain!

Sau Jaan Se Ho Jaunga Raazi Main Saza Par,
Pehle Wo Mujhe Apna Gunahgar To Kar Le!

Shikayatein Tujhse Nahi Kismat Se Hai,
Jo Chaha Wo Khoya!

Hum Unke Dil Par Raaj Karte The,
Mera Dil Jinka Ghulam Aaj Bhi Hai!

Aadat Thi Tu Meri,
Ab To Bas Khwahish Ban Kar Reh Gayi!

Tu Koi Mere Gham Ka Mudaava Kar De,
Tera Gham Hai Tere Kehne Se Chala Jayega!

Jheel Achhi, Kanwal Achha Ki Jaam Achha Hai,
Teri Aakhon Ke Liye Kaun Sa Naam Achha Hai!

Zindagi Dene Wale Marta Chhod Gaye,
Apnapan Jatane Wale Tanha Chhod Gaye,
Jab Padi Zaroorat Humein Apne Humsafar Kee,
Wo Jo Saath Chalne Wale The Sab Raasta Mod Gaye!

Kahin Sher-o-Nagma Ban Ke Kahin Aansuon Mein Dhal Ke,
Wo Mujhe Mile To Lekin Kai Surtein Badal Ke!

Tarsate The Jo Milne Ko Humse Kabhi,
Aaj Wo Kyon Mere Saaye Se Katraate Hain;
Hum Bhi Wahi Hain Dil Bhi Wahi Hai,
Naa Jane Kyon Log Badal Jaate Hain!

Wafa Ke Badle Bewafayi Na Diya Karo,
Meri Umeed Thukra Ke Inkaar Na Kiya Karo,
Teri Mohabbat Mein Hum Sab Kuch Kho Baithe,
Jaan Chali Jayegi Yun Imtihaan Na Liya Karo!

Kuch Khaas Nahi In Haathon Kee Lakiron Mein,
Magar Tum Ho To Ek Lakir Hi Kaafi Hai!

Khwab Hi Mein Nazar Aa Jaye Shab-e-Hijar Kahin,
So Mujhe Hasrat-e-Deedar Ne Sone Na Diya!

Fursat Nahi Unhe Humse Kuch Batein Karne Kee,
Isliye Ab Har Waqt Khamosh Rehte Hain!

Dil Se Roye Magar Honthon Se Muskura Baithe,
Yun Hi Hum Kisi Se Wafa Nibha Baithe,
Wo Humein Ek Lamha Na De Paye Apne Pyaar Ka,
Aur Hum Unke Liye Zindagi Luta Baithe!

Meri Koshish Hamesha Hi Nakaam Rahi,
Pehle Tujhe Paane Kee Ab Tujhe Bhulane Kee!

Saari Duniya Ye Samajhti Hai Ki Saudai Hai,
Ab Mera Hosh Mein Aana Teri Ruswayi Hai!

Kabhi Dil Kee Kamzori Ban Ke Reh Jati Hai,
Kabhi Waqt Kee Majboori Banke Reh Jati Hai,
Ye Mohabat Wo Sharaab Hai Ai Dost,
Jise Jitna Piyo Pyaas Adhoori Hi Reh Jati Hai!

Baat Sirf Itni Si Thi Ki Tum Achhe Lagte The,
Baat Ab Itni Badh Gayi Hai Ki Tumhare Siwa Koi Achha Nahi Lagta!

Kuch Nahi Milta Jitni Marzi Wafa Karlo Kisi Se,
Jab Waqt Wafa Na Kare To Wafadar Bhi Bewafa Ho Jate Hain!

Sair Kar Duniya Ki Ghafil Zindagani Phir Kahan,

Zindagi Gar Kuch Rahi To Yeh Jawani Phir Kahan!

Aap Se Milne Ki Chahat Hamesha Rahegi,
Aap Ko Bhulkar, Zindagi Na Rahegi,
Aapse Humko Mohobbat Tab-Tak Rahegi,
Jab Tak Sooraj Mein Roshani Rahegi!

Mohabbat Ki Raahon Ka Anzaam Yahi Hai,
Gham Ko Apna Lo Bas Paigam Yahi Hai,
Is Sahar Mein Mohabbat Dhunde Na Milegi,
Haan Bewafaon Ka Toh Elaan Yahi Hai!

Lajja Kar Sharam Kha Kar Muskura Kar,
Diya Bosa Magar Munh Bana Kar!

Ye Kaali Kaali Botlein Jo Hain Sharaab Kee,
Raatein Hain In Mein Band Hamare Shabaab Kee!

Sukoon-e-Dil Ko Naseeb Teri Berukhi Hi Sahi,
Hamare Darmiyan Kuch To Rahega Chahe Fansla Hi Sahi!

Jo Aata Hai Khushi Ki Inteha Par,
Bahut Roye The Us Aansu Ki Khatir!

Sholhiyan Chod Di Usne Ab Ke,
Har Rang Mein Udaasi Ghulti Ja Rahi Hai;
Us Roothne Wale Se Kaho Dekh Le Aa Kar,
Woh Paagal Ladki Ab Sudharti Ja Rahi Hai!

Yun Tasalli De Rahe Hain Hum Dil-e-Bimaar Ko,
Jis Tarah Thaame Koi Girti Hui Deewar Ko!

Mujhe Khamosh Rahon Mein Tera Saath Chahiye,
Tanha Hai Mera Haath Tera Haath Chahiye,
Hasrat-e-Zindagi Ko Teri Hi Saugaat Chahiye,
Mujhe Jeene Ke Liye Tera Hi Bas Saath Chahiye!

Khatam Ho Gayi Kahani Bas Kuch Alfaaz Baaki Hain,
Ek Adhure Ishq Kee Ek Muqqamal Si Yaad Baaki Hai!

Kushbu Tere Pyaar Kee Mujhe Mehka Jati Hai,
Teri Har Baat Mujhe Behka Jati Hai,
Saansen To Bahut Der Leti Hain Aane Jane Mein,
Har Saans Ke Pehle Mujhe Teri Yaad Aati Hai!

Ye Udi Udi Si Rangat Ye Khule Khule Se Gesu,
Teri Subah Keh Rahi Hai Teri Raat Ka Fasana!

Tu Chehere Ki Badhti Salwaton Ki Parwah Na Kar,
Hum Likhenge Apni Shayari Mein Hamesha Jawaan Tujhko!

Aaj Hamari Baaton Ka Jawab Nahi Dete Na Do,
Aaoge Jab Hamari Kabar Par Hum Bhi Aisa Hi Karenge!

Paani Mein Tairna Seekh Lo Mere Dosto,
Aankhon Mein Doobne Walon Ka Anjaam Bahut Bura Hota Hai!

Wo Waqt Ka Jahaaz Tha Karta Lihaaz Kya,
Main Doston Se Haath Milane Mein Reh Geya!

Jin Kee Nazron Mein Hum Nahi Achhe,
Kuch To Woh Log Bhi Bure Honge!

Seekh Duniya Hi Mein Vaaiz Hoor Se Milne Ke Dhang,
Varna Royega Ki Jannat Mein Bhii Rusvayi Hui!

Shayad Unki Ada Hai Ye Jo Har Din Hume Tadpate Hain Wo,
Kabhi Kisi To Kabhi Kisi Bahane Se Hume Satate Hain Wo,
Na Jane Kya Milta Hai Unhe Jo Humpe Yeh Sitam Dhate Hain Wo,
Chain Hi Nahi Milta Unhe Jab Tak Hume Rulate Nahi Hain Wo!

Ik Lafz-e-Mohabbat Ka Adnaa Ye Fasana Hai,
Simte To Dil-e-Aashiq Phaile To Zamaana Hai!

Mohabbat Nahi Hai Naam Sirf Pa Lene Ka,
Bichhad Ke Bhi Aksar Dil Dhadakte Hain Saath Saath!

Kuch Haar Gayi Taqdeer, Kuch Toot Gaye Sapne;
Kuch Gairon Ne Kiya Barbaad Kuch Bhool Gaye Apne!

Bas Jeene Hi To Nahi Degi,
Aur Kya Kar Lengi Yaadein Teri!

Jaise Meri Nigaah Ne Dekha Na Ho Kabhi,
Mehsoos Ye Hua Tujhe Har Baar Dekh Kar!

Kismat Ki Kitab To Badi Khoob Likhi Thi Meri Rabb Ne,
Bas Wahi Panna Ghum Tha Jis Mein Ishq Ka Zikr Tha!

Maana Ki Tum Lafzon Ke Baadshah Ho Lekin,
Hum Bhi Khamoshiyon Par Raaj Karte Hain!

Mujhko Ye Aarzoo Wo Uthayein Naqab Khud,
Un Ko Ye Intezar Taqaza Kare Koi!

Is Tarah Dil Mein Samaoge Maloom Na Tha,
Dil Ko Itna Tadpaoge Maloom Na Tha,
Socha Tha Door Ho Aur Yaad Nahi Aaoge,
Magar Door Hokar Is Kadar Yaad Aaoge Maloom Na Tha!

Hum Ne Seene Se Lagaya Dil Na Apna Ho Saka;
Muskura Kar Tumne Dekha To Yeh Tumhara Ho Geya!

Khudaa Jaane Bichhad Ke Mujhse Wo Kis Ka Humsafar Ho Geya,
Hain Jis Ke Liye Muddat Se Muntazir Aakhein!

Na Jaane Kis Liye Umeed-Vaar Baitha Hun,
Ek Aisi Raah Pe Jo Teri Rahguzar Bhi Nahi!

Mujhe Maloom Hai Tumne Bahut Barsaat Dekhi Hai,
Magar Meri Inhi Aankhon Se Sawan Haar Jaata Hai!

Sikha Diya Hai Jahaan Ne Har Zakham Pe Hansna,
Le Dekh Zindagi, Ab Tujhse Nahi Darte Hum!

Kuch Haar Gayi Taqdeer, Kuch Toot Gaye Sapne,
Kuch Gairon Ne Kiya Barbaad Kuch Bhool Gaye Apne!

Wo Mil Geya To Bichhdna Padega Phir 'Zareen',
Isi Khayal Se Hum Raaste Badalte Rahe!

Kaash Tu Bhi Ban Jaye Teri Yaadon Kee Tarah;
Na Waqt Dekhe Na Bahana, Bas Chali Aaye!

Ham Khudaa Ke Kabhi Kabil Hi Na The,
Un Ko Dekha To Khudaa Yaad Aayaa!

Dil Behlane Ke Liye Hi Guftgu Kar Liya Karo Janab;
Maloom To Humein Bhi Hai Ki Hum Aapko Achhe Nahi Lagte!

Iss Umar Ke Modh Par Sirf Mohabbat Chahiye;
Botal Ka Sahara Toh Tamaam Zindagi Lete Rahe!

Shayar Bana Diya Adhuri Mohabbat Ne,
Mohabbat Agar Puri Hoti To Hum Bhi Ek Ghazal Hote!

Kaise Kahen Ki Usko BhI Humse Hai Koi Vaasta,
Usne To Humse Aaj Tak Koi Gila Nahi Kiya!

Kuch Sitaron Kee Chamak Nahi Jati,
Kuch Yaadon Kee Khanak Nahi Jati,
Kuch Logon Se Hota Hai Aisa Rishta,
Ki Door Reh Kar Bhi Unki Mehak Nahi Jati!

Na Chaho Itna Humein Chahaton Se Darr Lagta Hai,
Na Aao Kareeb Itna Ki Judai Se Darr Lagta Hai,
Tumhari Wafaon Pe To Hai Yakeen Humein,
Bas Apne Hi Naseeb Se Darr Lagta Hai!

Woh Jaate Jaate Keh Gaye Ki Hum Sirf Khwabon Mein Aayenge,
Hum Ne Kaha Vaada To Karlo, Hum Zindagi Bhar Ke Liye So Jayenge!

Hum Bhi Kar Le Jo Roshni Ghar Mein,
Phir Andhere Kahan Kayam Kare!

Hum Ne Dekha Tha Faqat Shaunk-e-Nazar Kee Khatir,
Yeh Na Socha Tha Ki Tum Yun Dil Mein Utar Jaoge!

Honthon Kee Hansi Ko Na Samajh Haqeeqat-e-Zindagi;
Dil Mein Utar Ke Dekh Hum Kitne Toote Hue Hain!

Mere Andaaz Wo Samajh Na Sake,
Mere Jazbaat Wo Samajh Na Sake,
