Wo Samajh Na Sake Meri Mazboori,
Mere Halaat Wo Samajh Na Sake!

Har Ek Baat Ko Chup-Chaap Kyon Suna Jaye,
Kabhi To Haunsla Kar Ke Nahi Kaha Jaye!

Jab Jab Aapse Milne Kee Umeed Nazar Aayi,
Mere Paanv Mein Zanjeer Nazar Aayi,
Gir Pade Aansu Aankh Se,
Aur Har Ek Aansu Mein Aapki Tasveer Nazar Aayi!

Humne Socha Tha Ki Shayad, Hum Hi Chahte Hain Tumko,
Par Tumhein Chahne Wala To Kafila Nikla,
Dil Ne Kaha Shikayat Kar Khuda Se,
Par Khuda Bhi Tera Chahne Wala Nikla!

Karte Nahi Izhaar Phir Kyon Karte Ho Tum Pyaar,
Nazron Se Baatein To Bahut Hui Ab Lab Se Karo Iqraar!

Hum Ishq Ke Maaron Ka Itna Hi Fasaana Hai;
Rone Ko Nahi Koi Hansne Ko Zamana Hai!

Tu Bin Bataye Mujhe Le Chal Kahin,
Jahan Tu Muskuraye Meri Manzil Hai Wahin!

Tere Haath Kee Main Wo Lakeer Ban Jaun,
Sirf Main Hi Tera Muqaddar Teri Takdeer Ban Jaun,
Main Tujhe Itna Chahun Ki Tu Bhool Jaye Har Rishta,
Sirf Main Hi Tere Har Rishte Kee Tasveer Ban Jaun!

Aap Hi Apni Jafaon Pe Zara Gaur Karen;
Hum Agar Arz Karenge To Shikayat Hogi!

Bichhad Ke Tujh Se Ajab Vehshaton Ne Ghera Hai,
Udaas Rehta Hai Yeh Dil Bhi Junglon Kee Tarah!

Kis Kis Se Wabasta Karen Hum Apni Umeedein,
Is Daur Ka Har Shakhs Wafa Bhool Geya Hai!

Dil Mein Na Ho Jurat To Mohabbat Nahi Milti;
Khairat Mein Itni Badi Daulat Nahi Milti!

Ek Baar Dekh Ke Azad Kar De Mujhe;
Main Aaj Bhi Teri Pehli Nazar Kee Qaid Mein Hun!

Aankh Dekhe Bina Nahi Rehti,
Honth To Khair Si Liye Hum Ne!

Gharaz Ki Kaat Diye Zindagi Ke Din Ai Dost,
Wo Teri Yaad Mein Hon Ya Tujhe Bhulane Mein!

Ai Rabba Kya Cheez Mohabbat Tune Banai Hai,
Kisi Ko Ye Mil Jaati Hai Aur Koi Sehta Umar Bhar Kee Tanhai Hai,
Saath Chalne Ke Khwaab Dekhte Hain Jo Log Mohabbat Mein,
Koi Pa Leta Hai Apni Manzil Ko Aur Koi Sehta Umar Bhar Kee Judai Hai!

Zindagi Bahut Khoobsurat Hai Sab Kehte Hain,
Jis Din Tujhe Dekha Yakeen Aa Geya!

Kyon Keh Rahe Ho Sab Kuch Kismat Kee Baat Hai,
Meri Tabahiyon Mein Tumhara Bhi Haath Hai!

Dil Se Jo Baat Nikalti Hai Asar Rakhti Hai,
Par Nahi Taqat-e-Parwaaz Magar Rakhti Hai!

Kaanch Ke Tukde Bankar Bikhar Gayi Hai Zindagi Meri,
Kisi Ne Sameta Hi Nahi Haath Zakhmi Hone Ke Darr Se!

Saari Khidkiyan Darwaze Band Kar Leta Hun,
Phir Bhi Na Jane Kahan Se Aa Jati Hain Tumhari Yaadein!

Uske Siva Kisi Aur Ko Chahna Mere Bas Mein Nahi Hai,
Yeh Dil Uska Hai Apna Hota To Baat Aur Hoti!

Hoti Nahi Qubool Dua Tarq-e-Ishq Kee;
Dil Chahta Na Ho To Zubaan Mein Asar Kahan!

Log Chah Kar Bhi Nahi Padna Chahte Hamari Mohabbat Mein,
Kehte Hain Tum Dil Mein Nahi Rooh Mein Sama Jaate Ho!

Jab Lafz Thak Gaye To Phir Ankhon Ne Baat Kee;
Jo Baatein Aankhein Na Keh Saki Wo Phir Ashkon Se Bayaan Hui!

Khamosh Baitho To Log Kehte Hain Udaasi Achhi Nahi,
Zara Sa Hans Len To Muskurane Kee Vajah Puch Lete Hain!

Ab Yeh Bhi Nahi Theek Ki Har Dard Mita De;
Kuch Dard Kaleje Se Lagane Ke Liye Hain!

Rone Kee Saza Na Rulane Kee Saza Hai,
Ye Dard Mohabbat Ko Nibhane Kee Saza Hai;
Hanste Hain To Aankhon Se Nikal Aate Hain Aansu,
Ye Us Shakhs Se Dil Lagane Kee Saza Hai!

Ai Dil Mat Kar Itni Mohabbat Kisi Se,
Ishq Mein Mila Dard Tu Seh Nahi Payega;
Ek Din Toot Kar Bikhar Jayega Apno Ke Haathon Se,
Kisne Toda Yeh Bhi Kisi Se Tu Keh Nahi Payega!

Kuch Beete Hue Lamho Se Mulakat Hui,
Kuch Toote Hue Sapno Se Baat Hui,
Yaad Jo Karne Baithe Un Tamam Yaadon Ko,
To Aapki Hi Yaadon Se Shuruat Hui!

Aaine Mein Woh Dekh Rahe The Bahaar-e-Husn;
Aaya Mera Khyal To Sharma Ke Reh Gaye!

Mumkin Nahi Kisi Ko Samjh Pana,
Samjhe Bina Kisi Se Dil Lagana,
Aasan Hai Kisi Ko Pyaar Karna,
Magar Bahut Mushkil Hai Zindagi Mein Kisi Ka Pyaar Pana!

Woh Silsile Woh Shaunk Woh Kurbat Na Rahi,
Phir Yun Hua Ki Dard Mein Shiddat Na Rahi,
Apni Zindagi Mein Ho Gaye Mashroof Woh Itna,
Ki Humko Yaad Karne Kee Fursat Bhi Na Rahi!

Aap Pehlu Mein Jo Baithen To Sambhal Kar Baithen;
Dil-e-Betab Ko Aadat Hai Machal Jaane Kee!

Phir Na Kijiye Meri Gustakh-Nigaahi Ka Gila,
Dekhiye Aap Ne Phir Pyaar Se Dekha Hai Mujhe!

Dhoondo Ge Ujjre Rishton Mein Wafa Ke Khazane;
Tum Mere Baad Mohabbat Ka Bahut Ehtram Karo Ge!

Dil Ab Pehle Jaisa Masoom Nahi Raha,
Pathar To Nahi, Magar Ab Mom Bhi Nahi Raha!

Yaad Hai Ab Tak Tujhse Bichadne Kee Wo Andheri Shaam Mujhe;
Tu Khamosh Khada Tha Lekin Baatein Karta Tha Kajal!

Bahut Khaas The Kabhi Nazro Mein Kisi Ke Hum Bhi;
Magar Nazron Ke Takaze Badalne Mein Der Kaha Lagti Hai!

Haqeeqat Se Bahut Door Hai Khwahishein Meri;
Phir Bhi Khwahish Hai Ki Ek Khwab Haqeeqat Ho Jaye!

Har Dum Duayein Dena Har Lehza Aahein Bharna;
Un Ka Bhi Kaam Karna Apna Bhi Kaam Karna!

Dil Ne Yun Bhi Kaha Mujhse Hans Kar Kayi Baar;
Tu Khud Pagal Na Ho Jana Mujhe Samjhate Sanjhate!

Karna Ho Kisi Ko Ishq To Yaaro Seene Mein Basa Lena;
Agar Kabhi Toot Jaye To Sirf Yaadon Kee Hi Dawa Lena!

Udasiyan Mera Daman Hi Nahi Chhodti;
Ab To Jeene Kee Tamanna Bhi Saath Chhod Gayi!

Kis Kis Ko Haaye Tere Taghaaful Kaa De Jawaab,
Aksar To Reh Gaye Hain Jhuka Kar Nazar Ko Hum;
Allaah Re Wo Aalame Rukhsat Ki Der Tak,
Taakte Rahe Hain Yun Hi Teri Rehguzar Ko Hum!

Pita Hun Jitni Utni Hi Badhti Hai Tishnagi,
Saqi Ne Jaise Pyaas Mila Di Sharab Mein!

Karni Hai Khuda Se Dua Ki Teri Mohabbat Ke Siva Kuch Na Mile,
Zindagi Mein Tu Mile Sirf Tu, Ya Phir Yeh Zindagi Hi Na Mile!

Suna Hai Ishq Ka Shaunq Nahi Tum Ko,
Magar Barbaad Tum Kamaal Karte Ho!

Aadat Ke Baad Dard Bhi Dene Laga Maza;
Hans Hans Ke Aah Aah Kiye Ja Raha Hun Main!

Jalwon Kee Sazishon Ko Na Rakho Hijab Mein;
Ye Bijliyan Hain Ruk Na Sakengi Naqab Mein!

Tumhari Khushbu Se Mehakti Hai Wo Ghazlein Bhi,
Jin Mein Likhti Hun Main 'Ki Tumhein Bhul Gayi Hun'!

Waqt Rehta Nahi Kahin Tik Kar;
Aadat Is Kee Bhi Aadmii Si Hai!

Kabhi Neendein Kabhi Aankhon Mein Paani Bhej Deta Hai;
Wo Khud Aata Nahi Bas Apni Nishani Behj Deta Hai!

Baad Marne Ke Meri Qabar Pe Aaya Ghafil,
Yaad Aayi Mere Qatil Ko Wafa Mere Baad!

Aaye To Yun Ki Jaise Hamesha The Meharban;
Bhule To Yun Ki Goya Kabhi Aashna Na The!

Shikan Na Daal Jabin Par Sharab Dete Hue;
Ye Muskurati Hui Cheez Muskura Ke Pila!

Hosh Mein Jab Tak Raha Tanha Raha Ghamgeen Raha;
Ab Hun Deewana To Ek Aalam Mera Deewana Hai!

Kuch Aise Haadse Bhi Zindagi Mein Hote Hain Dost,
Insaan Bachh To Jata Hai, Magar Zinda Nahi Rehta!

Shayar Bana Diya Adhuri Mohabbat Ne,
Mohabbat Agar Puri Hoti To Hum Bhi Ek Ghazal Hote!

Jo Tu Hai Payaar Ka Baadal To Baar Baar Baras;
Na Bheeg Paun Ga Main Tere Ek Nazarae Se!

Ahsaan Kisi Ka Wo Rakhte Nahi Mera Bhi Chuka Diya;
Jitna Khaya Tha Namak Mera, Mere Zakhmon Par Laga Diya!

Kitni Fikr Hai Kudrat Ko Meri Tanhai Kee;
Jaagte Rehte Hain Raat Bhar Sitare Mere Liye!

Mat Pucho Ki Main Alfaz Kahan Se Lata Hun;
Ye Uski Yaadon Ka Khazana Hai bas Lutaye Ja Raha Hun!

Ishq Mein Khawab Ka Khayal Kise;
Na Lagi Aankh Jab Se Aankh Lagi!

Hairat Se Na Dekh Mere Chehre Kee Dararein;
Main Waqt Ke Haathon Mein Khilone Kee Tarah Tha!

Chahiye Khud Pe Yakeen-e-Kamil;
Haunsla Kis Ka Badhata Hai Koi!

Ajeeb Bhi Tu Hai Naseeb Bhi Tu Hai,
Duniya Kee Is Bheed Mein Kareeb Bhi Tu Hai;
Teri Duaon Se Hi Chalti Hai Meri Zindagi,
Kyonki Mera Rabb Bhi Tu Hai Meri Taqdeer Bhi Tu Hai!

Dil Ke Sare Arman Le Jate Hain,
Humse Hamari Pehchan Le Jate Hain,
Be-panah Na Chahna Kisi Ko Kyonki,
Jaan Kehne Wale Hi Aksar Jaan Le Jate Hain!

Ajeeb Zulm Hue Hain Mohabbat Par Yaaro;
Jinhe Mili Unhein Kadar Nahi Jinhe Kadar Thi Unhein Mili Nahi!

Hua Hai Chaar Sajdon Par Ye Dawaa Zahido Tum Ko;
Khuda Ne Kya Tumhare Haath Jannat Bech Daali Hai!

Tera Nazariya Mere Nazariye Se Alag Tha Kyonki,
Tumne Waqt Guzara Tha Aur Maine Zindagi!

Khyalon Mein Bhatak Jana Teri Yaadon Mein Kho Jana,
Bahut Mehnga Pada Hai Mujhko Tera Ho Jana!

Dil Behlane Ke Liye Hi Guftgu Kar Liya Karo Janab;
Maloom To Humein Bhi Hai Ki Hum Aapko Achhe Nahi Lagte!

Kuch Keh Rahi Hain Aap Ke Seene Kee Dhadkanein;
Mera Nahi To Dil Ka Kaha Maan Jaiye!

Saath Chodne Walon Ko To Ek Bahana Chahiye;
Varna Nibhane Wale To Maut Ke Darwaze Tak Saath Nahi Chodte!

Jab Hui Thi Mohabbat To Laga Kisi Achhe Kaam Ka Asar Hai;
Khabar Na Thi Humein Ki Gunahon Kee Aisi Bhi Sazaa Hoti Hai!

Zindagi Kya Kisi Muflis Ke Qabaa Hai Jis Mein;
Har Ghadi Dard Ke Paiband Lagaye Jate Hain!

Yakeen Hai Ki Na Aaye Ga Mujhse Milne Koi;
To Phir Yeh Dil Ko Mere Intezar Kaisa Hai!

Tu Khamosh Kyon Hai Ye To Maloom Nahi Magar;
Dil Doob Sa Jata Hai Jab Tu Khamosh Hota Hai!

Zaalim Duniya Mein Zara Sambhal Ke Rehna Mere Yaar;
Yahan Palkon Pe Bithaya Jata Hai Nazron Se Girane Ke Liye!

Tere Bagair Bhi To Ghaneemat Hai Zindagi;
Khud Ko Ganwa Kar Kaun Teri Just-Ju Kare!

Bedard Zamane Ka Bahana Sa Bana Kar;
Hum Toot Ke Rote Hain Teri Yaad Me Aksar!

Na Jane Kaun Si Galiyon Mein Chor Aaya Hun;
Charagh Jalte Hue Khawab Muskurate Hue!

Umar To Saari Kati Ishq-e-Butaan Mein '‎Momin‬'; 
Aakhiri Waqt Mein Kya Khak Musalmaan Honge!

Yakeen Karo Aaj Iss Kadar Yaad Aa Rahe Ho Tum,
Jis Kadar Tum Ne Bhula Rakha Hai Mujhe!

Bas Wohi Ek Shakhs Mere Dil Kee Zidd Hai;
Na Uss Jaisa Chahiye, Na Uss Ke Siwa Chahiye!

Ajeeb Bebasi Ka Mausam Hai Dil Ke Aangan Mein 'Faraz';
Taras Gaye Hain Tere Sath Guftgu Ke Liye!

Kaise Guzarta Hai Tere Bin Har Pal;
Kabhi Baat Karne Kee Hasrat To Kabhi Dekhne Kee Tamanna!

Mohabbat Kisi Aise Shakhs Kee Talash Nahin Karti Jiske Saath Raha Jaaye;
Mohabbat To Aise Shakhs Kee Talash Karti Hai, Jiske Bagair Raha Na Jaaye!

Hum Ne Paala Muddaton Pehlu Mein Hum Koi Nahi;
Tum Ne Dekha Ek Nazar Se Dil Tumhara Ho Geya!

Guzar Geya Wo Waqt Jab Tere Talabgaar The Hum;
Ab Khuda Bhi Ban Jao To Sajda Na Karenge!

Kuch Is Tarah Se Guzari Hai Zindagi Jaise;
Tamaam Umar Kisi Dusre Ke Ghar Mein Raha!

Ab Ye Bhi Theek Nahi Ki Har Dard Mita De;
Kuch Dard Kaleje Se Lagane Ke Liye Hain!

Tumhein Jab Kabhi Mile Fursatein Mere Dil Se Bojh Utaar Do;
Main Bahut Dino Se Udaas Hun, Mujhe Koi Shaam Udhaar Do!

Tere Pass Se Wo Guzra To Bekhudi Mein Tha 'Faraz';
Thodi Door Ja Kar Sambhla, Tujhe Yaad Kar Ke Roya!

Raat Der Tak Teri Dehleez Par Baithi Rahin Meri Aankhein;
Khud Na Aana Tha To Koi Khwab Hi Bhej Diya Hota!

Itna Aitbaar To Apni Dhadkano Par Bhi Humne Na Kiya,
Jitna Aapki Baaton Par Karte Hain;
Itna Intezar To Apni Saanson Ka Bhi Na Kiya,
Jitna Aapke Milne Ka Karte Hain!

Meri Bahaduri Ke Kisse Mashoor The Shehar Mein,
Tujhe Kho Jaane Ke Darr Ne Mujhe Qayar Bana Diya!

Ai Aasmaan Tere Khudaa Ka Nahi Hai Khauf;
Darte Hain Ai Zameen Tere Aadmi Se Hum!

Seekh Duniya Hi Mein Vaaiz Hoor Se Milne Ke Dhang;
Varna Royega Ki Jannat Mein Bhi Ruswayi Hui!

Main Shikayat Kya Karun Ab,
Yeh To Kismat Kee Baat Hai;
Teri Soch Mein Bhi Main Nahi,
Mujhe Lafz-Lafz Tu Yaad Hai!

Ab Yeh Bhi Nahi Theek Ki Har Dard Mita Den;
Kuch Dard Kaleje Se Lagane Ke Liye Hain!

Woh Mera Sab Kuch Hai Bas Mera Muqaddar Nahi;
Kaash Woh Mera Kuch Bhi Na Hota Sirf Muqaddar Hota!

Main Uska Hun Yeh To Main Jaan Geya Hun Lekin;
Woh Kis Ka Hai Yeh Sawal Mujhe Sone Nahi Deta!

Yeh Dil Hi Jaanta Hai Meri Paak Mohabbat Ka Aalam;
Ki Mujhe Jeene Ke Liye Saanso Kee Nahi Teri Zarurat Hai!

Na Gul Khile Hain Na Un Se Mile Na Mai Pee Hai;
Ajeeb Rang Mein Ab Ke Bahaar Guzri Hai!

Zindagi Yun Hi Bahut Kam Hai Mohabbat Ke Liye;
Rooth Kar Aise Yun Waqt Zaaya Na Kiya Karo!

Maana Ki Teri Deed Ke Qabil Nahi Hun Main;
Tu Mera Shauq Dekh Mera Intezar Dekh!

Khayal Mein Aata Hai Jab Us Ka Chehra, To Labon Pe Aksar Fariyaad Aati Hai;
Hum Bhool Jate Hain Us Ke Sare Sitam, Jab Us Kee Adhuri Si Mohabbat Yaad Aati Hai!

Hai Dil Tera Hai Jaan Teri Hai Imaan Tera;
To Kaise Maanu Tera Muqaddar Nahi Hun Main!

Tum Bhool Kar Bhi Yaad Nahi Karte Ho Kabhi;
Hum To Tumhari Yaad Mein Sab Kuch Bhula Chuke!

Kabhi Tanhai, Kabhi Tadap, Kabhi Bebasi To Kabhi Intezar;
Ye Marz Bhi Kya Khoob Hai Jise Sab Log Ishq Kehte Hai!

Na Aah Sunayi Di Na Tadap Dikhai Di;
Fana Ho Gaye Tere Ishq Mein Badi Khamoshi Ke Saath!

Husn Dekha Jo Buton Ka To Khudaa Yaad Aaya;
Raah Kaabe Kee Mili Hai Mujhe But-Khaane Se!

Meaning:
Buton - Idols
But-Khane - Temples, Abode of idols

Mile Agar Mera Humdum To Use Sirf Itna Keh Dena;
Bina Teri Mohabbat Ke Woh Pagli Jee Nahi Sakti!

Tumhara Kya Bigaada Tha Jo Tumne Tod Dala Hai;
Ye Tukde Main Nahi Lungi, Mujhe Tum Dil Bana Kar Do!

Bistar Bandh Liya Hai Maine Ghalib;
Batao Kahan Rehte Hain Woh Log Jo Kahin Ke Nahi Rehte!

Taras Gye Hum Tere Labon Se Kuchh Sun-ne Ke Liye;
Pyaar Ki Baat Na Sahi, Koi Bakwaas Hi Kar Liya Karo!

Tum Suno Ya Na Suno Haath Badhao Na Badhao;
Doobte Doobte Ek Bar Pukarenge Tumhein!

Main Kaise Yakeen Kar Loon Mujhse Mohabbat Nahi Thi Unko;
Suna Hai Aaj Bhi Wo Rote Hain Meri Tasveer Seene Se Laga Kar!

Dushmani Laakh Sahi Khatam Na Kijiye Rishta;
Dil Mile Ya Na Mile Haath Milaate Rahiye!

Chand Sa Tera Masoom Chehra Tu Haya Kee Ek Murat Hai;
Tujhe Dekh Ke Kaliyan Bhi Sharmaye Tu Itni Khoobsurat Hai!

Uski Dard Bhari Aankhon Ne Jis Jagah Kaha Tha Alvida;
Aaj Bhi Wahi Khada Hai Dil Uske Aane Ke Intezaar Mein!

Jigar Ho Jaega Chhalni Yeh Aankhein Khoon Royeingi Wasi;
Be Fainz Logon Se Nibha Kar Kuch Nahi Milta!

Jitni Shiddat Se Mujhe Zakham Diye Hain Us Ne;
Itni Shidat Se Toh Maine Usey Chahaa Bhi Nhi Tha!

Shaam Hote Hi Tere Pyaar Ki Pagal Khushboo;
Neend Aankhon Se, Sukoon Dil Se Chura Leti Hai!

Aafat To Hai Woh Naaz Bhi Andaz Bhi Lekin;
Marta Hun Main Jis Par Woh Ada Aur Hi Kuch Hai!

Khwahishon Ka Kafila Bhi Ajeeb Hi Hai;
Aksar Wahin Se Guzarta Hai Jahan Raasta Na Ho

Teri Baatein Hi Sunane Aaye;
Dost Bhi Dil Dukhane Hi Aaye!

Mohabbat Hai Ki Nafrat Hai, Koi Itna To Samjhaye;
Kabhi Main Dil Se Ladhti Hun, Kabhi Dil Mujh Se Ladhta Hai!

Aao Be-Parda Tumhein Jalwa-e-Pinhan Kee Kasam;
Hum Na Chedenge Humein Zulf-e-Pareshan Ki Kasam!

Yeh Dil Bura Sahi Magar Sar-e-Bazaar To Na Keh;
Aakhir Tu Is Makaan Mein Kuch Din Raha To Hai!

Phoolon Ka Bikharna To Muqaddar Hi Tha Lekin;
Kuch Is Mein Hawaon Kee Siyasat Bhi Bahut Thi!

Zikr Jab Chhid Geya Qayamat Ka;
Baat Pahunchi Teri Jawani Tak!

Unka Bharosa Mat Karo Jinka Khayal Waqt Ke Sath Badal Jaye;
Bharosa Unka Karo Jinka Khayal Vaise Hi Rahe Jab Aapka Waqt Badal Jaye!

Chal Tujhe Dikha Dun Apne Dil Kee Veeran Galiyan;
Shayad Ki Tujhe Taras Aa Jaye Meri Udaas Zindagi Par!

Jaise Meri Nigaah Ne Dekhaa Na Ho Kabhi;
Mehsoos Ye Hua Tujhe Har Baar Dekh Kar!

Main Aksar Usko Sochun To Mujhe Mehsoos Hota Hai;
Use Mujhse Mohabbat Thi, Ya Phir Veham Tha Yeh Mera!

Muskurane Se Shuru Aur Rulane Pe Khatam;
Ye Zulm Hai Insanon Pe Jise Log Mohabbat Kehte Hain!

Majlis Mein Mere Zikr Ke Aate Hi Uthe Woh;
Badnami-e-Ushshaq Ka Ezaz To Dekho!

Yeh Din Raat Yeh Lamhe Mujhe Achhe Se Lagte Hain;
Tumhein Sochun To Saare Silsile Achhe Se Lagte Hain!

Jo Aag Lagayi Thi Tum Ne Us Ko To Bujhaya Ashkon Ne;
Jo Ashkon Ne Bhadkayi Hai Us Aag Ko Thanda Kaun Kare!

Dilasa Dete Hain Log, Ki Yun Har Waqt Na Roya Karo;
Main Kaise Bataun Ki Kuch Dard Sehne Ke Kabil Nahi Hote!

Main Thak Geya Hun Bahut Shayadaar Pedon Se;
Zara Si Dhoop Bichhakar Qayam Karta Hun!

Hue Barbad Magar Phir Bhi Sudhar Na Paye Hum;
Phir Wohi Shayari, Phir Wohi Ishq Aur Phir Wohi Tum!

Dard-e-Dil Kee Aah Tum Na Samajhoge Kabhi;
Har Dard Ka Maatam Sar-e-Aam Nahi Hota!

Chupa Loon Is Tarah Tujhe Apni Baahon Mein,
Ki Hawa Bhi Guzarne Kee Izazat Maange;
Ho Jaun Itna Madhosh Tere Pyaar Mein,
Ki Hosh Bhi Aane Kee Izazat Mange!

Hum Rone Pe Aa Jayein To Dariya Hi Baha Den;
Shabnam Kee Tarah Se Humein Rona Nahi Aataa!

Ik Lafz-e-Mohabbat Ka Adnaa Ye Fasaana Hai;
Simte To Dil-e-Aashiq Phaile To Zamaana Hai!

Har Roz Humein Milna, Har Roz Bichdna Hai;
Main Raat Kee Parchai, Tu Subah Ka Chehra Hai!

Tujhse Mila Nahi Hun Magar Chahta Hun Main;
Tu Humsafar Ho Aur Kahin Ka Safar Na Ho!

Kuch Zakhm Sadiyon Baad Bhi Taaza Rehte Hain 'Faraz';
Waqt Ke Paas Bhi Har Marz Ki Dawa Nahi Hoti!

Kabhi Kisi Ka Jo Ho Tha Intezar Humein;
Bada Hi Shaam-o-Sehar Ka Hisaab Rakhte The!

Bach Jaye Jawani Mein Jo Duniya Kee Hawa Se;
Hota Hai Farishta Koi Insaan Nahi Hota!

Rakhe Hain Dil Mein Hum Ne Bade Ehtram Se;
Jo Gham Diye Hain Tumne Mohabbat Ke Naam Se!

Safar Mein Koi Kisi Ke Liye Theharta Nahi;
Na Mud Ke Dekha Kabhi Sahilon Ko Dariya Ne!

Mat Pucho Ye Ishq Kaisa Hota Hai;
Bas Jo Rulata Hai Usi Ko Gale Laga Kar Rone Ka Jee Chahta Hai!

Bane Hain Ahal-E-Hawas Muddai Bhi Munsif Bhi;
Kise Vakeel Karein Kisse Munsifi Chaahen!

Pyaar Mein Sabr Ka Imtihan To Dekho;
Wo Meri Baahon Mein So Gaye Kisi Aur Ke Liye Rote Rote!

Lipta Hai Mere Dil Se Kisi Raaz Ki Maanind;
Woh Shakhs Jis Ko Mera Hona Bhi Nahin Hai!

Gham Ki Tashreeh Bohat Mushkil Thi;


Apni Tasveer Dikha Di Hum Ne!

Bada Shor Sunte The Pehlu Mein Dil Ka;
Jo Cheera To Ek Qatra-e-Khoon Na Nikla!

Dil Hijr Ke Dard Se Bojhal Hai Ab Aan Milo To Behtar Ho;
Is Baat Se Hum Ko Kya Matlab Ye Kaise Ho Ye Kyonkar Ho!

Aansuon Ko Peena Purani Aadat Hai Meri;
Mujhe Logon Ko Apna Gham Dikhana Nahi Aata!

Teri Kurbat Nahi Hasil To Na Sahi;
Tera Khyaal Har Waqt Mere Saath Rehta Hai!

Irada Tha Ki Ab Ke Rang-e-Duniya Dekhna Hai;
Khabar Kya Thi Ki Apna Hi Tamasha Dekhna Hai!

Talash Hai Ek Aise Shakhs Kee,
Jo Aankhon Mein Us Waqt Dard Dekh Sake;
Jab Sab Log Mujse Khete Hain,
Kya Yaar Hamesha Hansti Rehti Ho!

Hamari Aankhon Mein Aao To Hum Dikhayein Tumhein;
Ada Tumhari Jo Tum Bhi Kaho Ki Haan Kuch Hai!

Kuch Is Tarah Se Meri Zindagi Ko Maine Aasaan Kar Liya;

Bhulkar Teri Bewafai Apni Tanhai Se Maine Pyaar Kar Liya!

Aaina Dekh Apna Sa Munh Le Ke Reh Gaye;
Sahab Ko Dil Na Dene Pe Kitna Guroor Tha!

Aaj To Besabab Udaas Hai Ji;
Ishq Hota To Koi Baat Bhi Thi!

Ab Shikayat Tujh Se Nahi Khud Se Hai;
Maana Ki Sare Jhooth Tere The Par Un Pe Yaqeen To Mera Tha!

Meri Aankhon Se Gire Hain Yeh Jo Chand Katre; 
Jo Samajh Sako To Aansu, Na Samajh Sako To Pani!

Jo Chirag Saare Bujha Chuke Unhein Intezar Kahan Raha;
Ye Sukun Ka Daur-e-Shadeed Hai Koi Beqarar Kahan Raha!

Soch Bhi Nahi Sakta Ek Pal Bhi Door Rehna Tumse;
Agar Tu Bhool Jaye To Toot Ke Bikhar Jaun Main!

Lo Aaj Humne Tod diya Rishta-e-Umeed;
Lo Ab Kabhi Gila Na Karenge Kisi Se Hum!

Chaale Jayenge Ek Din Hum Tujhe Tere Haal Pe Chod Kar;
Apno Kee Kadaar Kya Hoti Hai Tuje Waqt Sikha Dega!

Pyaas Bujh Jaye Zameen Sabz Ho Manzar Dhul Jaye;
Kaam Kya Kya Na In Aankhon Kee Tari Aaye Humein!

Na Kar Zidd, Apni Aukat Mein Reh Ai Nadaan Dil;
Wo Bade Log Hain, Apne Shaunk Se Yaad Karte Hain!

Ab Aur Nahi Hoti Isjq Kee Ghulami;
Yaaro Keh Do Use, Ho Jaye Jiska Hona Hai!

Mere Muqaddar Mein To Tumhari Yaadein Hain Lekin;
Tum Jiske Muqaddar Mein Ho Use Zindagi Mubarak!

Kis Liye Katra Ke Jata Hai Musafir Dum To Le;
Aaj Sukha Ped Hun Kal Tera Saya Main Hi Tha!

Tu Agar Chhod Ke Jaane Kee Zidd Pe Hai To Ja;
Jaan Bhi Jism Se Jaati Hai To Kab Puch Ke Jaati Hai!

Aaj Pee Lene De Jee Lene De Mujhko Saqi;
Kal Meri Raat Khuda Jaane Kahan Guzregi!

Puche Na Zindagi Mein Kisi Ne Bhi Dil Ke Dukh;
Ab Shehar Bhar Mein Zikr Meri Khud-Kushi Ka Hai!

Aaghosh Mein Mehkoge Dikhai Nahi Doge;
Tum Nikhat-e-Gulzar Ho Hum Parda-e-Shab Hain!

Meaning:
Nikhat-e-Gulzar = Fragrance of garden
Parda-e-Shab = Veil of night

Gham Mujhe Dete Ho Auron Kee Khushi Ke Vaaste;
Kyon Bure Bante Ho Tum Nahaq Kisi Ke Vaaste!

Mere Lafz Agar Us Tak Pahunch Jayein To Bas Itna Keh Dena;
Hum Jaise Log Ek Baar Kho Jayein To Phir Dobara Nahi Milte!

Humse Khelti Rahi Duniya Taash Ke Patton Ki Tarah;
Jisne Jeeta Usne Bhi Phenka Jisne Haara Usne Bhi Phenka!

Dil Bhar Aaya Kaghaz-e-Khaali Kee Surat Dekh Kar;
Jinko Likhna Tha Wo Sab Baatein Zubani Ho Gayi!

Wo Jiske Saamne Humne Ye Sar Jhukaya Hai;
Khuda Nahi Hai, Par Humne Usko Khuda Banaya Hai!

Ab To Kar Lijiye Aap Samaat Qisaa Ishq Ka;
Aah Tak Le Aayein Hain Hum Mukhtsir Karte Hue!

Translation:
Samaat = Hear
Mukhtasir = Shorten

Aise Chhupne Se Na Chhupna Hi Tha Behtar Tera;
Tu Hai Parde Mein Magar Zikr Hai Ghar Ghar Tera!

Aaine Mein Wo Dekh Rahe The Bahaar-e-Husn;
Aaya Mera Khayal To Sharma Ke Reh Gaye!

Ek Baar Dekh Ke Azad Kar De Mujhe;
Main Aaj Bhi Teri Pehli Nazar Kee Qaid Mein Hun!

Dil Mein Na Ho Jurat To Mohabbat Nahi Milti;
Khairat Mein Itni Badi Daulat Nahi Milti!

Jab Se Usne Shehar Ko Chhoda Har Raasta Sunsaan Hua;
Apna Kya Hai Saare Shehar Ka Ek Jaisa Nuksaan Hua!

Jab Samne Hote Ho Tum, Na Jane Kyon Hosh Kho Dete Hain Hum;
Milti Hai Nazar Jab-Jab Tumse, Kasam Khudaa Kee Khudaa Ko Bhi Bhool Jaate Hain Hum!

Daad-o-Tahsin Ka Ye Shor Hai Kyon;
Hum To Khud Se Kalaam Kar Rahe Hain!

Meaning:
Daad-o-Tahsin = Praise and appreciation
Kalaam = Talking

Dil Mein Sama Gayi Hain Qayamat Kee Shokhiyan;
Do-Chaar Din Raha Tha Kisi Kee Nigah Mein!

Shauq-e-Safar Kahan Hai Kahan Le Geya Humein;
Hum Jis Ko Chodd Aaye Hain Manzil Wahi To Thi!

Doobi Hain Meri Ungliyan Khud Apne Lahoo Mein;
Yeh Kaanch Ke Tukde Uthaane Kee Saza Hai!

Kaam Aa Saki Naa Apni Wafayein To Kya Karein;
Us Bewafa Ko Bhool Naa Jayein To Kya Karein!

Ab Tak To Khair Teri Tamanna Mein Kat Gayi;
Tu Mil Geya To Sochta Hun Kya Karun Ga Main!

Itni Lambi Umar Kee Dua Mat Maang Mere Liye;
Aisa Na Ho Ke Tu Bhi Chhod De Aur Maut Bhi Na Aaye!

Kahan Ka Vasl Tanhai Ne Shayad Bhes Badla Hai;
Tere Dam Bhar Ke Mil Jaane Ko Hum Bhi Kya Samajhte Hain!

Chori Chori Humse Tum Aa Kar Mile The Jis Jagah;
Muddatein Guzri Par Ab Tak Wo Thikana Yaad Hai!

Abhi Kamsin Ho, Rehne Do, Kahin Kho Dogi Dil Mera;
Tumhare Hi Liye Rakha Hai, Le Jaana Jawaan Ho Kar!

Chand Kaliyan Nishat Ki Chun Kar,
Muddaton Mahv-e-Yaas Rehta Hun;
Tujh Se Milna Khushi Ki Baat Sahi,
Tujh Se Mil Kar Udaas Rehta Hun!

Translation:
Mahv-e-Yaas = Lost in grief

Anokhi Waza Hai Sare Zamane Se Nirale Hain;
Ye Aashiq Kaun Si Basti Ke Ya Rab Rehne Wale Hain!

Hain Aur Bhi Duniya Mein Sukhan-War Bahot Achhe; 
Kehte Hain Ki 'Ghalib' Ka Hai Andaaz-e-Bayan Aur!

Neend Bhi Nilaam Ho Jati Hai Bazaar-e-Ishq Mein;
Itna Aasan Nahi Hai Kisi Ko Bhula Kar So Jana!

Padh Raha Hun Main Ishq Ki Kitab Ai Dosto;
Agar Aa Gayi Smajh Ishq Ki To Bewafaon Ki Khair Nahi!

Galti Naal Vi Kadi Kise Naal Pyaar Naa Kareyo;
Mar Mar Ke Jeona Pai Jana Kadi Ishq Vich Kise Te Na Mareyo!

Inhi Patharon Pe Chal Kar Agar Aa Sako To Aao;
Mere Ghar Ke Raaste Mein Koi Kehkashan Nahi Hai!

Tum Bhi Ho Beete Hue Waqt Ki Tarah Hu-B-Hu;
Tum Ne Bhi Yaad Aana Hai, Khud Aana To Hai Nahi!

Na Aana Usse Le Kar Mere Janaze Mein,
Meri Mohabbat Ki Tauhin Hogi;
Main Chaar Logon Ke Kandhe Pe Hounga,
Aur Meri Jaan Peeche Paidal Hogi

Ye Jabr Bhi Dekha Hai Tareekh Kee Nazron Ne;
Lamhon Ne Khataa Kee Thi Sadiyon Ne Saza Payi!

Ja Aur Koi Zabt Ki Duniya Talash Kar;
Ai Ishq Hum To Ab Tere Kaabil Nahi Rahe!

Kuchh Iss Tarah Se Meri Zindagi Ko Maine Aasan Kar Liya;
Bhool Kar Teri Bewafai, Maine Apni Tanhai Se Pyaar Kar Liya!

Parda-e-Lutf Mein Ye Zulm-o-Sitam Kya Kahiye;
Haye Zalim Tera Andaz-e-Karam Kya Kahiye!

Kash Tu Bhi Ban Jaye Teri Yaadon Ki Tarah;
Na Waqt Dekhe Na Bahana, Bas Chali Aaye!

Khwahishon Ka Kafila Bhi Ajeeb Hi Hai;
Aksar Wahin Se Guzarta Hai Jahan Raasta Nahi Hota!

Jaane Wale Dil Ko Pathar Kar Gaye;
Phir Kissi Ko Dekh Kar Dil Dhadka Hi Nahin!

Dene Aaye Hain Mere Dard Kee Keemat Mujh Ko;
Itne Humdard Hain Na Jaane Kyon Log Mere!

Muddtaa Hoyian Vicchde Nu Oh Gallaan Phir Yaad Karn Nu Jee Karda;
Rabb Jaane Tera Mera Ki Rishta Ajj Phir Tainu Apni Kehan Nu Jee Karda!

Humne Hamare  Ishq Ka, Izhaar Yoon Kiya;
Phoolon Se Tera Naam, Pathron Pe Likh Diya!

Mere Jazbaat Se Waqif Hai Meri Kalm 'Faraz';
Main Pyaar Likhun To Tera Naam Likha Jata Hai!

Shaam Se Aaj Saans Bhaari Hai, Bekaraari Hi Bekaraari Hai;
Aapke Baad Har Ghadi Humne, Aap Ke Saath Hi Guzaari Hai!

Hum Bhi Ek Sham Bahut Uljhe Hue The Khud Mein;
Ek Sham Usko Bhi Haalat Ne Mohlat Nahi Di!

Abhi To Zikr-e-Sehar Dosto Hai Door Kee Baat;
Abhi To Dekhte Jao Badi Udaas Hai Raat!

Aankhein Bhi Haye Naza Mein Apni Badal Gayi;
Sach Hai Ki Bekasi Mein Koi Aashna Nahin!

Isi Karz Ko Ada Karne Ke Liye Hum Saari Raat Nahi Sote Ki;

Shayad Koi Jaag Raha Hoga Is Duniya Mein Hamare Liye!

Din, Mahine, Saalon Ka Hisaab Nahi Aata Mujhe;
Hamesha Se Hamesha Tak Saath Tumhara Chahiye!

Tu Bhi Chup Hai Main Bhi Chup Hun Yeh Kaisi Tanhayi Hai;
Tere Saath Teri Yaad Aayi Kya Tu Sach-Much Aayi Hai!

Mangne Se Mil Saki Nahi Humein Ek Bhi Khushi;
Paaye Hain Laakh Ranj Tamanna Kiye Baghair!

Abhi Mashroof Hun Kafi Kabhi Fursat Mein Sochunga;
Ki Tujhko Yaad Rakhne Mein Main Kya-Kya Bhool Jata Hun!

Hum Ne Mohbbaton Ke Nashe Mein Aa Kar Use Khuda Bana Dala;
Hosh Tab Aaya Jab Us Ne Kaha Ki Khuda Kisi Ek Ka Nahi Hota!

Naadani Kee Hadh Hai Zara Dekho To Unhein;
Mujhe Kho Kar Wo Mere Jaisa Dhoondh Rahe Hain!

Khalaq Ne Cheen Lee Hai Mujhse Meri Tanhayi Tak;
Ishq Aa Pahuncha Hai Ilzaam Se Ruswayi Tak!

Marne Ka Tere Ishq Mein Iraada Bhi Nahi Hai;
Hai Ishq, Magar Itna Jyada Bhi Nahi Hai!

Be Tere Kya Wahshat Hum Ko Tujh Bin Kaisa Sabr-o-Sukun;
Tu Hi Apna Shehar Hai Jaani Tu Hi Apna Sehra!

Kaise Rokun Jo Ashk Aankhon Se Dhal Jaate Hain;
Dil Ke Kuch Dard Hain Aankhon Se Nikal Aate Hain!

Tasveer Ke Do Rukh Hain Jaan Aur Gham-e-Jaana;
Ik Naqsh Chupana Hai Ik Naqsh Dikhana Hai!

Zaroori Ye Nahi, Ki Ishq Mein Tum Taj Banwao;
Zaroori To Ye Hai Ki, Bas Ishq Mein Tum Khud Mit Jaao!

Dhokha Deti Hai Shareef Chehron Kee Chamak Aksar;
Har Kaanch Ka Tukda Heera Nahi Hota!

Abhi To Zikar-e-Sehar Dosto Hai Door Kee Baat;
Abhi To Dekhte Jao Badi Udaas Hai Raat!

Dil Wo Nagar Nahin Ki Phir Aabaad Ho Sake;
Pachtaoge Suno Ho Ye Basti Ujad Kar!

Kar Rahaa Tha Gham-e-Jahaan Ka Hisaab;
Aaj Tum Yaad Behisaab Aaye!

Aur Kya Chahti Hai Gardish-e-Ayyam Ki Hum;
Apna Ghar Bhul Gaye Unki Gali Bhul Gaye!

Ho Na Jaye Gustakhi Husn Kee Shaan Mein;
Chale Jao Tumhein Dekh Ke Bahut Pyaar Aata Hai!

Yun Bhi Hota Hai Ki Yak Dam Koi Achha Lag Jaye;
Baat Kuch Bhi Na Ho Aur Dil Mein Tamasha Lag Jaye!

Aaye Hai Be-Kasi-e-Ishq Pe Rona Ghalib;
Kis Ke Ghar Jayega Sailab-e-Bala Mere Baad!

Meaning:
Be-Kasi-e-Ishq = Helplessness
Sailab-e-Bala = Flood of misfortunes

Betabiyan Samet Ke Sare Jahaan Kee;
Jab Kuch Na Ban Saka To Mera Dil Bana Diya!

Jee Kee Jee Hi Mein Rahi Baat Na Hone Payi;
Haif Ki Us Se Mulaqat Na Hone Payi!

Unhe Kehna Ki Meri Maut Par Aansoo Na Bahaye;
Mujhe Apni Maut Se Jyada Unke Rone Ka Dukh Hoga!

Is Shehar-e-Be-Charag Mein Jayegi Tu Kahan;
Aa Ai Shab-e-Firaq Tujhe Ghar Hi Le Chalen!

Meaning:
Shehar-e-Be-Charag = City without lamp
Shab-e-Firaq = The night of separation

Meri Koshish Hamesha Hi Naqaam Rahi;
Pehle Tumhein Paane Kee Ab Tumhein Bhulane Kee!

Hanste Rahoge To Duniya Saath Hai Warna;
Aansuon Ko To Aankh Mein Bhi Jagah Nahi Milti!

Kyon Hijr Ke Shikwe Karta Hai Kyon Dard Ke Rone Rota Hai;
Ab Ishq Kiya To Sabr Bhi Kar Is Mein To Yahi Kuch Hota Hai!

Mitt Chale Meri Umeedon Kee Tarah Harf Magar;
Aaj Tak Tere Khaton Se Teri Khushbu Na Gayi!

Palkein Khuli Subah To Yeh Jaana Humne;
Maut Ne Aaj Phir Se Humein Zindagi Ke Hawale Kar Diya!

Mitti Mein Hoti Hai Pakad Mazboot Pairon Kee;
Sangmarmar Par Aksar Maine Logon Ko Fisalte Dekha Hai!

Koshish Karun Ga Usko Bhulane Kee Umar Bhar;
Aaye Gi Uski Yaad Magar Umar Bhar Mujhe!

Aafat To Hai Woh Naaz Bhi Andaz Bhi Lekin;
Marta Hun Main Jis Par Woh Ada Aur Hi Kuch Hai!

Khwahishon Ka Kafila Bhi Ajeeb Hi Hai;
Aksar Wahin Se Guzarta Hai Jahan Raasta Na Ho!

Aaye To Yun Ki Jaise Hamesha The Mehrban;
Bhule To Yun Ki Goya Kabhi Aashna Na The!

Dil Kee Baat Ko Juban Se Kehna Nahi Aata;
Khafa Hona To Aata Hai, Khafa Rehna Nahi Aata!

Dilon Ko Fikr-e-Do-Alam Se Kar Diya Aazad;
Tere Junoon Ka Khuda Silsila Daraaz Kare!

Bhule Hain Rafta Rafta Unhen Muddaton Mein Hum;
Kishton Mein Khud-Kushi Ka Maza Humse Puchiye!

Dil Se Teri Nigah Jigar Tak Utar Gayi;
Dono Ko Ek Ada Mein Razamand Kar Gayi!

Translation:
Your glance penetrates the heart to reacdh the soul,
Both are left in agreement by such a cohesive gesture.

Bahut Pehle Se Un Kadmon Kee Aahat Jaan Lete Hain;
Tujhe Ai Zindagi Hum Door Se Pehchan Lete Hain!

Justuju Jis Kee Thi Usko To Na Paya Humne;
Iss Bahane Se Magar Dekh Lee Duniya Humne!

Apne Haseen Hontho Ko Kisi Parde Mein Chipa Liya Karo;
Hum Zara Gustakh Log Hain, Nazron Se Chum Liya Karte Hain!

Woh Hazar Dushman-e-Jaan Sahi Phir Bhi Mujhe Aziz Hai;
Jise Khak-e-Paa Teri Chu Gayi, Woh Bura Bhi Ho To Bura Nahi!

Koi Mil Jaye Mujhe Tum Jaisa Ye Na-Mumkin Sahi;
Lekin Tum Dhund Lo Hum Jaisa Itna Aasan Ye Bhi Nahi!

Chhup Ke Rehna Hai Jo Sab Se To Ye Mushkil Kya Hai;
Tum Mere Dil Mein Raho Dil Kee Tamanna Ho Kar!

Wohi Wehshat, Wohi Hairat, Wohi Tanhai Hai 'Mohsin';
Teri Aankhein Mere Khwabon Se Kitni Milti Julti Hain!

Koi Mere Dil Se Pooche Tere Teer-e-Nim Kash Ko;
Yeh Khalish Kahan Se Hoti Jo Jigar Ke Paar Hota!

Translation:
Ask my heart about your half-drawn bow,
This anguish would not arise had the arrow passed through my body.

Deedar Tera Kiya Humne, Aaj Gairon Kee Qataar Se;
Na Nazar-e-Inayat Hui, Na Rooh Ko Sukun Mila!

Main Ek Zarra Bulandi Ko Chhune Nikla Tha;
Hawa Ne Tham Ke Zamin Par Gira Diya Mujhko!

Hum Ne Waqt Se Bahut Wafa Kee, Lekin Waqt Hum Se Bewafai Kar Geya;
Kuch To Hamare Naseeb Bure The, Kuch Us Ka Hum Se Jee Bhar Geya!

Udaan Walo, Udaanon Pe Waqt Bhaari Hai;
Paron Kee Abki Nahi, Haunslon Kee Bari Hai!

Nadaan Ho Jo Kehte Ho Ki Kyon Jeete Ho Ghalib;
Kismat Mein Hai Marne Kee Tamanna Koi Din Aur!
Translation:
Ignorant are the ones who ask why Ghalib is still living,
My fate is that I should yearn for death until some other day.

Nahi Tha Yakeen Kabhi Milna Padega Judai Ke Baad;
Phir Bhadak Uthenge Jazbat Tumhari Bewafai Ke Baad!

Hum Bhi Dariya Hai Humein Apna Hunar Maloom Hai;
Jis Taraf Bhi Chal Padenge Raasta ho Jayega!

Jaate Hue Kehte Ho Qayamat Ko Milenge;
Kya Khoob Qayamat Ka Hai Goya Koi Din Aur!

Translation:
Departing, you say, 'We shall meet on Judgement Day',
Marvellous! As if the day of judgement is some other day!

Dheere Se Sarkti Hai Raat Us Ke Aanchal Kee Tarah;
Uska Chehra Nazar Aata Hai Jheel Mein Khile Kamal Kee Tarha!

Wo Dushmani Se Dekhte Hain Dekhte To Hain;
Main Shaad Hun Ki Hun To Kisi Kee Nigaah Mein!

Meaning:
Shaad = Delighted/Cheerful

Laazim Tha Ki Dekho Mera Rasta Koi Din Aur;
Tanha Gaye Kyon Ab Raho Tanha Koi Din Aur!

Translation:
Our paths had to cross again some other day,
Going alone, now stay alone until some other day.

Kuch Bhi Bacha Na Kehne Ko Har Baat Ho Gayi;
Aao Kahin Sharab Piyein Raat Ho Gayi!

Wo Aate Hain To Dil Mein Ek Kasak Si Mehsoos Hoti Hai;
Main Darta Hun Ki Kahin Isi Ko Mohabbat To Nahi Kehte!

Ye Taraqqi Ka Zamana Hai Tere Aashiq Par;
Ungliyan Uthti Thi Ab Hath Utha Karte Hain!

Raah Takte Jab Thak Gayi Meri Aankhein;
Phir Tujhe Dhoondne Meri Aankh Ke Aansu Nikle!

Husan Aur Uspe Husan-e-Zan, Rah Gayi Bul Hawas Ki Sharm;
Apne Pe Aitmaad Hai Ghair Ko Aazmayein Kyon!

Translation:
Beauty and its narcissism, ironically spare the lustful,
With seduction's assurance of its power, what need to test the rival?

Ai Dost Humne Tarq-e-Mohabbat Ke Bawjood;
Mehsoos Kee Hai Teri Zaroorat Kabhi-Kabhi!

Badli Jo Kaynaat Mujhe Iska Gham Nahi;
Lekin Bura Tha Naseeb Jo Tum Badal Gaye!

Qaid-e-Hayat-o-Band-e-Gham Asal Mein Dono Ek Hain;
Maut Se Pehle Aadmi Gham Se Nijaat Paye Kyon!

Translation:
The prison-house of life and the chains of grief, in reality, are the same,
Before perishing, why should there be any release from suffering?

Mere Marne Ke Baad Kisi Ko Koi Khaas Farq To Nahi Hoga;
Bas Ek Tanhayi Royegi Ki Mera Humsafar Chala Geya!

Aashiqui Sabr Talab Aur Tamanna Betaab;
Dil Ka Kya Rang Karoon Khoon-e-Jigar Hone Tak!

Translation:
Love demands endurance, while desire is consuming,
What should be my state untill obsession devours patience.

Jhhuki Nazro'n Mein Qayamat Ka Asar Hota Hai;
Husn Kuchh Aur Nikhar Jaata Hai Sharmaane Se!

Aafat To Hai Wo Naaz Bhi Andaaz Bhi Lekin;
Marta Hun Main Jis Par Wo Ada Aur Hi Kuch Hai!

Ghalib Nadeem-e-Dost Se Aati Hai Bu-e-Dost;
Mashghul-e-Haq Hoon Bandagi-e-Bu Turaab Mein!

Translation:
Ghalib, the fragrance of the Lord emantes from the Lord's Companion,
Recognizing Ali has become a business of my truth.

Kaise Kahe Ki Usko Bhi Humse Hai Koi Vaasta;
Usne To Humse Aaj Tak Koi Gila Nahi Kiya!

Hai Ghalib Ghalib Jisko Samjhtey Hain Hum Shuhood;
Hain Khwab Mein Hanooz Jo Jaage Hain Khwab Mein!

Translation:
The deep decorum of the hidden is misread as revelation,
The clairvoyant lost in dreams, dreams he is awake.

Aarish-e-Jamaal Se Faarigh Nahi Hanooz;
Pesh-e-Nazar Hai Aaina Daaim Naqab Mein!

Translation:
The embellishment of the ravishing is never to be done,
Inside the seculusion of the veil, the mirror lives constantly.

Maut Se Keh Do Ki Hum Se Naraazgi Khatam Kar Le Ab;
Woh Bhi Bahut Badal Gaye Hain Jinke Liye Jiya Karte The Hum!

Sharam Ek Ada-e-Naaz Hai Apne Hi Se Sahi;
Hai Kitne Behijab Ki Yun Hai Hijab Mein!

Translation:
Reticence is a form of pride, even with oneself,
No matter how unveiled you are within your many veils.

Yeh Jism Bhi Kya Cheez Hai;
Arzoo Kisiki Aur Bandgi Kisiki!

Jis Din Se Chala Hu Meri Manzil Pe Nazar Hai;
Aankho Ne Kabhi 'Mile' Ka Patthar Nahi Dekha!

Itni Badsaluki Na Kar Ai Zindagi;
Hum Kaun Sa Yahan Baar-Baar Aane Wale Hain!

Yun To Hum Dushmanon Ke Kaafilon Se Sar Utha Kar Guzar Jaate Hain;
Khauf To Aksar Apno Kee Galiyon Se Guzarne Mein Lagta Hai!

Hai Mushtamil Numood-e-Suvar Par Wijood-e-Bahr;
Yan Kya Dhara Hai Qatra-o-Mauj-o-Hubab Mein!

Translation:
What appears as confirmation of the Ocean's actuality,
Is it merely a sum total of wave, drop, phosphorescence.

Tinkon Se Khelte Hi Rahe Aashiyan Mein Hum;
Aaya Bhi Aur Geya Bhi Zamana Bahar Ka!

Utna Hi Mujhko Apni Haqeeqat Se Bood Hai;
Jitna Ki Vahm-e-Ghair Se Hoon Pech-o-Taab Mein!

Translation:
I am equidistanced from my own reality,
In proportion to the illusion of otherness.

Gham-e-Ishq Reh Geya Hai, Gham-e-Justjuu Me Dhalkar;
Woh Nazar Se Chipp Gaye Hain Meri Zindagi Badalkar!

Khuda Mujhe Kisi Toofan Se Aashna Kar De;
Ki Tere Behar Kee Maujon Mein Iztrab Nahi;
Tujhe Kitaab Se Mumkin Nahi Faraag Ki Tu;
Kitaab-Khawan Hai Magar Sahib-e-Kitaab Nahi!

Meaning:
Aashna = Introduce
Behar = Sea
Iztrab = Restlessness
Faraa g = Freeness
Kitaab-Khawan = Reader of book
Sahib-e-Kitaab = Owner of book

Tumhein Dekha Aur Pehli Nazar Mein Apni Zindagi Bana Liya;
Aaj Pa Kar Tumhein Humne Apna Khuda Hai Pa Liya!

Rau Mein Hai Rakhsh-e-Umr Kahan Dekhiye Thamey;
Na Haath Baag Par Hai Na Pa Hai Rakab Mein!

Translation:
The horseman of life speeds by, where can it be stopped,
There are no hands on the reins, no feet in the stirrups.

Jaan Kyon Nikalne Lagi Hai Tan Se Dam-e-Sama;
Gar Woh Sada Samaai Hai Chang-o-Rabab Mein!

Translation:
Listening, why does a soul struggle to leave its body,
If the divine voice resides in the instruments before us.

Yeh Na Puch Ki Shikayatein Kitni Hain Tujhse Ai Zindagi;
Sirf Yeh Bata Ki Tera Koi Aur Sitam Baaki To Nahi Hai!

Parda-e-Lutf Mein Ye Zulm-o-Sitam Kya Kahiye;
Haye Zalim Tera Andaz-e-Karam Kya Kahiye!

Hain Aaj Kyon Zaleel Ke Kal Tak Na Thi Pasand;
Gustakhi-e-Farishta Hamare Janab Mein!

Translation:
Why today so disgraced, when yesterday was impermissible.
An angel's arrogant refusal to bow for me.

Ja Aur Koi Zabt Ki Duniya Talash Kar;
Ai Ishq Hum To Ab Tere Kaabil Nahi Rahe!

Kal Ke Liye Kar Aaj Na Khisat Sharab Mein;
Yeh Suu-e-Zan Hai, Saqi-e-Kausar Ke Baab Mein!

Translation:
Why Parsimony today in the promise of tomorrow's imbibing.
This surely is an insult to the generosity of heaven's thirst-quencher.

Tum Mere Liye Ab Koi Ilzam Na Dhoondo;
Chaha Tha Tumhein Ek Yahi Ilzam Bahut Hai!

Kuchh Iss Tarah Se Meri Zindagi Ko Maine Aasan Kar Liya;
Bhool Kar Teri Bewafai, Maine Apni Tanhai Se Pyaar Kar Liya!

Hum Bhi Ek Sham Bahut Uljhe Hue The Khud Mein;
Ek Sham Usko Bhi Haalat Ne Mohlat Nahin Di!

Ret Par Thak Ke Gira Hun To Hawa Puchti Hai;
Aap Iss Dasht Mein Kyon Aaye The Vahshat Ke Bagair!

Kal Jinhe Chhu Nahin Sakti Thi Farishton Kee Nazar;
Aaj Wo Raunaq-e-Bazar Nazar Aate Hain!

Tere Ishq ki Chahat Mein Hum Reh Reh Kar Reh Gaye;
Teri Waafa Ki Justju Mein Beh Beh Kar Beh Gaye!

Dil Wo Hai Ki Fariyad Se Labrez Hai Har Waqt;
Hum Wo Hain Ki Kuch Munh Se Nikalne Nahin Dete!

Duniya Ne Kis Ka Rah-e-Wafa Mein Diya Hai Sath;
Tum Bhi Chale Chalo Yun Hi Jab Tak Chali Chale!

Na Dil Ka Rog Tha, Na Yaadein Thi, Aur Na Hi Ye Hijar;
Tere Pyaar Se Pehle Kee Neendein Bhi Kamaal Kee Thi!

Juda Kisi Se Kisi Ka Gharaz Habeeb Na Ho;
Ye Dagh Woh Hai Ki Dushman Ko Bhi Naseeb Na Ho!

Mehfil Mein Mere Zikar Ke Aate Hi Uthe Woh;
Ruswa-e-Mohabbat Ka Ye Ezaz To Dekho!

Meaning:
Ruswa-e-Mohabbat = Humiliated In Love
Ezaz = Miracle

Dil Pe Aaye Hue Ilzam Se Pehchante Hain;
Log Ab Mujhko Tere Naam Se Pehchante Hain!

Takdeer Se Shikwa Bhi Karein To Kis Tarah Karein;
Iss Takdeer Ne Humko Milaaya Bhi Tha Unse!

Bas Ek Jhijak Hai Yahi Haal-e-Dil Sunane Mein;
Ki Tera Zikr Bhi Aayega Iss Fasane Mein!

Meri Yaadon Kee Kashti Uss Samandar Mein Tairti Hai;
Jis Mein Paani Meri Apni Hi Palkon Ka Hota Hai!

Jo Saath Ki Umeed Hum Saari Umar Unse Karte Rahe;
Woh Tanhayian Ne Buhut Adab Se Guzaara Hamare Sang!

Abhi Mashroof Hun Kafi Kabhi Fursat Mein Sochunga;
Ki Tujhko Yaad Rakhne Mein Main Kya-Kya Bhool Jata Hun!

Woh Aate Hain Khwabo'n Mein Yunhi Bin Bulaye;
Aisa Hi Kuchh Shikwa Hamare Dil Ko Bhi Hai!

Hairat Hai Tumko Dekh Ke Masjid Mein Ai 'Khumar';
Kya Baat Ho Gayi Jo Khuda Yaad Aa Geya!

Zindagi Kitni Khoobsurat Hoti Agar Teri Chahat Adhuri Na Hoti;
Kuch Uljhane Kuch Majboorian Hoti Beshak, Magr Pyaar Mein Itni Dooriyan Na Hoti!

Husn Ki Chahat Mein Ishq Ko Humne Thukra Diya;
Husn Ne Yehi Silsila Hamaari Zindgi Mein Duhra Diya!

Marne Ke Baad Bhi Meri Aankhein Khuli Rahin;
Aadat Jo Padh Gayi Thi Tere Intezar Kee!

Mohabbat Ka Koi Rang Nahi Phir Bhi Woh Rangeen Hai;
Pyaar Ka Koi Chehra Nahi Phir Bhi Woh Haseen Hai!

Jeete Jee Hum To Gham-e-Farda Kee Dhun Mein Mar Gaye;
Kuch Wahi Achhhe Hain Jo Waqif Nahin Anjam Se!

Meaning:
Gham-e-Farda = Tomorrow's Sorrow

Aaine Mein Woh Dekh Rahe The Bahar-e-Husn;
Aaya Mera Khayal To Sharma Ke Reh Gaye!

Be-Zubani Tarjuman-e-Shauq Be-Had Ho To Ho;
Warna Pesh-e-Yaar Kaam Aati Hai Taqriren Kahin!

Meaning:
Be-Zubani = Inability To Speak
Tarjuman-e-Shauq = Interpretors Of Love

Main Bikhar Jaunga Zanjeer Kee Kadiyon Kee Tarah;
Aur Reh Jayegi Iss Dasht Mein Jhankar Meri!

Hum Cheen Lenge Tum Se Ye Shan-e-Beniazi;
Tum Maangte Phiro Ge Apna Ghuroor Hum Se!

Chaman Mein Rehne Walon Se To Hum Sahra-Nashin Achhhe;
Bahaar Aa Ke Chali Jati Hai Veerani Nahi Jaati!
Meaning:
Sahra-Nashin = Inhabitant of Desert

Hamaari Shayari Dilaati Hai Aashiq Ki Yaad;
Yeh Duhaarti Bhi Hai Hamaare Ishq Ki Fariyaad!

Woh Chahta Tha Ki Kasa Khareed Le Mera;
Main Uske Taj Kee Keemat Laga Ke Laut Aaya!
Meaning:
Kasa = Bowl, Goblet

Dil To Karta Hai Zindagi Ko Kisi Qaatil Ke Hawaale Kar Du;
Judai Mein Yun Roz-Roz Ka Marna Mujhe Achhaa Nahi Lagta!

Tumhein Jafa Se Na Yun Baaz Aana Chahiye Tha;
Abhi Kuch Aur Mera Dil Dukhana Chahiye Tha!

Jinhe Bhulaney Mein Yaaro, Itne Zamane Lage;
Jab Dil Dukha To Woh Hi Log Yaad Aane Lage!

So Zindagi Nisaar Karun Aisi Maut Par;
Yun Roye Zaar Zaar Tu Ahl-e-Azaa Ke Saath!

Meaning:
Ahl-e-Azaa = Mourners

Aa Ki Tujh Bin Iss Tarah, Ai Dost Ghabrata Hun Main;
Jaise Har Shai Mein Kisi Shai Kee Kami Paata Hun Main!

Doston Ke Iss Qadar Sadme Uthaye Jaan Par;
Dil Se Dushman Kee Adawat Ka Gila Jata Raha!

Meaning:
Adawat = Enmity, Hatred

Na Chain Aaye Jo Jeene Se To Marne Se Sukoon Hoga;
Mohabbat Hadh Se Badh Jaye To Lazmi Hai Junoon Hoga!

Pehli Mulaqaat Thi Aur Hum Dono Hi Be-Bas The;
Wo Zulfein Na Sambhal Paye Aur Hum Khud Ko!

Tere Rukhsaar Se Hi Jal Jati Hai Cigarette Meri;
Iss Atishi Husn Ne, Machis Kee Bachat Kar Dee!

Gairon Pe Khul Na Jaye Kahin Raaz Dekhna;
Meri Taraf Bhi Ghamza-e-Ghamaz Dekhna!

Meaning:
Ghamza-e-Ghamaz = Grief of the Consoler

Intezar To Bahut Tha Humein Lekin Aaye Na Woh Kabhi;
Hum To Bin Bulaye Hi Aa Jaate Agar Hota Unhe Bhi Intezar Kabhi!

Jeete Jee Hum To Gham-e-Farda Kee Dhun Mein Mar Gaye;
Kuch Wahi Achhhe Hain Jo Waqif Nahi Anjam Se!

Translation:
Gham-e-Farda = Tomorrow's Sorrow

Abhi Zinda Hun Lekin Sochta Rehta Hun Khalwat Mein;
Ki Ab Tak Kis Tamanna Ke Sahaare Jee Liya Maine!

Meaning:
Khalwat = Privacy

Mera Muqaddar Padhane Wale Ne Mujhe Pareshani Mein Daal Diya;
Haatho Kee Lakeerein Dekh Kar Bola, Tujhe Maut Nahi Kisi Ki Chaahat Maaregi!

Apne Hi Hote Hain Jo Dil Pe Vaar Karte Hain 'Faraz';
Warna Gairon Ko Kya Khabar Ki Dil Kee Jagah Kaun Si Hai!

Tum Ise Shikwa Samajh Kar Kis Liye Sharma Gaye;
Muddaton Ke Baad Dekha Tha To Aansu Aa Gaye!

Bhule Hain Rafta Rafta Unhein Muddaton Mein Hum;
Kishton Mein Khudkhushi Ka Mazaa Hum Se Puchiye!

Milate Ho Usi Ko Khaak Mein, Jo Dil Se Milta Hai;
Meri Jaan Chahane Wala, Badi Mushkil Se Milta Hai!

Mat Intezar Karvao Humse Itna Ki Waqt Ke Faislon Pe Tumhe Bhi Afsos Ho Jaye;
Kya Pta Tum Baat Karne Aao Aur Tab Tak Humari Rooh Hi Khamosh Ho Jaye!

Tamam Umar Jo Kee Humse Be-Rukhi Sab Ne;
Kafan Mein Hum Bhi Azizon Se Munh Chhupa Ke Chale!

Dushmani Lakh Sahi Khatam Na Kijiye Rishta;
Dil Milen Ya Na Milen Hath Milate Rahiye!

Yaqeen Mohkam, Amal Peham, Mohabbat Faateh-e-Alam;
Jahad-E-Zindagani Mein Hain Ye Mardon Ki Shamsheerain!


Translation:
Firm certainty, eternal action, the love that conquers the world,
These are the swords of men in the holy war of life!

Koi Mil Jaaye Mujhe Tum Jaisa Yeh Na-Mumkin Sahi;
Lekin Tum Dhund Lo Hum Jaisa Itna Aasan Yeh Bhi Nahi!

Naya Ek Rabt Paida Kyon Karen Hum;
Bichadna Hai To Jhagda Kyon Karen Hum!

Translation:
Rabt = Relation

Dard Ke Milne Se Ai Yaar Bura Kyun Mana;
Usko Kuch Aur Siwa Deed Ke Manzur Na Tha!

Ab In Hudud Mein Laya Hai Intezar Mujhe;

Wo Aa Bhi Jayein To Aaye Na Aitabar Mujhe!

Translation:

Hudud = Limits, Boundries

Tujhe Fursat Na Mili Padhne Kee Warna;

Hum To Tere Shehar Mein Biktey Rahe Kitaabon Kee Tarah!

Ab To Ghabra Ke Ye Kehte Hain Ki Mar Jayenge;
Mar Ke Bhi Chain Na Paya To Kidhar Jayenge!

Thak Thak Ke Band Hote Hain Chasme Intezar;
Aata Hai Sab Ko Khyal Tumhare Khyal Se!

Aankhon Mein Na Humko Dhoondo Sanam Dil Mein Hum Bas Jaayenge;
Tamanna Hai Agar Milne Ki Toh Band Aankhon Mein Bhi Hum Nazar Aayenge!

Kaise Guzarti Hai Meri Har Ek Sham Tere Bagair;
Agar Tu Dekhle To Kabhi Tanhaa Na Chhodti Mujhe!

Shehar Mein Lagta Nahin Sahra Mein Ghabrata Hai Dil;
Ab Kahan Le Ja Ke Baithein Aise Deewane Ko Hum!

Duniya Ne Kis Ka Rah-e-Wafa Mein Diya Hai Sath;
Tum Bhi Chale-Chalo Yun Hi Jab Tak Chali Chale!

Wafa Ka Naam Mat Lo Yaaro Wafa Dil Ko Dukhati Hai;
Wafa Ka Naam Lene Se Humein Ek Bewafa Kee Yaad Aati Hai!

Baat Karte Hain Khushi Kee To Ek Ranj Ke Sath;
Woh Hansate Bhi Hain Ke Rula Dete Hain!

Kuch Nahi Mila Bus Ek Sabak De Geya Ishq;
Khak Ho Jata Hai Insan Khak Se Bane Insan Ke Peeche!

Kahan Tak Sunegi Raat Kahan Tak Sunayein Ge hum;
Shikwe Sare Sab Aaj Tere Rubaru Karein!

Apne Haseen Hontho Ko Kisi Parde Mein Chippa Liya Karo;

Hum Zara Gustakh Log Hain, Nazron Se Chum Liya Karte Hain!

Yeh Kya Ki, Bayaan Sab Se Dil Kee Haaltein Karni;
'Faraz' Tujh Ko Na Aayi Mohabbtein Karni!

Aata Hai Daag-e-Hasrat-e-Dil Ka Shumar Yaad;
Mujh Se Mere Gunnah Ka Hisaab Ai Khudaa Na Maang!

Woh Aa Rahe Hain Woh Aate Hain Aa Rahe Honge;
Shab-e-Firaq Yeh Keh Kar Guzaar Di Hum Ne!

Kal Chaudhvin Kee Raat Thi Shab Bhar Raha Charcha Tera;
Kuch Ne Kaha Yeh Chaand Hai Kuch Ne Kaha Chehra Tera!

Yahan Kisi Ko Bhi Kuch Hasb-e-Aarzoo Na Mila;
Kisi Ko Hum Na Mile Aur Hum Ko Tu Na Mila!

Ajab Rangon Mein Guzri Hai Zindagi Apni;
Dilon Pe Raaj Kiya Lekin Mohabbat Se Mehroom Rahe!

मैखाने मे आऊंगा मगर पिऊंगा नही, साकी;
ये शराब मेरा गम मिटाने की औकात नही रखती।

Ab Jis Ke Jee Mein Aaye Wahi Paaye Roshni;
Hum Ne To Dil Jalaa Ke Sar-e-Aam Rakh Diya!

Tum Bhi Ho Beete Hue Waqt Kee Tarah Hu-Bahuu;
Tum Ne Bhi Yaad Aana Hai, Khud Aana To Hai Nahi!

Uski Yaadon Kee Barish Jab Bhi Barasti Hai Mujh Par;
Main Bheegta To Jarur Hun Lekin Palkon Kee Had Tak!

Itne Hijaabon Par To Yeh Aalam Hai Husn Ka;
Kya Haal Ho Jo Dekh Lein Parda Uthaa Ke Hum!

Na Afsos Hai Tujhe Sahab Na Koi Sharmindagi Hai;
Guzar Rahi Hai Jo Gunaahon Mein Yeh Kaisi Zindagi Hai!

Tum Takalluf Ko Bhi Ikhlaas Samajhte Ho 'Faraz';
Dost Hota Nahin Har Haath Milane Wala!

Judaa Kisi Se Kisi Ka Garaz Habib Na Ho;
Yeh Daag Wo Hai Ki Dushman Ko Bhi Naseeb Na Ho!

Manzil To Mil Hi Jayegi Bhatak Kar Hi Sahi;
Gumraah To Woh Hain Jo Ghar Se Nikle Hi Nahi!

Kitaabon Se Daleelein Doon, Ya Khud Ko Samne Rakh Doon;
Woh Mujhse Pooch Baithe Hain Mohabbat Kis Ko Kehte Hain!

Itni Nafrat Hai Use Meri Mohabbat Se;
Usne Apne Hath Jala Liye Meri Taqdeer Mitane Ke Liye!

Baare Duniya Mein Raho Gham-Zada Ya Shaad Raho;
Aisa Kuch Kar Ke Chalo Yahan Ki Bahut Yaad Raho!

Yun Tasalli De Rahe Hain Hum Dil-e-Bimaar Ko;
Jis Tarah Thaame Koi Girti Hui Deewar Ko!

Kyun Judta Hai Tu Iss Jahan Se, Ek Din Yeh Guzar Hi Jayega;
Chahe Kitna Bhi Samet Le Jahan, Mutthi Se Fisal Hi Jayega!

Dil Se Jo Baat Nikalti Hai Asar Rakhti Hai;
Par Nahin Taqat-e-Parvaz Magar Rakhti Hai!

Apna Toh Chahaton Mein Bas Yahi Asool Hai;
Jab Tu Qubool Hai To Tera Sab Kuch Qubool Hai!

Ishq Ke Izhaar Mein Har Chaand Rusvayi To Hai;
Par Karun Kya Ab Tabiyat Aap Par Aayi To Hai!

Na Tum Hosh Mein Ho Na Hum Hosh Mein Hain;
Chalo Maikade Mein Wahin Baat Hogi!

Ek Pal Mein Jo Guzar Jaaye Yeh Hawa Ka Woh Jhoka Hai Aur Kuch Nahi;
Pyaar Kehti Hai Duniya Jise Ek Rangeen Dhokha Hai Aur Kuch Nahi!

Yu Toheen Naa Kar Sharaab Ko Kadwa Keh Kar;
Zindgi Ke Tajurbe Sharaab Se Bhi Kadwe Hote Hein!

Is Intezar Kee Ghadi Ko, Pal Pal Ki Bekarari Ko Lafzon Mein Bayan Kaise Kar Du;
In Makhmali Ehsaason Ko, Reshmi Jazbaton Ko Alfazon Mein Bayan Kaise Kar Du!

Tainu Rabb De Kolo Mangya Si Par Kismat De Vich Na Likha Sake;
Is Duniya Kolo Door Ja Ke Vi Assi Teinu Dil Vichon Na Bhula Sake!

Aaj Phir Mausam Num Hua Meri Aankhon Ki Tarah;
Shayad Baadlon Ka Bhi Kisi Ne Dil Dukhaya Hoga!

Aye Zindagi Kaash Tu Hi Rooth Jaati Mujhse;
Ye Roothe Hue Log Mujhse Manaye Nahi Jaate!

Tumhein Jab Kabhi Mile Fursatein Mere Dil Se Bojh Utaar Do;
Main Bahut Dino Se Udaas Hun, Mujhe Koi Shaam Udhaar do!

Bahut Khubsurat Hai Har Baat Lekin, Agar Dil Bhi Hota Toh Kya Baat Hoti;
Likhi Jaati Phir Daastaan-e-Mohabbat, Ek Afsaane Jaisi Mulaaqat Hoti!

Woh Bhi Bahut Akela Hai Shayad Meri Tarah;
Uss Ko Bhi Koi Chahne Wala Nahi Milaa!

Suna Hai Gusse Mein Woh Sab Tod Deta Hai;
Mera Dil Hai Uske Pass Khudaa Khair Kare!

Gham-e-Hayaat Pareshaan Na Kar Sakega Mujhe;
Ki Aa Geya Hai Hunar Mujh Ko Muskurane Ka!

Maza Deti Hain Unko Zindagi Kee Thokrein 'Mohsin';
Jinko Naam-e-Khudaa Le Kar Sambhal Jaane Kee Aadat Ho!

Apne Jaisi Koi Tasveer Banani Thi Mujhe;
Mere Andar Se Sabhi Rang Tumhare Nikle!

Uthti Nahi Hai Aankh Kisi Aur Ki Taraf;

Paband Kar Gayi Hai Kisi Ki Nazar Mujhe!

Aap Ke Baad Yeh Mehsoos Hua Hai Humko;
Jeena Mushkil Nahi Aur Marna Bhi Dushwaar Nahi!

Judaa Ho Kar Bhi Jee Rahe Hain Muddat Se;
Kabhi Dono Hi Kehte The Yun Ho Nahi Sakta!

Meri Tanhaaiyon Se Aa Ke Abid Koi To Puchey;
Kabhi Jab Chand Pura Ho, Samandar Cheekhta Kyun Hai!

Manzilon Ke Gham Mein Rone Se Manzilein Nahin Milti;
Haunsle Bhi Toot Jaate Hain Aksar Udaas Rehne Se!

Ujaad Di Hai Ajab Zalzalon Ne Yeh Basti;
Makeen Talash Karoon Ya Makaan Talash Karoon!
Translation:
Makeen= Residents

Mumkin Hai Palat Kar Main Chala Aaon Safar Se;
Woh Naam To Ley Rooh Kee Gehraayi Se Mera!

Ab Kaun Se Mausam Se Koi Aas Lagaye;
Barsaat Mein Bhi Yaad Na Jab Un Ko Hum Aaye!

Laga Kar Aag Seeney Mein Chale Ho Tum Kahan;
Abhi To Raakh Udne Do Tamasha Aur Bhi Hoga!

Gham Ki Tashreeh Bahut Mushkil Thi;
Apni Tasveer Dikhaa Di Hum Ne!
Translation:
Tashreeh = Explanation

Der To Lagti Hai Us Ko Bharne Mein;
Jis Zakham Mein Shamil Ho Apno Ki Inayat!

Tasveer Mein Khayaal Hona To Lazmi Saa Hai;
Magar Ek Tasveer Hai Jo Khayaalon Mein Bani Hai!

Mukhliss Har Kisi Ke Sath Rehta Hun;

Shayad Issi Liye Udaas Rehta Hun!

Jo Yakeen Ke Raah Par Chal Pade, Unhein Manzilon Ne Panaah Dee;

Jinhe Vassvason Ne Daraa Diya, Woh Kadam Kadam Par Behak Gaye!

Pucho To Ek Ek Hai Tanhaa Sulag Raha;

Dekho To Shehar Shehar Hai Mela Laga Hua!

Mile Kaise Sadiyon Kee Pyaas Aur Pani, Zara Phir Se Kehna;
Barri Dilrubaa Hai Yeh Saari Kahani, Zara Phir Se Kehna!

Yaad Teri, Bas Baat Teri, Fariyad Teri;
Ya Rabb Mujhe Kaam Koi To Aur Bhi Ho!

Waar Is Qadar Shadeed Ke Dushman Hi Karta;
Chehra Magar Zaroor Kisi Ashnaa Ka Tha!

Khawab, Khayal, Haqeeqat, Yaqeen, Gham Aur Khushiyaan;

Zara Si To Umar Hai Meri, Bhala Kis Kis Ke Saath Guzarunga!

Log Lete Hain Yun Hi Shamma Aur Parwane Ka Naam;
Kuch Nahi Hai Is Jahan Mein Ghum Ke Afsane Ka Naam!

Bhuli Hui Rahoon Se Jo Guzre Hum Kabhi;
Har Gham Par Khoyee Hui Ek Yaad Mili Hai!

Tang Hota Ja Raha Hai Haala-e-Yaksaaniyat;
Kya Inhii Pheeke Dino Mein Ghutt Ke Marna Hai Mujhe!

Mujhe To Gham Tha Us Ke Bicharrne Ka Magar;
Woh Hath Malta Raha Umar Bhar Ganwaa Ke Mujhe!

Main Apne Ghar Geya Tha Woh Jab Apne Ghar Gayi;
Phir Mujh Ko Kya Khabar Ki Wahan Se Kidhar Gayi!

Manzil Pe Aa Ke Shaad e Ajab Hadsa Hua;
Main Hum-Safar Ko Bhol Geya Hum-Safar Mujhe!

Ustaad Kyon Roya Thaa Kin Halaat Ka Maara Tha;
Bachon Ko Sikhaaya Jo Mohabbat Kaise Likhte Hain!

Na Jee Bhar Ke Dekha Na Kuch Baat Kee;
Barri Arzoo Thi Hum Ko Mulaaqat Kee!

Sameit Kar Le Ja Apni Yaadon Ke Adhooray Qissay;
Teri Agli Chahat Mein Tujhe In Kee Bhi Zaroorat Hogi!

Maut Ne Chupke Se Najaney Kya Kaha;
Aur Zindagi Khamosh Ho Kar Reh Gayi!

Assi Kise De Kujh Nai Lagde, Na Koi Saada Dardi;
Vich Rawaa'n De Chadd Ke Tur Gaye, Wah Maula Teri Marzi!

Badle To Nahin Hain Woh Dil-o-Jaan Ke Qarinay;
Ankhon Ki Jalan, Dil Ki Chubhan Ab Bhi Wohi Hai!

Hum Tujh Se Alag Reh Ke Bhi Rehte Hain Tere Paas;
Hote Hain Teri Bazzm Main Hote Hian Jahaan Bhi!

Khud Se Roothun To Kayi Roz Na Khud Se Bolun;
Phir Kisi Dard Ki Deewaar Se Lag Kar Ro Lun!

Yeh Kya Ki Tujhe Bhi Hai Zamane Se Shikayat;
Yeh Kya Ki Teri Aankh Bhi Pur Num Hai Meri Jaan!

Nazar Karna, Nazar-Andaz Karna;
