Chhalakna Saagar-e-Mai Ka, Chahekna Badah Khwaron Ka!

Hai Khabar Garam Unke Aane Ki;

Aaj Hi Ghar Mein Borya Na Hua!

Ye Na Pooch Ki Shikayatein Kitni Hain Tujhse Aye Zindagi;

Sirf Ye Bata Ki Tera Koi Aur Sitam Baaqi To Nahi Hai.

Samandaron Mein Muaafiq Havaa Chalaata Hai;
Jahaaz Khud Nahiin Chalte Khudaa Chalaataa Hai!

Apne Mehboob Ki Khaatir Tha Khuda Ko Manzoor;

Warna Quran Bhi Utarta Ba Zabaan-e-Urdu!

Tu Woh Zaalim Hai Jo Dil Mein Reh Kar Bhi Mera Na Ban Saka 'Ghalib';

Aur Dil Wo Kafir Jo Mujh Mein Reh Kar Bhi Tera Hogaya!

Hazaaron Khawahishein Aisi Ke Har Khawahish Par Dum Nikle;

Bohut Nikle Mere Armaan, Lekin Phir Bhi Kum Nikle!

Akbar Dabe Nahin Kisi Sultaan Ki Fauj Se;

Lekin Shaheed Ho Gaye Biwi Ki Nauj Se!

Saaz Yeh Keena Saaz Kya Jaane;

Naaz Waale Niyaaz Kya Jaane!

Main Bhi Moonh Mein Zabaan Rakhta Hoon;

Kash Poochho Ke Mudda'a Kya Hai!

Jada Farak Ni Rakheya Rabb Ne Sade Doha Vich;

Usnu Chaun Vale Bohut Ne Te Mainu Thukaron Vale Bahut Ne!

Imaan Mujhe Roke Hai Jo Khiche Hai Mujhe Kufr;

Ka'aba Mere Peechhe Hai Kaaisa Mere Aage!

Kya Jaaniye Kya Hai Tere Bimaar Ki Haalat;
Isa Bhi Yeh Kehte Hain Ke Hai Waqt Dua Ka!

Main Hairaan Hoon Ke Kyon Us Se Huiee Thi Dosti Apni;

Mujhe Kaise Gawarah Ho Gayiee Thi Dushmani Apni!

Dosti Ka Jo Kiya Karte Hain Daawa Ehbaab;

Waqt Padta Hai To Sab Aankh Chura Lete Hain!

Raqeebo Ne Rapat Likhwai Hai Jaja Ke Thane Mein;

Ke Akbar Naam Leta Hai Khuda Ka Is Zamaane Mein!

Hum Ne Mohbaton Ke Nashe Mein Aa Kar Useh Khuda Bana Dala;

Hosh Tab Aaya Jab Us Ne Kaha Ke Khuda Kisi Ek Ka Nahi Hota!

Hamein To Kaatni Hai Sham-e-Gham Mein Zindagi Apni;

Jahan Woh Hain Wahin Aee Chaand Le Jaa Chaandni Apni!

Bikhra Pada Hai Tere Hi Ghar Mein Hi Tera Wajood;
Bekaar Mehfilon Mein Tuje Dundhta Hun Mein!

Waqt Do Mujh Par Kathin Guzre Hain Saari Umar Mein;

Ek Tere Aane Se Pehle Ek Tere Jaane Ke Baad!

Hum Ko Unse Wafa Ki Hai Ummeed;

Jo Nahi Jaante Wafa Kya Hai!

Humne Maana Ke Taghaful Na Karoge Lekin;

Khaak Ho Jaenge Hum Tum Ko Khabar Hone Tak!

Tinkon Se Khelte Hi Rahe Aashiyan Mein Hum;

Aaya Bhi Aur Gaya Bhi Zamana Bahaar Ka!

Le Gaye Khaak Mein Ham Daagh-e-Tamanna-e-Nishaat;
Too Ho Aur Aap Ba-Sad-Rang-e-Gulistaan Hona!
Translation:
Nishaat (or Nashaat) = Enthusiasm/Happiness
Ba-Sad-Rang = Hundred Colours

Umer Draaz Maang Kar Laahe Teh Chaar Din;
Do Aarzoo Me Kat Gahe, Do Intezaar Me!

Kee Mere Qatl Ke Baad Usne Jafa Se Tauba;
Haay Us Zood Pashemaan Ka Pashemaan Hona!
Translation:
Jafa = Oppression
Zood = Quickly
Pashemaan = Ashamed, Embarrassed

Aankhon Mein Kaun Aake Ilahi Nikal Gaya;
Kis Ki Talaash Mein Mere Ashk Rawaan Chale!

Yeh Ashq Aankhon Mein Qasid Kis Liye Ekdam Nahin Thamta;
Dil-e-Betaab Kaa Shayad Liye Maktoob Jaata Hai!

Jalva Az_Bas Ki Taqaaza-e-Nigah Karta Hai;
Jauhar-e-Aaina Bhee Chaahe Hai Mizhgaan Hona!
Translation:
Az = From/Then/By
Jauhar = Skill/Knowledge
Mizhgaan = Eyelid

Tu Supna Nahi Mera Jo, Tainu Paun Lai Ardaas Kara;
Tu Mout Nahi Meri Jo, Tere Aaun Da Intzaar Kara!

Giriya Chaahe Hai Kharaabee Mere Kaashaane Ki;
Dar-o-Deevaar Se Tapke Hai Bayaabaan Hona!
Translation:
Giriya = Weeping
Kaashaana = House
Bayaabaan = Wilderness

Aah Hoti Mere Lab Par Na Yeh Nalah Hota;
Ek Bhi Toone Jo Armaan Nikaala Hota!

Bus Ki Dushwaar Hai Har Kaam Ka Aasaan Hona;
Aadmee Ko Bhee Muyassar Naheen  Insaan Hona!
Translation:

Dushwaar = Difficult
Muyassar = Possible

Dil Ko Pighlaata Hua, Aankhon Ko Garmaata Hua;
Phir Khayaal-e-Yaar Aaya Aag Barsaata Hua!

Kamjoriya Na Dhoond Mujh Mein Dost Mere;
Ek Tu Bhi To Shamil Hai Meri Kamzoriyon Mein!

Dekhte Hai Ab Kis Ki Jaan Jaayegi;
Usne Meri Aur Maine Uski Kasam Khayi Hai!

Haif Us Chaar Girah Kapde Ki Qismat 'Ghalib';
Jis Ki Qismat Mein Ho Aashiq Ka Girebaan Hona!

Translation:
Haif = Alas
Girah = One Sixteenth Of A Yard
Girebaan = Collar

Mujhko Aashiq Kahke Uske Roo Baroo Mat Kijiyo;
Dostaan ! Gar Dost Ho To Yeh Kabho Mat Kijiyo!

Kuch Roz Yeh Bhi Rang Raha Intezar Ka;

Aankh Uth Gayi Jidhar Bas Udhar Dekhte Rahe!

Naa Jana Ki Duniya Se Jata Hai Koi;

Bahut Der Ki Mehrban Aate Aate!

Agar Beekne Pe Aaa Jao To Daam Ghat Jate Hai Aksar;
Naa Bikne Ka Irada Ho To Keemat Aur Bhadtee Hai!

Gazab Kiyaa, Tere Vaade Pe Aitabaar Kiyaa;
Tamaam Raat Qayaamat Kaa Intezaar Kiyaa!

Daag Daman Ke Ho, Dil Ke Ho Ke Chehre Ke Faraz;
Kuch Nishan Waqt Ki Raftar Se Lag Jate Hai!

Kahan Tak Suney Gi Raat Kahan Tak Sunayen Ge Hum;
Shikwey Saarey Sabb Aaj Tere Rubaruu Karain!

Ishq Per Zor Nahin, Yeh Woh Aatish Ghalib;
Ke Lagaaye Na Lage Aur Bujhaaye Na Bujhay!

Dhoop Mein Niklo, Ghataon Mein Nahaa Kar Dekho;
Zindagi Kya Hai, Kitabon Ko Hataakar Dekho!

Kabhi Daaman-e-Dil Par Daag-e-Mayusi Nahee Aaya;
Udhar Vaada Kiya Usne, Idhar Dil Ko Yakeen Aaya!

Pahunchi Jis Waqt Khabar Uski Mujhe Aane Ki;
Sudh Rahi Mujh Ko Na Apne Ki Na Begane Ki!

Tum Na Aaoge Toh Marne Ki Hai Soa Tadbeere;

Maut Kuch Tum Toh Nahi Ho Ki Bula Bhi Na Saku!

Translation:

Tadbeere = Deliberation, Plan

Phir Nazar Mein Phool Mehke, Dil Mein Phir Shamain Jali'n;

Phir Tassawur Ne Liya Uss Bazmm Mein Jaane Ka Naam!

Kitne Aansu Baha Diye Hain Iss Char Din Ki Mohabbat Mein;
Kaash Sajde Mein Bahate To Aaj Gunahoan Se Paak Hote!

Ittefaqan Jab Mil Jate Ho Rah Mein Tum Kabhi;

Yoon Lagta Hai Kareeb Se Zindagi Jaa Rahi Ho Jaise!

Aa Gaya Hai Farak Uss Ki Nazaron Mein Yakeenan;

Aab Woh Mujhe Andaaz Se Nahi, Andaaze Se Pehchante Hai!

Teri Firaaq-o-Arzoo Mein Katt Ti Rahi Zindagi Meri;

Aab Toh Saansey Bhi Bhojh Ban Gayi Ho Jaise!
Translation:

Firaaq-o-Arzoo = Longing

Tujhe Khabar Hai Tere Teer-e-Bepanah Ki Khair;

Bahut Dino Se Dil-e-Natwan Nahi Milta!

Junoon Mein Jitni Bhi Guzri Bekar Guzri Hai;

Agarche Dil Pe Kharabi Guzri Hai!

Muddat Se Gum Hua Dil-e-Begaan-e-Siraj;
Shayad Ke Jaa Laga Hai Kisi Aashna Ke Hath!

Wo Aaye Ghar Mein Hamare Khuda Ki Kudrat Hai;
Kabhi Hum Unko Kabhi Apne Ghar Ko Dekhte Hain!

Jahaa Baithe Mukaam-e-Dil Samajhkar;
Uthaaya Dard Ne Ghaafil Samajhkar!

Jo Ho Sake Toh Chale Aao Aaj Meri Taraf;

Mile Bhi Der Hui Aur Jee Bhi Udaas Hai!

Dil Gaya Raunak-e-Hayat Gai;

Gumm Gaya Saari Kayanaat Gai!

Dekh Sakta Hai Bhala Kaun Yeh Pyaare Aansoon;

Meri Ankhoon Mein Na Aa Jae Tumhare Aansoon!

Ishq Se Tabiyat Ne Zeest Ka Mazaa Paya;
Dard Ki Dawa Paai Dard Be Dawa Paya!

Ik Khel Hai Aurag-e-Sulemaan, Mere Nazdeek;
Ik Baat Hai Ajaaz-e-Maseeha Mere Aage!

Baske Hun Ghalib Asiri Men Bhi Atish Zer Pa;
Mue Atish Dida Hai Halqa Meri Zanjir Ka!
Translation:

Baske = Whereas
Atish Zer Pa = Impatient
Mue Atish = Heat Damaged Hair
Halqa = Ring

Jise Naseeb Ho Roz-e-Seah Mera Sa;
Woh Shakhs Din Na Kahe Raat Ko, Tou Kyonkar Ho!
Translation:

Roz-e-Seah = Day Is Black

Qatra Mein Dajla Dikhaai Na De, Aur Juzw Mein Kul;
Khel Larkon Ka Hua, Deeda-e-Beena Na Hua!
Translation:


Deeda-e-Beena = Discerning Eye

Uski Hansi Me Chupe Dard Ko Mehsus Ko Kar Dost;
Woh Kyu Yoohi Hans-Hans Ke Khud Ko Saza Deta Hai!

Kavkav-e-Sakht Jani Hai Tanhai, Na Puchh;
Subh Karna Sham Ka, Lana Hai Ju-e-Shir Ka!
Translation:


Kavkav = Continuous beating of hard stone with a sharp object

Sakht Jani Hai = Ability to bear extreme agony

Ju-e Shir Ka =  Channel of milk

Naqsh Faryadi Hai Kis Ki Shokhi Takhir Ka;
Kaghazi Hai Pairahan Her Paikar-e-Tasvir Ka!

Translation:
Naqsh = Mark
Faryadi = Pleader
Shokh = Playful
Tahrir = Writing
Pairahan = Clothes
Paikar = Face

Khabre Laggi Nazar Kehdi Jo Eh Bhaane Wart Gaye;
Jo Rooh To V Nede Hunde C, Oh Milan Nu V Taras Gaye!

Maktab E Ishq Ka Dastor Nirala Dekha;
Osko Chutti Na Mile Jisne Sabaq Yad Kiya!

Qabr Ki Mitti Haath Mein Liye Soch rahi Hoon;
Log Marte Hain To Guroor Kahan Jata Hai!

Woh Shakhs Ek Choti Si Bat Pe Yoon Rooth Ke Chal Dia;
Jese Useh Sadiyo Se Kisi Bahane Ki Talash Thi!

Tum Takalluf Ko Bhi Ikhlaas Samjthe Ho Faraz;
Dost Hota Nahi Har Haath Milanay Waala!

Woh Tu Milta Hai Mujhse Mehdood Se Lamhon Me Faraz;
Yeh Dil Hai Kitni Fursat Se Sochta Hai Useh!

Yeh To Zameen Ki Fitrat Hai Har Cheez Sokh Leti Hai;
Warna Hamare Aansuon Ka Bhi Ik Alag Hi Samander Hota!

Uski Hansi Mein Chupe Dard Ko Mehsus Kar Dost;
Woh Kyu Yunhi Hans-Hans K Khud Ko Saza Deta Hai!

Sirf Chehre Ki Udaasi Se Bhar Aaye Ansoon;
Dil Ka Alam To Abhi Aap Ne Dekha Hi Nahi!

Paas Hote Hain Jab Wo Mere Toh Koi Mozu-E-Guftagoo Nahi;
Door Hote Hain Toh Har Guftagoo Unhi Ke Liye Hai!

Yeh Jo Pani Mein Sunehera Garoor Utar Aya Hai;
Zaroor Usne Pani Mein Payu Utara Hoga!

Jaaneman Aaj Tum Bahut Yaad Aaye Ho;
Kuch Yaadon Se aur Kuch jhoothe Waadon Se!

Khareeda Jaa Nahin Sakta Hai Saaqi Zarf Rindon Ka;
Bahut Sheeshe Pighalte Hain To Ek Paimana Banta Hai!

Bada Maza Ho Jo Mehsher Mein Hum Karen Shikwa;
Woh Minnaton Sey Kahen Chup Raho Khuda Key Liye!

Kamaal Ka Shakhs Tha Jis Ne Zindagi Tabah Kur Dee;
Raaz Ki Bat Hai Dil Ussh Se Khafa Ab Bhi Nahi!

Tu Ne Tu Irade Hi Mere Tor Diye Hain;
Guzre Ga Safar Kaise,Khara Soch Raha Hoon!

Yeh Darya Ishq Mein Qadam Zara Soch Ke Rakhna;
Ish Mein Utarne Wale Ko Kinara Nahi Milta!

Kitne Majboor Hain Takdeer Ke Hathon;
Na Use Pane Ki Aukat Rakhte Hain Aur Na Use Khone Ka Hosla!

Socha Tha Achaa Bura Dekha Suna Kuch Bhi Nahi
Manga Khuda Se Har Waqt Tere Siwa Kuch Bhi Nahi!

Tumhari Mohabbat Ka Pyaasa Hu Isliye Haath Fayla Diya Maine;
Warna Hum To Khud Ki Zindagi K Liye Bhi Duaa Nahi Karte!

Uttah Kar Dil Mera Ushne Pathar Pe De Mara;
Main Kehta Hi Reh Gya Dekho Ish Mein Tum Ho!

Chalo Aao Kabhi Tooti Hui Choori K Tukray Se;
Woh Bachpan Ki Tarhan Phir Se Mohabbat Naap Lete Hain!

Shayad Woh Apna Wajood Chhor Gaya Hai Meri Hasti Mein;
Yuoon Sote-Sote Jaag Jana Meri Aadat Pehle Kabhi Na Thi!

Waqt De Badlan Naal Yaar Badal Gaye;
Thodi Zindagi Badal Gayi Te Dildaar Badal Gaye!

Qasid Ne Khabar Di Thi K Aeinge Shab Ko Woh;
Chiragaan Itna Kia Hum Ne K Ghar Ko Jala Dala!

Idhar Aa Raqeeb Mere Tujhe Main Galay Laga Loon;
Mera Ishq Be-Maza Tha, Teri Dushmani Se Pehle!

Bahut Socha Bahut Samjha Bahut Hi Der Tak Parkha;
Ki Tanha Ho Ke Jee Lena Mohabbat Se To Behtar Hai!

Woh Meri Gazal Padh Kar Pehloo Badal Ke Bole;
Koi Chhene Qalam Iss Se Yeh To Jaan Le Chalaa Hai!

Shaam Hote Hi Tere Pyar Ki Pagal Khushboo;
Neend Ankhon Se Sukoon Dil Se Chura Leti Hai!

Unhe Yeh Khauf Ki Har Baat Mujhse Kar Daali;
Mujhe Ye Weham Koi Khaas Baat Baaki Hai!

Ghar Ka Darwaza Is Andaaz Se Khola Usne;
Ke Jaise Main Nahi Koi Aur Tha Aane Wala!

Chaand Utra Hamare Aangan Main Sitaroo Ko Gawara Na Hua;
Sitaroo Se Geela Kya Karte Jab Woh Chaand Hi Hamara Na Hua!

Jaadu Hai Ya Tilism Tumhaari Jubaan Mein;
Tum Jhooth Keh Rahe The, Mujhe Aitbaar Tha!

Sumundar Se Keh Do Apni Mojain Sanbhal Ke Rakhe;
Zindagi Mein Tofaan Laane Ke Liye Susral Wale Hi Kaafi Hai!

Ussh Ki Mohabbat Ka Silsila Bhi Kya Ajeeb Tha;
Apna Bhi Na Banaya Or Kisi Ka Hone Bhi Nhi Diya!

Kisey Maloom Tha Ishq Is Kadar Lachaar Karta Hai;
Dil Janta Hai Ki Wo Hai Bewafa, Fir Bhi Magar Ussi Se Pyar Karta Hai!

Apni Mohabbat Pe Faqat Itna Bharosa Hai Mujhe;
Meri Wafain Tujhe Kisi Aur Ka Hone Nahi Deingi!

Har Baat Jante Hue Bhi Dil Maanta Na Tha;
Hum Jaane Aitbaar Key Kis Marhale Mein The!

Kitne Majboor Hain Taqdeer Ke Hathon;
Na Use Pane Ki Aas Rakhte Hain Aur Na Use Khone Ka Hosla!

Waqat-E-Rukhsat Puchh Rahe The Mere Aanson Apne Anchal Se;
Usko Gham Tha Itna Ke Woh Khud Rona Bhool Gya!

Hazaar Chehron Main Uski Muhabatain Milien Mujhko;
Par Dil Ki Zid Thi Agr Wo Nahin To Us Jaisa Bhi Nahin.

Wo Jo Hath Bhar Ka Tha Fansla, Kai Mausmon Main Badal Gya;
Useh  Napte Useh Katte Mera Sara Waqt Guzar Gya!

Saaqi Dekh Zamaane Ne, Kaisi Tohmat Lagayi Hai;
Aankhein Teri Nasheeli Hai, Sharabi Mujhe Kehte Hai!

Kaisa Sitam Hai Apka Ye, Ke Rone Bhi Nahi Dete;
Kareeb Aate Nahi Aur Khud Se Juda Hone Bhi Nahi Dete!

Aaksar Mere Dil Mein Uthta Hai Yeah Sawal;
Gairoon Se Nibha Kar Kya Hoogi Wo, Khush Haal!

Chup Ho Kis Wajah Se, Humein Maloom Nahi Hai Magar;
Dil Doob Sa Jata Hai Jab Tum Bakwas Nahi Karte!

Paas Hote Hai Jab Wo Mere To Koi Mozu-E-Guftagoo Nahi;
Door Hote Hai To Har Guftagoo Unhi Ke Liye Hai!

Waqat-E-Rukhsat Ponchh Rha Tha Mere Anso Apne Anchal Se;
Usko Gham Tha Itna Ke Woh Khud Roona Bhool Gya!

Qabr Ki Mitti Haath Mein Liye Soch Raha Hoon;
Log Marte Hain To Garoor Kahan Jata Hai!

Ya Rab! Gam-E-Hijran Mein Itna To Kiya Hota;
Jo Hath Jigar Pe Hai Wo Dast-E-Dua Hota!

Woh Tu Milta Hay Mujhse Mehdood Se Lamhon Me Faraz;
Yeh Dil Hay Kitni Fursat Se Sochta Hay Usay!

Chand Nikale Kisi Janib Teri Zebai Ka;
Rang Badle Kisi Surat Shab-E-Tanhai Ka!

Phool Mazaar Tak Nahi Pahuncha Daaman-E-Yaar Tak Nahi Pahuncha;
Ho Gaya Vo Kafan Se To Aazaad Phir Bhi Gulzaar Tak Nahi Pahuncha!

Mujh Par Sitam Dha Gaye Meri Hi Ghazal Ke Sher;
Padh-Padh Ke Kho Rahe Hain Woh, Kisi Aur Ke Khayal Mein!

Shayad Woh Apna Wajood Chhor Gaya Hai Meri Hasti Mein;
Yoon Sote-Sote Jaag Jana Meri Aadat Pehle Kabhi Na Thi!

Paas Hote Hain Jab Wo Mere To Koi Mozu-E-Guftagoo Nahi;
Door Hote Hain To Har Guftagoo Unhi Ke Liye Hai!

Humne Hamare  Ishq Ka, Izhaar Yoon Kiya;
Phoolon Se Tera Naam, Pathron Pe Likh Diya!

Rishton Ki Dhoop Chaaon Se Azaad Ho Gaye;
Ab Toh Hamein Bhi Saare Sabaq Yaad Ho Gaye!

Dil Uddon Tak Nahi Tuttda Jado Tak Koi Goorha Pyaar Na Paave;
Banda Uddo Tak Nahi Dubbda Jado takk Hankaar Naa Aave!

Mujshe Mat Puch Ki Kyun Aankhein Jhuka Li Maine;
Teri Tasveer Thi Inn Aankhon Mein Woh Tujhi Se Chupa Li Maine!

Na Sar-E-Bazar Dekhunga Na Usko Tanha Sochunga;
Useh Kehna K Laut Aaye Ab,  Mohabbat Chorr Di Main Ne!

Woh Silsile, Woh Shauq, Woh Aadat Nahin Rahi;
Phir Yeh Hua Ke Dard Mein Shiddat Nahin Rahi!

Agar Hota Hain Itefaaq To Kuch Yoon Kyu Nahi Hota;
Woh Chale Ush Raah Pe Jo Mujh Pe Khatam Ho!

Dil Di Khatt Ameeri Kade Gareeb Na Hovenga;
Maapeaan Di Karla Sewa Kade Badnaseeb Na Hovenga!

Tu Rootha Rootha Sa Lagta Hai, Koi Tarkeeb Bata Manane Ki;
Main Zindagi Girrvi Rakh Dunga, Tu Keemat Bata Muskurane Ki!

Mai Kismat To Khafaa Nahi Par Hoyi Mere Naal Wafaa Nahi;
Jithe Likheya C Rabb Ne Mel Sada O Labheya Mainu Safaa Nahi!

Hathoon Key Lakiroon Pay Matt Jaa Ae Ghalib;
Naseeb Unkay Bhi Hotay Hain Jinkaay Haath Nahi Hotay!

Abhi Mashroof Hun Kafi Kabhi Fursat Me Sochunga;
K Tujhko Yaad Rakhne Me Mai Kya-Kya Bhool Jata Hun!

Jab Se Suna Hai Ki Marne Ka Naam Jindgi Hai;
Sar Pe Qafan Liye Qaatil Ko Dhundhte Hein!

Kaun Kehta Hai K Kaafir K Dil Mein Khuda Nahi;
Bus Wahan Khuda Ko Kehte Khuda Nahi!

Abhi Mashroof Hun Kafi Kabhi Fursat Mein Sochunga;
Ke Tujhko Yaad Rakhne Me Mai Kya-Kya Bhool Jata Hun!

Kitnaa Khouff Hota Hai Shaam Kay Andheroon Mein;
Poonch Un Parindoo Say Jin Kay Gharr Nahi Hotay!

Meri Hassi Ka Hisaab Kaun Karega?
Meri Galti Ko Maaf Kaun Karega?
Ae-Khuda, Mere Dost Ko Salamat Rakhna;
Warna Meri Shaadi Pe "Lungi Dance" Kaun Karega!

Hairat He Tum Ko Dekh Kar Misjid Main Ae! Insaan;
Aaj Kya Baat Ho Gai Jo Khuda Yaad Aa Gaya!

category: Chhaya Ganguly, from the movie, Gaman

body:
Baskeh Dushwar Hai Har Kam Ka Aasa'n Hona;
Aadmi Ko Bhi Muyassar Nahi'n Insaa'n Hona!

Dubi Hain Meri Ungliyan Mere He Lahoo Mai;
Yeh Kanch Ke Tukroon Pey Bharose Ki Saza Hai!

Tumhare Baad Kaun Banega Mera Humdard;
Humne To Apne Bhi Khoye Hein Tujhe Pane Ke Liye!

Yoon Kehne Ko Toh Hum Bade Khush Mijaz Hain Lekin;
Rula Deti Hai Apno Ki Pyaar Ki Hasrat Kabhi Kabhi!

Dheeray Se Sarakti Hai Raat Us Ke Aanchal Ki Tarah;
Uska Chehra Nazar Aata Hai Jheel Main Kamal Ki Tarha!

Main to Mar k Bhi Bazm-E-Wafa Main Zinda Hoon; 
Talash Kar Meri Mehfil, Mera Mazaar Na Pooch!

Ae Kabristaan Tere Aagosh Mein Itna Sannata Kyu Hai;
Log To Apni Jaan Dekar Bhi Tujhe Aabad Karte Hain!

Daarhi Ka Ek Baal Bhi Baqi Nahin Raha;
Begum, Yeh Kya Mila Diya Tu Ne Khizaab Mein!

Translation:
Khizaab: Hairdye

Umeed-E-Hoor Ne Sab Kuchh Sikha Rakhha Hai Waaiz Ko;
Yeh Hazrat Dekhne Mein Seedhe Saadhe, Bhole Bhaale Hain!

Duniya Ne Ghum Hazaar Diye, Lekin Ae Dost;
Mainne Har Ek Ghum Ko Hansi Mein Udda Diya!

Woh Mujhse Milkar Royi Itna Ki;
Uski Naak Ka Bulbula Dekh Kar Meri Hasi Nikal Gayi!

Kuch Iss Tarah Sauda Kiya Waqt Ne;
Tajurba De Kar Woh Meri Nadani Le Gya!

Muqadar Main Raat Ki Neend Nahi To Kya Hua;
Hum Bhi Muqadar Ko Dhoka De Kar Din Ko So Jatay Hain!

Chahoon To Ab Bhi Janibe-Manzil Palat Chalu;
Gumraah Is Liye Hun Ki Rahbar Khafha Na Ho!

Translation:
Janibe-Manzil: Towards The Destination

Maghrib Ki Waadion Mein Goonji Azaan Hamari;
Thamta Na Tha Kisi Se Sail-E-Rawaan Hamara!

Jab Se Chaman Chhuta Hai Yeh Haal Ho Gaya Hai;
Dil Gham Ko Kah Raha Gham Dil Ko Kah Raha!

Saadgi Par Uski Marjaane Ki Hasrat Dil Mein Hai;  
Bas Nahin Chalta Ki Phir Khanjarkaf-E-Qaatil Mein Hai!

Jaan Tujh Par Nisaar Karta Hoon;
Main Nahin Jaanta Dua Kya Hai!

Bekhudi Besabab Nahin Ghalib;
Kuchh Tau Hai Jiski Parda Daari Hai!

Aashiq Hoon Par Maashooq Farebi Hai Mera Kaam;
Majnoon Ko Bura Kahti Hai Laila Mere Aage!

Bulbul Ke Kaarobaar Pe Hain Khandahaae Gul;
kahte hain ishq jisko khalal hai dimagh ka!

Marne Wale Marte Hain Lekin Fana Hote Nahin;
Vo Haqeeqat Mein Kabhi Hum Se Juda Hote Nahin!

Mere Bigre Hue Kaamon Ko Banaya Tu Ne;
Bojh Jo Mujh Se Na Utha Woh Uthaya Tu Ne!

Judaai Mein Rahti Hoon Main Beqaraar;
Piroti Hoon Har Roz Ashkon Ke Haar!

Yeh Dekha Ki Main Ja Rahi Hoon Kahin;
Andhera Hai Aur Rah Milati Nahi!

Teri Khaamosh Mijaji Mujhe Jeene Nahi Degi;
Iss Daur Mein Jeena Hai To Kohraam Macha De!

Zindagi Ko Samajhna Hai To Mujhe Dekho;
Keh Gaya Pani Ka Bulbula Jaate Jaate!

Jab Se Dekhi Hai Hamne Duniya Kareeb Se;
Lagne Lage Hai Saare Rishte Ajeeb Se!

Peenay De Sharab Masjid Mein Baith Kar Galib;
Ya Woh Jagah Bataa Jahan Khuda Maujood Nahi Hai!

Waqt Leta Hai Karvate Na Jaane Kaise Kaise;
Umar Itni toh Nahi Thi Jitne Sabak Seekh Liye Hamne!

Humne Wajood Apna Kho Liya;
Unka Wajood Apne Saath Jodte Jodte!

Har Waqt Milti Rahti Hain Anjani Si Saza Mujhe;
Main Kaise Poochun Taqdeer Se Mera Qasoor Kya Hai!

Dost Ho Kar Bhi Mahino Nahi Miltaa Mujhse;
Uss Se Kehna Ke Kabhi Zakhm Lagaane Aaye!

Nisaar Main Teri Galliyon Ke Aye Wattan;
Ke Jahan Chali Hai Rasm Ke Koi Na Sar Utha Ke Chaley!

Keh Do Usse, Judai Aziz Hai To Rooth Jaayein
Wo Jee Sakta Hain, To Hum Mar Bhi Sakte Hain!

Teri Subah Ki Angraian, Jaaga Deti Hain Laakhon Armaan;
Hote Hain Hum Neend Mein, Lekin Bandhan Ki Umeed Rakhte Hein!

Saarey Maahol Mein Khusboo Hai Teri Yaadon Ki;
Hum Ne Gham-Khaney Ko Bhi Phoolon Sey Saja Rakha Hai!

Runj Se Khugar Hua Insaan To Mit Jaata Hai Runj; 
Mushkilein Mujh Par Padi Itni Ke Aasaan Ho Gayi!

Andhere Ke Humsafar Ko Koi Yaad Nahi Kartaa; 
Subah Hote Hi Chiraagon Ko Bujha Dete Hain Sab Log!

Tapakti Hai Nigahon Se Barasti Hai Adaaon Se;
Mohabbat Kaun Kehta Hai Ke Pehchaani Nahi Jati!

Be Wajha Nahin Rota, Ishq Mein Koi Ghalib;
Jisey Khudh Se Barr Ke Chaho, Woh Rulata Zaroor Hai!

Tere Ikhtiyar Main Kya Nahin, Mujhe Is Tarah Se Nawaaz De;
Yun Duaein Meri Qubul  Ho, Ki Mere Lab Pe Koi Dua Na Ho!

Yaad Aati Hai Jo Marhoom Tamannaaon Ki;
Bhool Jaata Hun Ke Mehroom-E-Tamanna Hun Main!

Dost Ne Kahaa Imtihaan Mein ki Paanchve Swaaal Ka Jawaab Batao;
Main Bhi Muskuraa Kar Bas Itna Hi Keh Saka "Melody Khao Khud Jaan Jao!"

Aata Hai Kaun Kaun Tere Gham Ko Baantne;
Ghaalib Tu Apni Maut Ki Afwaah Udaa Ke Dekh!

Tu Wo Zaalim Hai Jo Dil Mein Rah Kar Bhi Mera Na Ban Saka;
Aur Dil Wo Kaafir Hai Jo Mujh Mein Rah Kar Bhi Tera Ho Gaya!

Gham-E-Dunia Mein Gham-E-Yaar Bhi Shaamil Kar Lo;
Nasha Badhta Hai Sharabein Jo Sharabon Mein Milen To!

Ya Rab! Dil-E-Muslim Ko Woh Zinda Tammanaa De;
Jo Qalb Ko Garma De, Jo Rooh Ko Tarpaa De!

Kis Qadar Maasoom Sa Lehja Tha Unka "Faraz";
Dheere Se Jaan Keh Kar Humein Bejaan Kar Gaya!

Saameit Ke Le Ja Apne Jhoote Vaade Aur Adhoore Kisse;
Agli Chahat Mein Tumhe Fir Inki Jaroorat Padegi!

Muskuraane Ki Aadat Bhi Kitni Mehangi Padi Humein;
Chod Gaya Wo Ye Soch Kar Ki Hum Judai Me Bhi Khush Hain!

Apne Qadmon Ke Nishan Mere Raste Se Hata De, Qaasid;
Kahin Ye Na Ho Ki Mein Chalte-Chalte Phir Tere Pass Aa Jaun!

Kaun Meri Chahat Ka Fasaana Samjhega Iss Daur Mein;
Yahan To Log Apni Zaroorat Ko Mohabbat Kehte Hain!

Aisa Kya Likhoon Ke Tere Dil Ko Taskeen Pahunchay;
Kya Yeh Kaafi Nahin Ke Meri Duaaon Mein Tum Ho!

Bichri Hui Raahon Se Jo Guzrey Hum Kabhi;
Har Gham Par Khoyi Hui Ik Yaad Mil Gayi!

Chaaha Hai Tujhko Tere Taghaful Ke Bawajood;
Aye Zindagi Tu Bhi Yaad Karegi Kabhi Humein!

Janazaa Rok Kar Mera Wo Is Andaaz Se Boley;
Gali Humne Kahi Thi Tum To Duniya Hi Chorey Jaatey Ho!

Woh Bewafa Hai To Kya Hua Mat Bura Kaho Usko;
Tum Mujhsey Set Ho Jaao Daffaa Karo Usko!

Tark-E-Takaluf Par Bhi Hogi Unko Nadamat Humse Zyada;
Kisne Ki Hai Kaun Karega Unse Mohabbat Humse Zyada!

Kuch Hosha Bhi Fanna The Kuch Aankhon Mein Bhi Nami Thi;
Saari Raat Jis Se Hum Ne Chatting Ki Vo Hamari Girlfriend Ki Mummy Thi!

Mohabbat Naam Hai Jiska, Wo Aesi Qaid Hai Yaaro;
Ki Ummrein Beet Jaati Hain, Sazza Puri Nahin Hoti!

Zameen Bhi Paaon Nahi Rakhne Deti Humein Ab To;
Humein Ye Zidd Hua Karti Thi Ki Ik Naya Aasmaan Banaayenge!

Tu Dekh Ya Na Dekh, Tere Dekhne Ka Gham Nahi; 
Par Teri Ye Na Dekhne Ki Adaa Dekhne Se Kam Nahi!

Muddat Baad Jo Ki Usne Lutf Ki Ik Nigaah;
Dil To Khush Ho Gaya, Par Aaansu Nikal Pade!

Naadani Ki Had To Dekho Uski;
Mujhe Kho Kar Mere Jaisa Talaash Karti Hai!

Sahib-e-Aqal Ho, Ek Mashwara Mukhisana Chahiye;
Zindage Se Tang Hoon, Khud-Kushi Karon Ya Ishq!

Kuch To Majbooriyaan Uski Bhi Rahi Hongi Aye Gaalib;
Varnaa Yunhi Mohabbat Mein Koi Bewafaa Nahi Hota!

Unhone Ne Dekha Humein Tirchi Nazar Se To Hum Madhosh Ho Gaye;
Jab Pata Chala Ki Unke Nain He Tirche Hai To Hum Behosh Ho Gaye!

Ki Ruthe Hai Aise Wo Humse, Jaise Hum Sach Mein Unhe Mana Lenge;
Itna Waqt Kaun Barbaad Kare, Itne Mein To Hum Dusri Pataa Lenge!

Mujhe Ghumaan Tha Ke Chaahaa Bahut Zamane Ne Mujhe;
Main Aziz To Sabko Tha Magar Zarooraton Ke Tarah!

Wo Aaye Meri Kabar Pe Diya Bujha Ke Chal Diye;
Jo Bachaa Khucha Tel Tha Sir Mein Laga Ke Chal Diye!

Chand Lamhon Mein Dekha Hai Hawaaon Ka Rukh Badalte Humne;
Jo Kal Tak Karib Hua Karte The, Aaj Wohi Raqeeib Ho Gaye!

Khaa Ke Thokar Bhi Na Sambhle To Musafir Ka Naseeb;
Farz To Adaa Karte Hain Raah Ke Patthar Apna!

Ek Chhoti Si Galti Pe Wo Mujhe Chhod Gaya;
Jaise Sadiyon Se Wo Meri Galti Ki Talaash Mein Hi Tha!

Tanhaiyon Ka Ek Alag Hi Maza Hai;
Iss Mein Dar Nahi Hota Kisi Ke Chhor Jaane Ka!

Mohabbat Dekhi Hai Maine Zamaane Bhar Ke Logon Ki;
Jahaan Kuch Daam Zyada Ho Aksar Vahaan Insaan Bik Jaate Hain!

Dhokha Mila Jab Pyar Main, Zindagi Mein Udaasi Si Chaa Gayi;
Socha Tha Chhod Dein Is Raah Ko, Kambhakht Mohalley Mein Dusri Aa Gayi!

Manzilon Se Begaana Aaj Bhi Safar Mera;
Raat Besahar Meri Dard Beasar Mera!

Manzilon Sey Begana Aaj Bhee Safar Mera;
Raat Besahar Meree Dard Beasar Mera!

Koi Kuchh To Batlaao Kya Javaab Doon Aakhir;
Ek Savaal Karta Hai Roz Mujhsey Ghar Mera!

Saaqi Gayi Bahaar Dil Mein Rahee Havas;
Tu Minnaton Sey Jaam Dey Aur Main Kahoon Key 'Bas!'

Logon Ne To Thukra Diya Haal-e-Gharibi Dekh Ker Dost;
Hum To Aaj Bhi Badshah Hain Dosti Ke Bazaar Mein!

Jab Yaar Ney Utthaa Kar Zulfon Key Baal Baandhey;
Tab Mainey Apney Dil Mein Laakhon Khayaal Baandhey!

Manzil To Mil Hi Jayegi, Bhatak Kar Hi Sahi;
Gumrah To Wo Hain, Jo Ghar Se Nikle Hi Nahi!

Jub Koi Pochhta Hai Mujhse Meri Zindagi Ki Qeemat;
To Mujhe Yaad Aa Jaata Hai Tera Muskurana!

Jaaney Kaisy Jeety Hain Log Yaadoon Ke Saharey;
Main To Kai Baar Marta Hoon Ik Yaad Aanay Pe!

Aaj Uss Nay Ek Dard Diya To Muje Yaad Aaya;
Humm Nay Hi Duaon Main Uss Ke Saare Dard Mange Thay!

Achha Lagta Hai Tera Naam Mere Naam Ke Saath;
Jaise Koi Subhaa Jurari Ho Kissi Haseen Shaam Ke Saath!

Ae Mohabbat Teri Chahat Iss Jahan Main Har Ek Shaqs Ko Hai;
Teri Ibaadat Main Sir Jhukayein, Akhir Hum Bhi Tere Kaneez-e-ishq Hain!

Aankhon Ki Hoti Hai Khata, Aur Saza Dil Ko Mil Jaati Hai;
Pucho Na Yaaro Pal Mein Hi Kaise Zindagi Badal Jaati Hai!

Sab Ke Dil Mein Hai Jagah Teri, Jo Tu Raazi Hua;
Mujh Pe Goya Ik Zamaana Mehrbaan Ho Jaeega!

Sozish-e-batin Ke Hain Ahbaab Munkir, Warna Yaan;
Dil Maheet-e-girya Aur Lab Aashnaa-e-khanda Hai!
Sozish-e-Batin = Inner aches
Maheet-e-Girya = Tearful waste
Aashnaa-e-Khanda = All smiles

Mohabbat Nahi Hai Naam Sirf Paa Lene Ka;
Bichhad Ke Bhi Aksar Dil Dharakte Hain Saath Saath!

Ghuncha-e-Na Shagufta Ko Door Se Mat Dikha Ke Yoon;
Bosa Ko Poochhta Hoon Main, Munh Se Mujhe Bata Ke Yoon!
Ghuncha-e-Na = Show me not
Shagufta = Far
Bosa + Kiss

Haan Woh Nahin Khuda Parast, Jaao Woh Bewaafa Sahi;
Jisko Ho Deen-o-Dil Aziz, Uski Gali Mein Jaaey Kyun?
Ghalib-e-Khasta Ke Baghair Kaunse Kaam Band Hain;
Roeye Zar Zar Kya, Kijeye Haae Haae Kyun?
Khuda Parast = Godly
Deen-o-Dil = Heart and Faith
Ghalib-e-Khasta = Hapless Ghalib

Unke Dekhe Se Jo Aa Jaati Hai Munh Pe Raunaq;
Woh Samajhte Hain Ke Beemaar Ka Haal Achcha Hai!

Kissi Se Aggar Juda Hona Itna Aasan Hota;
Toh Jism Se Rooh Ko Lene Kabhi Farishte Na Aate!

Mehrbaan Hokey Bulaalo Mujhey Chaaho Jis Waqt:
Main Geya Waqt Naheen Hoon Ki Phir Aa Bhee Na Sakoon!

Surma-e-Muft-e-Nazar Hoon, Meri Qeemat Yeh Hai;
Ke Rahe Chashm-e-Khareedaar Pe Ehsaan Mera!

Hum Toh Bane Hi Tabah Hone Ke Liye The;
Tera Milna Toh Ek Bahaana Tha!

Ghalib Bura Na Maan Jo Vaiz Bura Kahe;
Aisa Bhi Koi Hai Ke Sab Acha Kahein Jisse!

Raha Youn Hi Namukkamal, Gham-e-Ishq Ka Fasaana;
Kabhi Mujhko Neend Aayi, Kabhi So Gaya Zamaana!

Dard Mein Bhi Yeh Lab Muskura Jate Hain;
Beetey Lamhe Hamein Jab Bhi Yaad Atey Hain!

Tum Ko De Di Hain Ishaaron Mein Ijaazat Maine;
Mangne Se Na Mil Sakun Toh Chura Lo Mujh Ko!

Dil Mein Chahat Ka Hona Bhi Zaruri Hai;
Warna Yaad To Dushman Bhi Roz Kiya Karte Hain!

Uski Justaju, Uska Intezaar Aur Yeh Akelapan;
Thak Kar Muskura Dete Hein, Jab Roya Nahi Jaata!

Har waqt Milti Rehti Hain Anjani Si Saza Mujhe;
Main Kaise Poochun Taqdir Se Mera Qasoor Kya Hai!

Unhe Koi Aur Bhi Chahe, Iss Baat Se Hum Thoda-Thoda Jalte Hein;
Par Faqr Hai Hume Iss Baat Ka Ke Sab Hamaari Pasand Pe Hi Marte Hein!

Jab Koi Taaza Museebat Tutati Hai, Hafeez;
Ek Aadat Hai Khuda Ko Yaad Kar Leta Hun Main!

Humne Wajood Apna Kho Liya;
Unka Wajood Apne Saath Jodte-Jodte!

Aye Mohabbat Teri Chahat, Iss Jahan Main Har Ek Shaks Ko Hain;
Teri Ibadat Main Sir Jhukayen, Akheer Hum Bhi Tere Kaneez-E-Ishq Hai!

Na Jaane Kis Ke Muqadar Mein Likhe Ho Tum Magar,
Yeh Such Hain Ke Umeedwar Hum Ajj Bhi Hain!

Raha Yun Hi Namukkamal, Gham-e-Ishq Ka Fasaana;
Kabhi Mujhko Neend Aayi, Kabhi So Gaya Zamaana!

Hum Jawaani Mein Ishq Ko Mazaak Samajhte Rahe;
Iss Kambakht Ishq Ne Meri Zindgaani Ko Mazak Bana Diya!

Humne To Kho Di Thi Saab Chahat Ki Aas;
Unhone Pyaar-e-Izhrar Karke, Hum Mein Jinne Ki Arzoo Bhar Di!

Aaj Muddat Baad Unhone Mohabbat Ka Izhaar Kiya;
Aur Humne Unmein Raab Ka Deedar Kiya!

Tum Khud-be-Khud Shamil Ho Gaye Meri Saanso Mein;
Main Soach Ke Karta Toh Phir Mohabbat Na Karta!

Halaat Ne Tod Diya Mujhe Kache Dhage Ke Tarah;
Warna Mere Wade Bhi Kabhi Zanjeer Hua Karte The!

Uss Ki Mohabbat Ka Silsila Bhi Kya Ajeeb Tha;
Apna Bhi Na Banaya Aur Kissi Aur Ka Bhi Hone Na Diya!

Badi Tabdiliyan Laye Hain Hum Apne Aap Main;
Lekin Tumhaari Yaad Main Rehne Ki Aadat, Abb Bhi Bakki Hai!

Taras Jaoge Hamaare Labo Se Sunn Ne Ko Ek Ek Lafz;
Pyaar Ki Baatein To Kya, Hum Shakayat Bhi Nahi Karenge!

Zindaagi Uski Jiss Ki Mout Pe Zamaana Afsos Karay, Ghalib;
Youn To Har Shaks Aata Hai Iss Dunia Main Marney Ke Liye!

Kaash Woh Ayein Pyaar Ka Izhaar Karne, Meri Kabr Par - Ik Din;
Phir Mein Bhi Ik Aur Zindagi Ki Duwa Maangu, Unpe Nijhawar Karne Ke Liye!

Hum Aashiq Paane Ko Ishq Samajhte Rahe;
Jo Pa Liya, Woh Ishq Nahi, Woh Ishq-e-Hararat Hai!

Meri Saanson Ko Aadat Hai, Teri Yaadon Se Chalney Ki;
Ruk Jayeingi Yeh Saansein, Jiss Din Tum Yaad Na Aaoge!

Baadi Ajeeb Si Bandish Hai Uski Mohabbat Mein;
Na Woh Qaid Kar Sake, Na Hum Azaad Ho Sake!

Ek Baar Apne Andaaze Mohabbat Ka Ikraar Kar Lete;
Hum Apni Zindgai To Kya, Apni Rooh Bhi Unke Naam Kar Dete!

Tu Mere Pyaar Ka Imtehan Lete Lete Thak Jayogi;
Aur Hum Izhare Mohabbat Karte Karte Fanah Ho Jayenge!

Ek Nafrat He Nahi Duniya Mein, Dard Ka Sabab;
Mohabbat Bhi Sakoon Waloon Ko, Badi Takleef Deti Hai!

Kashmakash Mein Kat Gayi Saari Zindgaani;
Tanhayi Ne Jeene Na Diya Aur Justaju Ne Marne!

Teri Berukhi Aur Teri Meherbaani;
Yehi Maut Hai Aur Yehi Zindgaani!

Itna Anmol Tha Ke Khareed Na Saka Koi Hamko;
Hairaan Hun Ke Tere Hathon Bika To Bika Kaise!

Wo Zeher Dekar Maarte To Duniya Ki Nazron Mein Aa Jaate;
Andaaz-e-Qatal To Dekho, Mohabbat Karke Chhod Diya!

Mujhe Bhi Yaad Rakhna Jab Likho Tareekh-e-Wafa;
Ke Maine Bhi Lutaya Hai Mohabbat Main Sakoon Apna!

Kahan Dhoondtey Ho Tum Ishq Ko Oh Bekhabar;
Yeh Khud Hi Dhoond Leta Hai Jissey Barbaad Karna Ho!

Ajab Bandashain Hain Mohabbat Ki;
Na Uss Ne Qaid Mein Rakha, Na Hum Azaad Huwe!

Mujhe Chhorne Ka Faisla To Woh Har Roz Karta Hai;
Magar Uska Bas Nahin Chalta, Meri Wafa Ke Saamne!

Nelaam Kuchh Iss Tarha Se Huay Bazar-e-Mohabbat Mein;
Boli Lagane Wala Bhi Woh Tha, Jiss Ne Kabhi Jholi Faila Kar Manga Tha Mujhe!

Hai Kismat Hamari Aasman Mein Chamakte Sitaare Jaisi;
Log Apni Tammana Ke Liye Hamarey Tutne Ka Intezaar Karte Hain!

Taqderien Badal Jati Hain Jab Zindagi Ka Koi Maqsad Ho;
Warna Zindagi Kat Jati Hai Taqdeer Ko Ilzaam Dete Dete!

Ye Sahil Per Bikhrey Huye Phool;
Na Jane Aaj Phir Kiski Mohabbat Doob Gayi!

Aaj Unhone Ek Aur Dard Diya To Yaad Aaya;
Hamne Hi To Maange The Unke Sare Dard Apni Duaao Mein!

Mere Lafzon Ki Pehchan Aggar Kar Laita Woh, Faraz;
Ussey Mujhse Nahi Khud Say Mohabbat Ho Jaati!

Dil Ne Ek Cheez Barri Beshumar Mangi Hai;
Husn-e-Magroor Ki Fitrat Se Waffa Mangi Hai!

Wapsi Ka Safar Aab Mumkin Na Hoga;
Hum Toh Nikal Chuke Hain Aankh See Aansu Ki Tarhan!

Hum To Jee Bhi Nahi Sakey Aik Saath;
Hum Ko To Aik Saath Marna Tha!

Yeh Soach Kar Palkon Mein Chuppa Lete Hein Aansu;
Gir Ke Yeh Aankh Se Meri Tarhan, Tanha Na Ho Jayein!

Mere Dil Ki Khawaishen Reh Reh Kar Poochengee Ek Din Uss Se;
Kis Ko Aabad Kiya Hai Mujh Ko Barbaad Kar Ke!

Toote Hain Sheesha Dil Haaye Dil Itne Ke Ehl-e-Dard;
Rakhte Hain Paaon Khaak Par Sau Baar Dekh Kar!

Woh Mujhse Door Hokar Khush Hein Toh Khush Hi Rehne Do;
Mujhe Apni Chahat Se Zyada, Unki Muskrahat Pasand Hai!

Tum Se Wabastgi Ka Ye Aalam Hai;
Hum Woh Saans Nahi Lete Jisme Tumhari Yaad Na Ho!

Humne To Ek Hi Shaks Par Mohabbat Khatam Kardi;
Ab Mohabbat Kis Ko Kehte Hain, Kuch Malum Nahi!

Usney Mujhe Apna Kaha Tu Kya Huwa;
Log Jhooth Bhi To Bolte Hain!

Shayad Koi Tarash Kar Kismat Sawaar De:
Yeh Soch Kar Hum Umar Bhar Pathar Baney Rahe!

Teri Yaad Ilaaj-e-Gham Hai;
Soch, Tera Maqaam Kya Hoga!

Main Uss Ke Kheyal Se Jaoon To Kahan Jaoon;
Woh Meri Sooch Ke Har Raste Pae Nazar Aata Hai!

Woh Mera Sab Kuchh Hai Par Muqaddar Nahi;
Kaash Woh Mera Kuchh Na Hota Par Muqaddar Hota!

Main Apni Zaat Ki Tanhaiyo Mein Zinda Hoon;
Magar Yeh Bhi Sach Hai Ke Mujhe Teri Zarorat Hain Bahut!

Hum To Hass Lete Hain Dukh Mein Bhi, Teri Rehmat Se;
Varna Log To Sukh Mein Bhi Pareshaan Rehtey Hain!

Khusro Darya Prem Ka, Ulti Wa Ki Dhaar;
Jo Utra So Doob Gaya, Jo Dooba So Paar!

Akhir Zindagi Ne Bhi Aaj Puchh Liya Mujhse;
Kahan Hai Wo Shaks Jo Tujhe Mujh Se Bhi Aziz Tha!

Meri Yaadon Ki Kashti Uss Samundar Mein Tairti Hai;
Jiss Mein Paani Meri Apni Hi Palkon Ka Hota Hai!

Khusro Baazi Prem Ki, Main Khelun Pi Ke Sung;
Jeet Gayi To Piya Moray, Haari, Pi Kay Sung!

Kaash Unko Kabhi Fursat Mein Yeh Khayal Aa Jaye;
Ke Koi Yaad Karta Hai Unhey Zindagi Samajh Kar!

Chalte Rahte Hain Ki Chalna Hai Musafir Ka Naseeb;
Sochte Rahte Hain Ki Kis Raahaguzar Ke Hum Hain!

Itni Qasmein Na Uthao Ghabraa Ke;
Jao, Hum AitBaar Karte Hein!

Wo Mujhse Door Ho Kar Khush Hein To Khush Hi Rehne Do;
Mujhe Apni Chahat Se Zyada, Uski Muskrahat Pasand Hai!

Maykhane Mein Kaise Bujhti Pyas Meri;
Inn Hothon Ko Talab To Tere Hothon Ki Thi!

Apani Yaadon Ke Ujallon Ko Mere Pass Rahne Do;
Baki Hayat-E-Safar Inki Roshni Mein Guzaar Leinge!

Hai Koi Janaaza Padne Wala;
Main Apne Dil Ko Maar Betha Hun!

Uttar Chukki Hai Meri Rooh Mein Kisi Ki Nigah;
Tarap Rahi Hai Meri Zindagi Kisi Ke Liye!

Iss Tarah Loot Liya 'Sheer-E-Tamanna' Ne Hume;
Zindagi Bhi Chheen Li, Aur Jaan Se Maara Bhi Nahi!

Ankhon Mein Haya Ho Toh Parda Dil Ka Hi Kafee Hai;
Nahi To Naqaab Se Bhi Hote Hain, Ishaare Mohabbat Ke.

Khudkushi Ke Liye Thoda Sa Zaher Hi Kaafi Hai, Dosto;
Magar Zinda Rehne Ke Liye, Kaafi Zaher Pina Padta Hai!

Meri Tanhayi Ko Mera Shaunq Na Samjhna;
Bohat Pyaar Se Diya Hai Yeh Tohfa Kisi Ne!

Shaam Se Aankh Mein Nami Si Hai;
Aaj Phir Aap Ki Kami Si Hai!

Wohi Kaarwaan, Wohi Raaste, Wohi Zindaagi, Wohi Marhalay;
Magar Apne Makaam Par, Kabhi Tum Nahin Aur Kabhi Hum Nahin!

Hathoan Ki Lakiroan Pe Mat Jaa, Ai Ghalib;
Naseeb Un Ke Bhi Hote Hain, Jin Ke Hath Nehin Hote!

Kabhi Zarurat Pade To Awaaz De Dena;
Mein Guzra Waqt Nahi Jo Wapis Na Aaun!

Khuda Kare Zindagi Mein Yeh Makaam Aaye;
Tujhe Bhulne Ki Dua Karun Aur Dua Mein Tera Naam Aaye!

Sochte Hein Seekh Lein Hum Bhi Berukhi Karna;
Mohobatt Nibhate Nibhate Aaj Humne Apni Hi Kadar Kho Di!

Kaafir Ke Dil Se Aya Hon, Mein Yeh Dekh Kar;
Khuda Maujood Hai Wahan, Par Usey Pata Nahin!

Tu Wo Zaalim Hai Jo Dil Mein Reh Kar Bhi Mera Na Ban Saka, Ghalib;
Aur Dil Wo Kafir Jo Mujh Mein Reh Kar Bhi Tera Hogaya!

Hum Ne Mohabbat Ke Nashe Mein Aa Kar Use Khuda Bana Dala;
Hosh Tab Aaya Jab Us Ne Kaha Ke Khuda Kisi Ek Ka Nahi Hota!

Masjid Khuda Ka Ghar Hai, Peeney Ki Jagha Nahin;
Kaafir Ke Dil Mein Ja, Wahan Khudaa Nahin!

Mere Jazbaat Se Waqif Hai Meri Qalm, Faraz;
Main Pyaar Likhon To Tera Naam Likha Jata Hai!

Hazaron Khwahishen Aise Ke Har Khawahish Pe Dum Nikle;
Bahut Nikle Mere Armaan, Lekin Phir Bhe Kam Nikle!

Tum Ne Mohabbat Mein Ik Pal Khoya Hai;
Meine Us Pal Mein Sari Zindagi Kho Di!

Kahan Talaash Karoge Tum, Mujh Jaisa Shakhs;
Jo Tumhare Sitam Bhi Sahe Aur Tum Se Mohabbat Bhi Kare!

Kuchh Zakhm Sadiyoun Baad Bhi Taaza Rehte Hein, Faraz;
Waqt Ke Paas Bhi Har Marz Ki Dawa Nahi Hoti!

Ye Mohabaat Ka Bandhan Bhi Kitna Ajeeb Hota Hai;
Mil Jaayein Toh Baatein Lambi, Bichhar Jaayein Toh Yaadein Lambi!

Itna Na Tarpao Ke Koi Gunaah Kar Loon Main;
Phir Na Kehna Ke Kyun Barbaad Kiya Khud Ko, Meri Muhabbat Ke Liye!

Bin Mangay Hi Mil Jati Hain Tabeerain Kisi Ko Faraz;
Koi Khali Hath Reh Jata Hai, Hazaaron Duaoon Ke Baad!

Apnay Siwa Batao Tumhein Kuch Mila Hai Faraz;
Hazar Bar Lee Hain Tumne Mere Dil Ki Talashiyaan!

Tum Mujhe Rooh Mein Basa Lo, Toh Achha Hai;
Yeh Dil-O-Jaan Ke Rishte, Aksar Toot Jaya Karte Hein!

Tujhe Sochun Toh Pehlu Se Sarak Jata Ha Dil Mera;
Mein Dil Pe Haath Rakhkar Dhadhkano Ko Thaam Leta Hun!

Na Jane Itni Mohobbat Kahan Se Aa Gayi Uss Ajnabee Ke Liye;
Ke Mera Dil Bhi Uski Khatir, Aksar Mujhse Hi Ruth Jaaya Karta Hai!

Shayed Khushi Ka Daur Bhi Aa Jaye Ek Din 'Faraz';
Gham Bhi Toh Mil Geya Tha Tamanna Kiye Baghair!

Tanhai Toh Hai Saathi Apni, Zindagi Ke Har Ek Pal Ki 'Faraz';
Chalo Yeh Shikwa Bhi Door Huwa, Ke Kisi Ne Saath Na Diya!

Na Murawat, Na Mohabbat, Na Khuloos Hain Faraz;
Main Toh Sharminda Hun Iss Daur Ka Insaan Hokar!

Ajab Hunnar Hai Mere Hath Mein, Yeh Shair Likhne Ka;
Mein Apni Barbadian Likhta Hun, Log Wah Wah Karte Hain!

Meri Chahat Ko Mere Halaat Ke Tarazu Mein Kabhi Mat Tolna, 'Faraz';
Maine Woh Zakham Bhi Khaye Hain, Jo Meri Qismat Main Nahi The!

Mere Lafzon Ki Pehchan Aggar Kar Laita Woh, Faraz;
Usy Mujhse Nahi Khud Sey Mohabbat Ho Jati!

Inn Baadlon Ka Mizaaj Bhi Mere Mehboob Jaisa Hai;
Kabhi Toot Ke Barasta Hai, Kabhi Be-rukhi Se Guzar Jat Hai!

Ab Tak Dil-e-Khush Fehem Ko Tujh Se Hain Umeedain;
Yeh Aakhri Shama Bhi Bhujane Ke Liye Aa!

Aye Waaiz-e-Naadaan, Karta Hai Tu Ek Qayaamat Ka Charcha;
Yahaan Roz Nighaayein Milti Hain, Yahaan Roz Qayamat Hoti Hai!

Maine Hi Seekhaya Tha Usse Teer Chalana;
Ab Mere Siwa, Uss Ka Koi Nishaana Bhi Nahi!

Talaash Kar Meri Kami Ko Apne Dil Mein;
Agar Dard Mile To Samajh Lena, Mohabbat  Abhi Baki Hai!

Us Ke Chehre Ne Humain Tanha Kardiya;
Warna Hum To Apne Aap Main Hi Ek Mehfil Hua Karte Thay!

Abb Toh Jaan Hi Dene Ki Baari Hai 'Mohsin';
Mein Kahan Tak Saabit Karun Ke Wafa Hai Mujh Mein!

Kaise Bhula Doon Main Usko;
Maut Insanon Ko Aati Hai, Yadon Ko Nahi!

Sazzaa Ban Jaati Hain, Guzree Huye Waqt Ki Yaadein;
Jaane Kyun Matlab Ke Liye, Meharbaan Hote Hain Log!

Teri Nazron Ki Nazakat Pe Hum Naaz Karte Hain;
Ae Sanam Hum Teri Har Adaa Se, Pyaar Karte Hain!

Shaam Se Aaj Saans Bhaari Hai, Bekaraari Bekaraari Hai!
Aapke Baad Har Ghadi Humnein, Aap Ke Saath Hi Guzaari Hai!

Takleef Jo Ho Kabhi, Mujhe Sochne Se Tumhe;
Ek Lamha Bhi Na Lagana, Mujhe Bhool Jaana Tum!

Mery Sajdon Mein Kami To Na Thi, Mere Mola!
Kya Mujh Se Bhi Barr Ke Kisi Ne Manga Tha Ussey?

Muddat Baad Ki Usne, Jo Lutf Ki Ik Nigaah;
Dil To Khush Ho Gaya, Par Aansu Nikal Pade!

Rehta hu maikhane mein to sharabi na samaj mujhe;
Har wo shakhs jo masjid se nikle namazi nahi hota.
